name: Gameu911 Gameutoo
text: I would not recommend any other U-Haul in Montgomery. These people were nice courteous and fair upon me choosing the vehicle that I wanted. The vehicle was also clean on the inside as you can check the videos to see. The items that they sell here are not overpriced and fairly priced. Highly recommended if you're going to use a U-Haul you need to use this one. And the storage facilities are $50 per month you can't beat that. They are also setting up an inside storage as well.

name: FreeThe People
text:
Zero star. Worst company ever. Didnt have my truck or trailer ready. Didnt have the pock up I ordered  (20 mpg )
Gave me a box truck I didnt want ( 10 mpg ) sent me too 3 other locations for the tow dolly. A 188 dollar bill turned into 265. Customer svc siad it's not thier fault. I knew what i was getting on too. Spent 3 hrs on hold and got hung up on several times.
Dont ever use uhaul. Go enterprise.
Big middle finger you haul. I hope they go bankrupt.

name: James Bentley
text: They provide exactly what they say they'll provide, good job

name: Anjanette Johnson
text: Always a pleasure doing business with them!

name: Stefon Smith
text: Easy to work with got done what I needed.

name: Mike S
text: Plenty of available units

name: David Steiner
text: Not helpful

name: Mark Cook
text: These people are awful!!  Service is awful, emoyees are discourtious, equipment is not maintained and they try not to refund money they overcharge you.   Find another source, this business is obviously in deep trouble and the lack of maintenance on the rental equipment is going to cause someone serious problems.

name: Jeremy Hughes
text:
Worst experience I have ever had at a rental place . We reserved a 20 ft truck 2 weeks in advance to move my daughter to North Carolina for medical school .
I was quoted $395.00 total for the weekend to return it sunday . I show up to pick the truck up at 6 pm on friday and the tell me it's going to be $1236.00 . They said the lady that made my reservation messed up , so I didnt have the money to get it and it was too late to go somewhere else , so it ruined our plans and our schedule . I will never go back here ever and you cant get ahold of anybody to complain .

name: Nilesha Givens
text: The Manger Antonio is the exact opposite of what the sales department displays the mission and goals the Sales Department portray when renting any service from this unit.   Last year when I rented a truck and unit online the sales department split the sale; I pick up the truck from 1420 Montgomery Hwy facility and the unit sold to me was this facility.  After, moving my son home from Alabama State University, tired and weary, I decided to go to the unit first to unload his items from college.  It was so many people there and every time a customer complained (People of color) the employees would say, “He is not available.”  Looking out of the window I noticed a white man running up to the U-Haul vehicle we rented from a half a mile away approach my son sitting in the U-Haul Van yelling, screaming at him, "Is that my truck?”  I got out of the long line and approach the man and asked him why he was screaming at my son (It was Antonio the manger) and he said, I am the manger looking for one of my vehicles.  Meanwhile a neighbor of mine was moving and demanding to speak with because the U-Haul she rented broke down on the side of the road after leaving the facility and she was told he was unavailable; she was black too.  Antonio put a lock on my storage never notifying me because he said it was the wrong lock and I purchased it from his facility.  I do not have key, nor have he reached out to me.  Calls to the facility always goes into the sales department because the staff is always unavailable.  People of color never rent anything from this facility that is why his employee turn over rate is so high!

name: betty webb
text: Wish I could have stored my things at this one so nice and professional....😳🥺but had to use the other one across from the bowling alley. Not professional at all.

name: Christian Hunter
text: Best moving services!!! If you are looking for affordable moving services then go for U-Haul Moving & Storage of Vestavia.

name: Jose Conchello
text: Called a few weeks ahead to get a wiring harness installed.  Arrived at my appointment time only to find out that they don't have mechanics scheduled to come in for another 2 hours. You would think that a nation-wide enterprise would have figure out how a scheduling system works by this day in age. Serious waste of my personal time due to company negligence.

name: Drew Templeton
text: Joshua was a huge help. The rental process was smooth and I ended up being really glad I got the $8 insurance add-on 😬😅. Will definitely be back.

name: Eric Bowden
text: This location excels in customer service and should be a model for all U-HAUL locations. Being in the customer service industry myself, I know first hand what excellent customer service should look like. Every single person at this location work in excellence every day. GREAT JOB!  We appreciate you and we will definitely be back!!

name: Chris Williams
text: Can’t even bother to answer their phone. I was on hold for an hour and no answer. Yes it was during business hours. Pitiful service. Won’t be using y’all

name: Katherine Barhydt
text: We specifically ordered a 15ft truck over 3 weeks in advance and they tried to “upgrade” us to a 26ft. Neither of us have ever driven something that size and made it clear we were extremely uncomfortable especially driving that size in downtown Houston traffic. How do you consider that an upgrade? If I ordered a Medium sweater and got a XXL it would be reasonable to be upset. No one would help us, they let other people in line behind us interrupt while we were trying to sort the mess they made out. We called 5 times over Friday and Saturday to confirm our truck and it’s size. I could not be more disappointed in their customer service, the ethics of this company, and their willingness to honor the contracts they make with their customers.

name: T. Lee Baumann
text: I can see why this establishment is not listed on Angie's List, HomeAdvisors, or has a Better Business Bureau affiliation. After driving in from out of town to get a hitch installed on my car, and having confirmed that the parts were in, several days in advance, when I arrived for my reservation, I was told the parts were NOT in! When asked how that could be, after verifying the parts several days beforehand, I was told their employees were trained to say "yes." My biggest disappointment was the absence of any apologies whatsoever. I was then promised I would be contacted AS SOON as the parts did arrive. That never happened. I had to call the corporate office the day before my rescheduled reservation (on a holiday weekend, of course) to finally verify that the parts had arrived. This is the type of service you should expect should you choose to do business at this location.

name: Dan Little
text: Good service, clean and convenient

name: Chuck Turner
text:
Had a great experience
Eric white is a great asset to uhaul.  Great skill sets and very thorough in the transaction

name: nick
text: Been in store twice and had no one at counter for several mins both times. If u need free stuff you most likely could go in and out without ever being noticed

name: Chato Denaris
text: .today after a 20  mile detour the two young punks , feed me a " my manager line " because it was to hard for them to open a gas line .pitiful😡

name: Kevin Morson
text: U-Haul on 31 has the worst customer service I've ever experienced. I walk into the store and can't find anybody. So I walk around back to see if I can find someone. When I finally do I say "oh good there is someone here, I need to get a propane tank filled". He jumps down my throat and tells me "they're busy hooking up trailers". I say "there's no need to be rude", afterward he turns and walks away from me. This is not the first time I've had issue with U-Haul but it will be the last I'm done with them.

name: Justin Rogers
text: Nice facility and quick service. It's best if you call ahead to make sure that the size truck you want is there for you. Also, make sure you know the relative distance you are traveling, and save your receipt from when you fill up just in case there are any problems.

name: Sandra Cox
text: The assistant manager was so helpful. I was running late and he waited for me to get propane. He went above and beyond and I am very grateful.

name: Jonathan Ary
text:
I would not recommend  this Uhaul location to anyone for anything.  I detailed my experience with them below.....

2015:  I took my vehicle to them to have a trailer hitch installed.  I scheduled an appointment and dropped my vehicle off at 7:00 am on my way to work and was assured that it would be completed by 4:00 pm when I came back.  It was almost 7:00 pm before they were complete, so I sat there for 3 hours waiting.  When they were complete they told me that I would need to come back and get a ball for the hitch since they didn't have an that fit the hitch in stock.  This defeated the purpose of needing a hitch before the weekend, but I borrowed a ball from a neighbor.  When I hooked the trailer up, I noticed the lights were not coming on. Something was wrong with the electrical.

3 days later I called and they said to come in and pick up the ball.  When I arrived they said that they were mistaken and did not have one.  I mentioned that the electrical was faulty, but they could not look at it that day since the trailer hitch guy was not there.

1 month later I called(they never called me back) and was told they had a ball that fit and I picked it up.  Once again, they said no one was there to look at my electrical issue.

A few months later I called to make an appointment to have the hitch fixed.  Their phone disconnected me three times and I gave up after wasting 30 minutes on hold.

When I go by the location and finally make an appointment, i'm told it will cost me upwards of $100 to have it repaired since it only had a 30 day warranty.  They said there was no record of me having ever mentioned the issue before.

Overall, this location has awful customer service.  More should have been done to fix my issues instead of kicking the can down the road until they could say it was out of warranty.

name: Y S
text:
How do they hire people with such bad customer service. The two guys working there on Sunday afternoon both times I have gone (back in December) and then today) make up whatever excuse and have the ugliest attitude. Give them some lessons on body language and customer service.

Please avoid this location at all cost! Go to Pelham, super friendly and helpful there.

name: VERONICA ROSAS
text: Exelente service Mr. Antonio always take care me with everything I need I come to that place 1 time a week to tent a truck or refill my propane tank

name: helishengduowen
text: Antonio is the best moving planner you can get, and the even better part is he doesn't charge!

name: JK Dufour
text:
I got a wiring done for a trailer hitch and it took them over 3 hours to install. In the process of the installation they broke my brake light wiring and failed to say anything to me after, then when I was pulled over I came back and asked them about it, they denied having broken it and said it was there before. I asked them to fix it and it took them 2 hours to even start on it and after 3 total hours they said they can’t find anything wrong and they tried to charge me for labor.
They also overcharged me for a 5x8 trailer that I brought back a day early.
This place has some of the most incompetent customer service of any U-haul.

name: J T
text: Not a bad experience but the wait can be long. Check in ahead of time online, it makes a huge difference. The staff was fast and friendly once I got moving. I would use this location again.

name: Evan Harsh
text:
Do not believe anything they quote you over the phone. Sounds like the employees are just guessing.

I spoke to the GM Anthonio C. and only got excuses. No apologies were given and no amends for the hassle I was put through were offered. The only thing he was willing to do was refund me for an appliance dolly that was not given to me.

Unless there's no other option I will never use Uhaul again.

Zero customer service skills across the board.

name: Tiffany Chapman
text: I have some questions about something and the young guy there was very nice and he was very informative and he gave me printouts of prices of the item I needed and the staff was overall

name: Payton Sellers
text: By far and away the worst interaction with any business I have ever had (comcast and other communications providers included). I experienced double billings, over billings, misrepresentation, late services, failure to come through on services offered. Surely, uhaul must be a capable organization, however the people within this store simply misrepresent their capabilities as to when services will be available, times they will be available, etc. I arrived at the store after calling 3 times (once the day prior and twice earlier that day) to verify that the services I needed were ready - and they were not, an no one seemed to care. the My issue was escalated to the regional manager and even he failed to call return my call. Don't take this risk with people who will be storing and moving your things. Avoid at all costs :(

name: Josh May
text:
Edit: My review below was based on my last 4 or 5 visits and still stands. While it took me another 2 visits and 15-20 minutes of wait time today to get my tank filled, the associate did recognize the situation and gave me a discount on the propane. Bumping from 1 to 2 stars.

Getting propane here is like pulling teeth. You can ring the bell all you want, but you just get ignored. Associates walk past and don't say anything. Going inside and asking just nets you excuses ("broken machine", "don't have anyone who can do that right now", etc.). I get that the trucks are the money makers, but if you offer a service, have a plan for it. Set specific propane hours, train your maintenance crews on how to use the machine, or something else.

name: Cody Hamilton
text: UHual and Walmart have equivalent customer service and that’s why I don’t shop at Walmart and I just bought my own trailer so I don’t have to deal with either now.

name: Little Bird
text: Booked reservation for 6x12 trailer several weeks out. Had "Guaranteed Reservation". Checked inventory on site, looked good. Day before moving daughter to college at 4:09 PM, receive text my reservation has been moved to Location 30+ miles away.  Called location where I had reservation and was told, "It's corporate. I can't do anything about it. You need to call 800-GOUHAUL if you're not happy."  Called 800# multiple times on the way to Vestavia location alternating calls to Pell City as I was afraid of driving 31 miles without assurance of equipment.  No answer in Pell City. 800 number would pick up and then drop me over and over. At store, no help. In front of me for 30 minutes, people with same story. Behind me...a dozen more people with same story as me. At counter poor kid making apologies and telling how bad U-Haul has become. Don't use U-Haul unless you're willing to gamble on your move day. I would give them no stars if it would let me. Expect to see them folding up shop any day now. No way a corporation can operate this way.

name: Kristen
text: Some if the workers could be a bit nicer but they had what we needed.

name: Rus Hardy
text: Read your paperwork closely!  What they quote isn't what you get.

name: Ashlee Boren Myers
text: After our pick up time was pushed back from 12 to 3pm, we were told they had no truck there for us. Despite the fact I had called to confirm. We were then redirected to the store on Valley avenue. The man at the desk seemed more irritated with the situation than I was and did not apologize once for the situation.

name: Gary Grimes
text: Convenient trailer rentals with wide selection

name: Eric
text: Always rent from these guys when I need a basic trailer.... never had a problem.

name: Joseph Duran
text: Friendly and quick, that's all I need any place to be.

name: Joseph Williams
text: A hole in the roof of the truck was hidden by the open rear door. Found the hole when we were loading the truck and notified the General Manager and he stuck me with the bill for repair because as he repeatedly stated insistently: "We do not ship trucks with holes". Despite the hole being obviously either cutout or rusted out due to poor maintenance/inspections and in a location that is impossible to see unless the door is almost completely lowered or the door is closed with someone inside. 0/10 Experience and will not be using UHAUL again especially the UHAUL in Vestavia.

text: Just wonderful booked online made a 7am appointment done by 8:30 . Over and be on satisfied!!, shouting out to CLAY for taking care of it fast and efficiently. Thank you Clay and U-Haul for making my experience fast and painless , thank you all again God Bless.

name: Rodney Jones
text: Terrible interaction by their employee.  Needed to refill propane tank and pulled over to the Propane fill station and waited.  There were no other customers only the lone employee.  After waiting, I went to the office building (door standing open) to get the employees attention that I needed propane refill.  He told me to step outside and he would be with me in a minute.  So I wait out by my car.   When he finally came out he began to lecture about masks and insisted that I put one on while standing out in the parking lot.  What a joke.  CNN has brainwashed this joker.  Won’t ever be back

name: Kenzie Barnett
text: We stopped in with a last minute request on our way out of town and the manager, Clay, helped us out big time! The problem we ended up having wasn’t even on uhaul’s end and Clay still helped us fix the problem. Thank you for going above and beyond!

name: Graham Johnson
text: Fast and easy.

name: Daniel Buerger
text: Dont need a lecture about masks.  Dont need to be treated like I am 6.   Wont be back.  Keep your b.s. pandemic fears for your own phycosis.

name: Mark Childers
text: Nice how you treat retired military!

name: Mark Eriquezzo
text: So let me start by saying I am reviewing for two experiences here at this Uhaul location. The first time when I moved to this area I dropped off my UHaul equipment here and a middle aged Army Veteran greeted me and helped with the process of the return. He also helped me to figure out the area and gave me some local information which was very helpful. Now when I moved from this area I picked up my UHaul from Quality Used Automotive and I would not recommend picking up from that location but I had to unfortunately and the UHaul equipment dolly and pads were not in the truck and it was incredibly dirty. So I took the truck and drove only 4 minutes back to this initial UHaul location where I had another amazing experience. The General Manager, Clay Reed JR, met me in the store and I told him what was going on. He helped me get a dolly and pads as well as offered to clean my truck for me free of charge. His kindness, professionalism, and overall customer care is the entire reason UHaul still has my business. So to you Clay again I say THANK YOU SIR! 🙏🏻

name: Jason Morris
text: Good customer service from clay employee

name: Dale Terrell
text: The manager really worked to help me, was very professional and hard working. I think his name was clay, either way I recommend them to everyone.

Woman that answered the phone stated that they did and I headed across town to their location.  When I got there, the guy behind the counter quickly told me that they could not pump any propane because their system was acting up.  Why did the woman on the phone not know this and save me a trip.  Really poor customer service.

It is a shame I have to drive across town when this store is so conveniently located to me.

Dont expect the same answrr twice, or anyone to ever answer the phone, they lie, and over charge, they do not know their own inventory or how things are supposed to check out. Then they call an harass you claiming you never turned the rental in and try to charge you outrageous amounts. Stay away from this location.

To the employees working there, you will be seeing me very soon and I will show you what it's like to be treated the way you treated my family.

name: Krista Bell
text: The employee we saw at pickup was very nice. Per our contract, we rented the uhaul from 5:30pm to 8:30pm, but this kind employee told us we could turn it in before opening the next day (7am). We returned at 6:45am, and Sabrina was very rude and charged us for 2 days. (We only had the uhaul for 12 hours.) When I explained the situation, she just kept stating to “read the contract”. I’m aware of what the contract said as I made the reservation, but when an employee tells me differently, I take their word. Very disappointed.

name: Sarah Adkins-Jablonsky
text:
This is the first one star review I’ve ever given.

Uhaul cancelled without our notice and did not care, leaving us in the cold

We rented a 15 ft truck weeks before a cross city move from this Vestavia location. The day before, we got a call saying the pick up location was at True Value in Helena AL. When we get there, the True Value reps said it was not available due to a mishap with another customer and to call to find a location where we could pick up our truck. When we called the Vestavia store to find out truck, they said our reservation had been cancelled. When? By whom? They could not tell us (????) but said there was a cancellation email (but we never received an email— our emails only tell us to go to TrueValue). So we are left without a truck and without an apology.

When we try to make a new reservation, the closest option was a 30ft truck a 3 hour round trip away.

U-Haul permanently lost a customer.

name: Louis Gobeo
text: Outstanding service. The day I visited, the manager was working through an issue with their alarm. Despite what was surely a stressful situation, she provided prompt and courteous service and bent over backwards to help us out with our rental. I cannot recommend this place enough. Thank you!

name: Bill Pesnell
text: I have rented from this location numerous times. Without fail, and consistent on each and very rental, the manager Sabrena, and the staff have been polite, extremely helpful, open to suggestions, and overall, a joy with which to work. Not once have I ever had an issue. I would recommend that potential new customers overlook the one-off bad review because everyone has a bad day now and then. Big picture, Sabrena and the crew will bend over backwards to help any way they can. I will not rent from any other vendor or location if at all possible. Five Star service without a doubt.

name: Corey
text: Friendly service and was everything i needed! Will only rent from this location in the future! Top notch business!

name: Vince Marshall
text: wonderful staff great, clean and cool storage facilities

name: Chelsey Berry
text: Sabrina and everyone else were absolutely great! Very nice and polite and helpful. The place is really nice and clean. Sabrina came out to our truck while we were unloading into our storage to do the paperwork to return the truck. She saw that we had our baby with us and wanted to help us get out of there faster! Would recommend to everyone!

name: Lindsay Baird
text: Sabrena is a wonderful manager who makes certain that her store operates efficiently and professionally. Everyone there has been courteous and helpful. We had a great experience. Will definitely do business with them in the future... Highly recommend!

name: George Frank

name: Curtis Stewart
text: Called and advised no available vehicles to rent.

name: Nate
text: My head gasket on my truck blew.  I need a truck for work and they have the best rates in town.  The staff are very helpful too.  I never had a bad experience with this uhaul.

name: Molly Hill
text: General Manager Sabrina  is rude, mean and disrespectful! She loves to hang up on customers, and over charge them. Don’t do business with her ever. Just plain nasty. She uses her authority in the wrong way manner. Not fit to manage anyone!!

name: cece tarver
text: The worker Paul  at this location lied about a free month when he overheard me and my sister talking about taking our things to another storage facility because they have a 1 month free promotion and he says so do we now fast forward a month later and I have late fees and liens in my property because he lied. You can never get anyone on the phone no matter what time of day it is. Also I have called corporate several times spoke with someone named David Reed who was very short and nasty because he kept saying you have to call the store and speak with them when I explained that no one is on the office when I get off at 6. Even though I was told they are there until 7. So I was told on Thursday that he would call me back by 1:00 that day to discuss this (remind you this is the guy who lied to me.) Still haven't spoke with the manager at this facility and I thinks it's because they know they messed up. So for 3 weeks I have been given the run around and still no district manager or nothing. I will say this how ever it turn out from thus point I WILL NOT NOR WILL I RECOMMEND THIS UHAUL COMPANY TO ANYONE! Now the lie is it's only if you are moving one way (BUT WHO MOVES OUT OF STATE AND PUT THERE THINGS IN A STORAGE IT MAKES NO DENSE AT ALL!!!!!) Save your time and money and go to another place. The manager at the location up the street is worse his name is Antonio. Don't know why any of these people got into customer service cause clearly they are not cut out for this job. They say you pay for what you get so buyer beware this is what I got lesson learned that's for sure!!!!!!!

name: CJRavenFan91
text: Great location. The employees are kind and very professional. I filled out my application online and when I got to the store I was in the rental truck in less than 5 minutes. This is always great when there is speedy service when moving is such a stressful time.

text: Great & safe location, great security to store items in a climate controlled environment.

name: K T

text: Rude personal

name: Sage TheKing

name: Tarek M
text: Fast quick & straightforward

text:
(Translated by Google) If you need to move, this is definitely the right place, there is EVERYTHING, and the attention is great

(Original)
Si necesitas mudarte, definitivamente este es el lugar indicado, hay de TODO, y la atención es genial

name: Jason Summer
text:
Arbitrarily charges arbitrary fees for pickup at the store.

The service, initially, was fine.  I had searched as best as I could online to determine if UPS had a main warehouse in the area to which I could have a package delivered.  I kept getting redirected to the local UPS stores, like this one.  I even called the UPS customer service line to find out if there was a local warehouse, and was placed on hold for 30 mins before I gave up.  I then checked for a local UPS store (again, including this location), went to the location’s website, copied the address, and used it for shipping.

***At no point was there any indication from the primary UPS website or this local UPS store website that any charges may be incurred for using the address for shipping***

So, as the clerk brought my box to me, they stated there would be a $5 charge.  Surprised, I asked why and was told it was because I used their location as a shipping address.  I was also informed by the clerk the location was not an “actual” UPS location, so there were extra fees that may be incurred. I said I understood, and asked they show me any literature that indicated there was a charge for using the location for my shipping.  They could not produce any literature, documentation, or point out anywhere on their website that this particular service would incur a fee.  However, the clerk did advise if I had simply called the store ahead of time to ask about shipping, they would’ve informed me about the charge.

In this day and age, who calls for quick info unless it’s a last resort? And why aren’t these charges posted on UPS corporate site or on the local store’s site?  Where’s the transparency?

I tried to give them the benefit of the doubt - I stepped out of line so they could assist other customers and I searched online on my phone for any indication of a charge for this service and found none.  So, really folks, this store - based on their logic - could hold your package ransom for whatever amount they want: $5, $15, $20?  The charge is not posted anywhere, they have your shipment, and won’t release it until you pay.

After a fun back-and-forth between me and the manager (?), she finally, out of the “goodness of her heart” (she essentially spat those words out at me), allowed me to take my shipment without charging me.  She also made certain she made some serious notes near my pick-up signature for her future reference.  Finally, as I was leaving, she made one of those passive-aggressive comments to her colleague, but loud enough to be certain I heard it, something to the extent of: “all of this over $5?!”  I responded, “Yes. Over $5.”  There have been many times when $5 made or broke my week.

I completely understand and support a business’s right to charge whatever they want for whatever products or services. However, we should not be ransomed into paying some arbitrary, unpublished, hidden charge that we are surprised with at the counter before we can pick up a package. This is the digital age - there is no reason that charge can’t be easily - and prominently - be listed on their website.  Or even printed on one of their many signs behind the counter, or even on a menu of costs/services that they can hand the customer.  Where is the transparency??  But there was nothing other than the word of the clerk.  In this day and age, and in a business that aligns itself with such a large delivery corporation, that lack of information is egregious, especially due to how easy of a fix it is - just update the damned website.

name: KMAC
text: There are quite a lot of services offered here most might not be aware of BEYOND shipping a package.  There are PO Boxes, fingerprinting services, shipping, copying, faxing & Amazon return services to name a few. I wouldn't say  they are the friendliest group of ladies, but they ARE efficient,  knowledgeable, strong and quick!

name: Jayla Jayden
text: Ups is awful all of my packages are coming opened or broken!!!! I took a picture but idk how to add it. I have tried to contact a manager but everytime I call they tell me someone will contact me about my problem but never does 🤬

name: J. D. T.
text: These people spend far more time talking than they do working. I have spent 20 minutes in line and not one not see one person leave. It's ridiculous. Dropping off a package that should take 2 minutes can easily take 30 minutes. Get some people in here who understand customer service. The last thing I want to do in a pandemic is unnecessarily stand in line in a small room!

name: Andrea Brown
text: Excellent Service and products! Very professional service!

name: Juliana Hunt
text:
I am glad to see I am not the only one who keeps experiencing rude employees and horrible customer service. I have tried to use this location multiple times over the years. This location is close to where I live which is why I continued to go back.

Every time I go, staff is extremely rude. Even before COVID-19, this location was just plain awful. This past week was the final straw with being snapped at by employees. I had two returns to ship and had already packaged and labeled them. Literally made this process easy for them and they still managed to be nasty.

I will use the UPS on County Line Road or the one in Athens from now on and never ever go back to this one. I have had wonderful experiences at those two locations.

name: Holly Merryman
text: I read several of the 1 star reviews and realized I'm not the only one that experienced the short tempered staff that blames customers for inconvenience and are completely unwilling to help.  A surprise from a store that relies heavily on walk in customers.   A smile and a good attitude go a long way.  I wasn't the subject of complaint by said employee, but got to hear a full 15 minute rant about a previous customer that obviously only needed a little instruction. Everyone seemed to feel uncomfortable. Also, the first time I took my Amazon returns in this store, the employee was happy I had a box. She said, "Good, now I don't have to use one of mine." The next time, she dumped the contents of my box and rudely handed it to me and said. We don't need your box." Frustrating to say the least. I only continue to go here because it is conveniently located.

name: Dallas R. Wheeler
text: This place is awesome! The staff are always friendly and the service is great!

name: Jessica Babcock
text: I really liked this UPS.   They have everything you could possibly need for shipping.  You can always leave your items there and they will carefully pack and ship everything.  Located in a great spot if you need to do some errands too.

name: GINA CUMMINGS
text: The manager, Marcy, and her team are so helpful and efficient!!! Tonight Marcy reassured my nerves with shipping a large dollar item to a customer off EBay. She was so detailed with making sure the items were properly packaged and safeguarded. I will definitely use this location again! Outstanding service!!

name: Cahil Quirk
text: I have a mail box here and it is so convenient, 24/7 access and they receive my packages so I don't have worry. When I visit during regular business hours I always receive a friendly greeting and prompt service. Great group of people. Thanks

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! We strive to provide the best customer experience possible. : )

name: Fernando Escalante
text: Horrible service. The older skinny lady with short hair could work on her attitude.  The other two chubby employees were rude and nosey. I walked in for a service I was not aware I needed an appointment for. They all three started talking to me at one. I didn’t know who I was talking to. Felt like I was being kicked out. They kept telling me I needed to come back later once I had an appointment. I heard it the first time from each of you. Chill! Quit acting like you own the damn place!

name: Ellen George
text: Service is slow, even slower than the University Drive location. Definitely don't go here if you are on a time crunch because you will waste a lot of time just standing around waiting for the customers ahead of you. One bright side is this location does usually have 2 employees working the register. I came here for notary services and paid $10 for one document.

resp.text: Hello :) We do apologize there was a higher-than-normal volume of customers in our store today.  We were quite busy today since another UPS Store location was having technical difficulties and was closed. We take pride in serving each customer fairly and until their needs are met :) . We are happy we were able to complete your notary successfully today. We do charge for our notary service ($5 notoral act, $5 clerical fee), and disclose the price for the notary before we continue with the process. Please come see us again!

name: Peter Tiffany
text: The manager and staff are always courteous and helpful and have a smile ready for you.  They were very flexible about me being able to pick up some lingering mail beyond my PO box cancellation date also, which was very much appreciated.  Great experience overall.

resp.text: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate your kind words.

name: ez Zerrano
text: I am surprised there are negative reviews for this location. The people who work at this UPS store are all professional and friendly. I’ve been using their services for almost nine months now.

name: Dallas Wheeler
text: Fast and friendly staff! Very quick service considering how busy this store stays!

name: Bradley Owens
text: Excellent staff, they can ship anything from candy to furniture and even vehicle engines. They do it with a smile. I have also been able to take care of other things there as well. Printing, packaging and even have my packages held there safely when out of town.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words :)

name: Michelle Riley
text: Needed Cogent Scan fingerprinting completed. I called ahead to make sure I could get it done and was told "yes". I arrived and Laurie/Lori took care of me. She was professional, confident, and knowledgeable.  Scanning prints isn't as easy as you might think.  I relaxed and let her do her thing and I was in and out quickly.  Come here for your fingerprints. They know what they're doing!

resp.text: Michelle, Thank you for your review and allowing The UPS Store to serve you. We look forward to assisting you again.

name: Crystal Bergeron
text:
Customer service is pretty lacking here. I came to this location with multiple packages today and was initially relieved to see I was the only customer there when I first walked in. This was my first experience with returning some items from amazon where UPS will package and label the items for you and I was hoping for some guidance. Instead, the girl accepting my items just stood there looking annoyed as I fumbled through my phone to try and locate the barcodes she needed and trying to match them to the correct items. I apologized multiple times and explained that this was my first time returning this way, but there was zero attempt by her to even try to help make this uncomfortable process quicker or easier for either of us.
I also had an expensive lens that I rented and was returning. I had it already packed up in the box, which closed on its own, but still needed tape to ensure it didn’t come open in shipping. I mentioned this to her (I was more than willing to buy tape, if needed), but she just scanned the box in and put it to the side without a word. I mentioned again before leaving that I really needed to tape up the box before shipping and she unenthusiastically said that she would do it, but I did not leave this location with the warm and fuzzies that my package will make it safely to its destination. Hopefully she actually did tape it before shipping and I won’t be paying for damages. In the future, I will go somewhere that doesn’t make me feel like an inconvenience to the staff.

name: Mark Loper
text:
I took a single, one-sided document in to be scanned and put on a flash drive... $5.45!  Five dollars and 45 cents to scan a document to a flash drive??!!

To add insult to injury, the scan I got is unusable.  The original had some light shading which came out as completely black.  I should have read the reviews...

resp.text:
Hello, We apologize your experience did not go as planned in the store. We will be glad to give you a quote before we perform any service, just ask us = ) . That way you will know the price before we do the task for you. We do charge a fee for scanning the documents, emailing documents, faxing documents, and/or adding the files to storage devices..  If the quality of the documents are not coming out right, there could be a flaw in the original file you supplied. We would also be happy to address that for you and even make a correction to it.
We hope you will give us another chance in the future!

Thank you.

name: Dominick Risaliti
text: These reviews of this place must be old because the staff was extremely friendly and helped me fit my computer stand in as many combination of boxes and configurations they could to try to drop the price. And they did it all with a smile. Very happy I came here today.

resp.text:
Dominick,
Thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to leave us a POSITIVE review. Please let us know if we could ever be of assistance again. :)

name: Jessica Mitchell
text: Delivered on the correct day but delivered package to the wrong house a street over. Luckily the people who recieved it were honest, good people and brought it to us.

resp.text:
Hello I apologize you this happened! Unfortunltely we are only a 3rd Party Retailer, meaning we do not have control over the UPS "Brown Truck". We are two seperate companies, but I understand where the confusion was because our names both have UPS in them. Sometimes we have customers leaving reviews by mistake to the wrong company. We understand mistakes happen :) . You can always contact UPS and file a complaint with them.

However, if this issue occurs, please call 1-800-742-5877, to speak with a UPS Rep. They can make sure this issue is corrected appropriately :). If you need any shipping or printing done, please come see us :)

Thank you.

name: Will Fuller
text: Needed a notary service and noticed the overall poor reviews of both UPS locations in this area. First off, I’m a see for myself kind of person and very understanding because I’ve worked customer service before. The lady that assisted me was very friendly and prompt. However, the lady behind her who seemed to be the manager was pitching a fit about someone’s packing skills, slamming tape and other items around...”I don’t know how they expect this to make it...” She was the one who initially accepted the package. If it wasn’t packed properly, it should’ve been addressed before accepted. Also, her inability to maintain professionalism in front of customers shows either a lack of self awareness or a disregard for customers in general. The lady assisting me stared with a look on her face like “I know this is an issue, but there’s nothing I can do about it.” I won’t be here again unless I have to.

resp.text:
Hello, we apologize you recieved a negative experience :(. We take pride in assisting all of our customers no matter how large or small the task is!. We hope you will give us another chance in the future :)

Thank you!

name: David Cooper
text: Very convenient location ... But the staff always seem to be interested in just making it to closing time ... Especially if you are just dropping off UPS box.(edited ... Dropped another star (2018) ... Same level of service.  Location is all they have that's is really good

resp.text: Thank you for your response.

name: Cara Nall
text:
This store doesn’t offer full notary services, so suggest you take documents elsewhere. They previously questioned notarizing an approval for a background investigation, and today declined to notarize a basic medical form. I was able to go elsewhere easily but was frustrated to waste a trip. The staff at this store was professional, but don’t waste a trip if you’re coming here only for notary services in case they won’t notarize your form either.

ETA: I appreciate the owners response below, but the staff at the time declined because of the document type. They were even kind enough to provide the card for a traveling notary I could contact to come to my home. I have documents notarized routinely and am well-versed in not completing or signing documents beforehand. Thank you!

resp.text:
Hello, We apologize this happened. There could have been an issue with your form that needed to be notorized. As a Notary Public, we see a lot of customers who sign and fill out documents before they meet with us. Unfortunately at that time, we are not able to notorize that document for that reason. We will be happy to notorize your next document :). Please call us to inquire about a notory services and the type of documents we do or do not notorize, at 256-464-3700. We do sometimes refer a mobile Nptary Public in instances like this :).

Thank you. We hope to serve you again!

name: Kathy Thomas
text: This UPS store is hands down is the most knowledgeable and nicest in Huntsville.  I go out of my way to use this location over others in town.  Thank you for great service time and time again!

resp.text: We appreciate you coming into the store! We are here for all your needs with a customer friendly environment. Hopefully, we can be the first choice for your shipping, packing, and printing needs! Thank you for sharing your experience with us!

name: Britt Crittenden
text: I came in flustered...I had printed out the wrong packing slip, my boxes were too big for my items, my youngest child was going crazy....I felt like I was being a horrible customer. The ladies up front made me feel anything but a bad customer. They showed me how to send them the correct info to print off, fixed my boxes for me, and had a play area for the kids. I will bring all of my shipping needs to this store from now on. They were so friendly and helpful. And for a stressed out mom, this is exactly what I needed. Thank you!!

resp.text:
We thank you for the kind words. Come see us again! :)

Thank you.

name: Richard Schuler
text: Dropped off an Amazon return.  Less than five minutes in and out.  Very friendly staff.

name: Andy Guyette
text:
Extremely Poor rating.
The owners and management are extremely bad. We had a package that never got delivered. When I went to ask what happened, they claimed it was delivered. A week later cards and checks that were in the package were returned to us. How can that be if they delivered the package. We asked for reimbursement and they avoided us like the plague. Two weeks later we received a check for less than a 1/3 of total value. They said take it or leave it. I do not know how they are staying in business. They have the worst Customer Service Attitude of any business I ever used. I will never use them again.

resp.text: Hello! As of April 2015 The UPS Store has undergone new ownership, and our staff is ready to serve you! Please stop by our location for all your packing, shipping, and printing needs. :)

name: Angela Smith
text: Always very prompt and professional service! They do a great job!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review. Please let us know if we could ever be of assistance again.

name: Kaitlyn MacIntyre
text: Avoid this location at all costs. Slow service, employees who don’t know what they’re doing, and they charged us $10 extra per package to mail flat rate boxes, and didn’t inform us of that until we had given them all information (which took forever) and were ready to pay.

resp.text: Hello, we do apologize that we did not meet your expectations that day. I was looking in our system, but have no record of you shipping at our location, there is a possibility you may have left this review for the incorrect location. Again we apologize, we may have been very busy that day and other customers ahead of you that needed assistance. In order to give you an accurate quote on shipping, we must get all of your info in order to get an accurate quote. We give all options available when the quote is complete. We also disclose to customers that ask about Priority Mail options. Our associates explain thorughly the difference in  Standard Priority Mail and Priority Flat Rate mail. We do not provide the "Flat Rate USPS" options since we are only a 3rd parts retailer. It is a federally protected and funded program that is only available at USPS Post Office locations. We hope you will give us another chance in the future for all your printing and shipping needs!

name: Kayla Riggs
text: Can NOT say enough nice things about this business. I drive from Decatur to this location because I can rely on friendly staff and guarantee that they appreciate my business. Never had any issues and my packages have always arrived on time.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words. We appreciate your business.

name: Suzan Von Hor
text: This place has undergone a transformation. The last owners were abysmal. I just went here recently as a final resort and was amazed at the difference. Thank you for such a pleasant experience. Wishing you every success.

resp.text: We appreciate you coming into the store! We are here for all your needs with a customer friendly environment. Hopefully, we can be the first choice for your shipping, packing, and printing needs! Thank you for sharing your experience with us!

name: Kristoffer Flaherty
text: They charge additional profit margins on top of the standard USPS price for stamps. They charged me 78 cents for a 34 cent postcard stamp. When I called then on it for charging the wrong price they said it was too late they had already affixed the stamp to my postcard. This was the last time I use this establishment.

resp.text: The UPS Store is a retail store and we to charge a convenience fee on all of our postal services. We're sorry for your experience as postal services are non-refundable.

name: Ashley Lewis
text: The store on Madison Blvd need serious Customer Service re-ramp!!!! I was not greeted upon entry of the store . I approached the kiosk and instead of addressing me to my face the employee at the desk called the person in the back to come help me . This store is rude and the employees are prejudice!

resp.text:
Thank you for your review. We apologize for your experience inside the store was not to positive. We take pride on serving all of our customers. Our associates may have been performing a time sensative transaction, and asked for another associate to step in to assist customers. We train all of our associates to highest standards at the UPS Store :). We hope you will give us another chance in the future.

Thank you.

name: John Lynch
text:
I have posted my last package from this store front, and will henceforth ship via FedEx: lying to a customer is never a good decision.
1. My fault - I forgot about a holiday. So to get a critical package delivery I paid a premium to ship 3-Day select.
2. UPS fault - the critical item was mis-sorted at the delivery location and re-routed from Maine back to Massachusetts thereby missing the critical delivery date by 4-days.
3. Madison Blvd UPS store helped me complete the UPS claim form for reimbursement of the failed shipment, informing me that UPS would send reimbursement to my home address. After waiting 6-weeks with no word, I inquired at the Madison Blvd store regarding status ...
4 UPS Store fault - I was informed that UPS denied the claim as it was not filed inside the 14-day claim window. I asked for a contact at UPS. After following through with a phone call to UPS, I was informed that a claim was never filed from the UPS store.

Bottom line: UPS caused the initial delivery failure due to a mis-sorting error, and failed to stand behind their product/service using "policy" over the customer.

The UPS Store on Madison Blvd compounded the failure by failing to submit the reimbursement claim, and then lying to me directly regarding the circumstance - also failing to stand behind their product/service.

Serendipity: I am finding the FedEx facility more helpful (adding extra tape when they think it would be helpful without charging be a package fee as I was subject to elsewhere ... Read UPS store. Also, I'm finding that FedEx shipping rates are as much as $10 cheaper than I had paid at the UPS store as some destinations included a "delivery surcharge."

Thank you, FedEx!!!

-----------------------
8/23/2016 Update

Regarding the letter mentioned in the reply by Lori (store owner) I asked for a copy of that before I posted my initial review and was told it was an internal document and was not permitted to view it. And it does not change the fact that UPS told me specifically that they did not receive a claim request.

So whether the fault lies with UPS or the UPS Store, I now ship FedEx.

resp.text: Mr. Lynch, Thank you for using The UPS Store Madison. I apologize that The UPS Store and UPS did not meet your expectations. The UPS Store Madison did file a Guaranteed Service Refund (GSR) on June 17, 2016 for you. The refund was denied on June 20, 2016 by UPS not The UPS Store Madison. The reason the GSR was denied is because refunds must be requested within 15 calendar days from the date the package was delivered. We at The UPS Store (a 3rd Party Retailer) challenged the decision by UPS and the claim was still denied. We have a copy of all the paper work if you would like to come by our location to look at it. Best Regards, Lori

name: Nancy Chenault
text: The manager has serious issues and shouldn’t be in a job working with the public. She obviously hates her job and complains non stop about Amazon and  having to “feeding the monster” , her words not mine.

resp.text:
Thank you for your review. We apologize for your experience inside the store. We do have to keep a close eye on our industrial copier we have so we don't run out of paper. We do call it the monster sometimes because of its size : ). We hope we can serve you again in the future!

Thank you.

name: Kristina Tucker
text: I consistently have packages that are "delivered" that don't arrive to my house until days later.

resp.text: Hello Kristina, We do apologize you have had issues with getting your packages delivered. Unfortunately, The UPS Store is a "3rd Party Retailer." Being said, our store is not responsible for operations of the "UPS brown truck." Another possibility you are experiencing is a UPS SurePost shipping method. The SurePost option allows UPS to "deliver" the package to your local area postal service, for them finish the delivery to your estate. Once UPS delivers the package to the Postal Service, you may still get a notification it has been "delivered". Unfortunately, that would only mean it was delivered to them. With that service, processing can sometimes take 2-3 days. That is the most common issue with that particular service, It is always best to verify with the shipper as to what shipping method they have used for your package. With that being said, The UPS Store can offer a guaranteed delivery date and time for packages that we send out of our store! If you would like more information, please give us a call or stop by. We look forward to seeing you!

name: Angela Graham
text:
This UPS Store is a joke. Employees are rude and unknowledgeable. The store is so messy, it should be condemned.

Avoid at all costs if you need anything more than a place to drop off packages.

resp.text:
Thank you for your review. We apologize for your experience inside the store. We may have been rather busy that day with other customers on top of training our new associates for the day. You may have came in on the day that our "Industrial Shippers" came in and we were packing their very heavy equipment. We tend to have several things going on at once when performing those tasks, but we always ensure a clean store for safety of our customers and employees. We hope we can serve you again soon! :)

Thank you.

name: James French
text: Staff a bit overwhelmed with customer visits.  Super nice.

resp.text:
Thank you for the review. Yes, we have been rather busy lately, but we are always happy to serve our customers any way we can : ).

Thank you!

name: Chanarda Murray
text: Customer Service is horrible! I had a booklet binded and the lady didn't take her time to do it correct. She punched the holes wrong and had the nerve to tell me she could make it work, which it it did not work. I went back to the store three times to get it done correctly, and the last time I was there she basically did NOT want to take responsibility for what she did wrong. The customer service is horrible and RUSHED! I will not be going back, I think three times is enough!

resp.text: The UPS Store staff sincerely apologizes, that you feel our customer service skills were not up to par. However, the young associate did admit to punching the holes wrong on Saturday, and tried to the best of her ability to correct the problem. She also told us that she became very nervous after punching the cover page of your book wrong, which may have lead you to believe she was in a hurry. She also told us that you came back a 2nd time on Saturday, because you thought the coil was not installed correctly and replaced the coil for you, even though she felt like there was nothing wrong with coil binding that she had done. You called on Monday morning to complain about your Church -Songs of Inspiration Book. The associate on the phone happily reprinted you a NEW Song Book (that you emailed to the store); rebound your book with a clear cover, blue back cover and a new coil bind at NO CHARGE. The associate on the phone did all of this without even seeing the book that was supposedly not correct. When you came in on Monday the NEW book was ready for you. We do realize that you encountered the same associate again on Monday when you came back into the store. We do wish that you would have asked for a manager to review the book that you felt was not correctly complete. We hope that you would give us another chance in the future.

name: David McCollum
text: Use this place a lot, always friendly and fast service

resp.text: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate your kind words.

name: Shanika Ogburn
text: Friendly staff and quick service.

resp.text: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate your kind words.

name: Alberto Bartolomei
text: The staff oriented me wrong about a shipping and gave me unlawful information.  Need better informed staff about shipping procedures. They only care about selling. I don't recommend this store to no one.

resp.text: We apologize for the inefficient knowledge you may have received when you came to visit the store. We have changed ownership of the store and have a new fully knowledgeable staff as of April 2015. We invite you to come and experience the new environment.  We want to make it easier to take care of your printing, packing, and shipping needs!

name: Paul Gerhart
text: Constantly changing staff that is missing sufficient training to accomplish simple tasks.

resp.text: We apologize for the service(s) you may have received at the time of your visit. We have completely changed ownership of the store, not just associates, and have a new fully trained staff as of April 2015. We invite you to come and experience the new environment.  We are dedicated to making it easier to fulfill your shipping, packing, and printing needs!

name: M&L Treasures
text: Just left this store after waiting 10 min to simply drop off a pkg that only required logging in and giving me a receipt. I will avoid this location in the future.

resp.text: I apologize that you had to wait in line for 10 minutes. We must have been rather busy that day.

name: Karin S
text: I avoid this location due to its bad service. I paid to ship a package overnight, Saturday delivery. When the recipient didn’t get the package I checked tracking and it wasn’t put on a truck even though I sent it before the pickup deadline. Then it was like pulling teeth to get my refund. Staff was rude and unhelpful.

resp.text:
Hello we are sorry this happened to you! We ensure that all of our packages leave the store daily with the drivers. We do a walkthrough with them. There could have been an issue with the UPS company in which your package could have been delayed. Us, beaing a pack and ship center, could have filed a claim with UPS for a delayed delivery and could have had UPS reimburse you for the loss. Unfortunately, I have looked through data and did not see that you had requested one :(. We hope to serve you again in the future :)

Thank you.

name: Antana Martinez
text: Before we moved here we set up a Personal Mail Box & did address changes.  We still have that PMB. Also, I have had other services done like laminating, copies, passport photos, fingerprints.

resp.text: Antana, Thank you for your review and allowing The UPS Store to serve you. We look forward to assisting you again.

name: Thomas Heckwolf
text: The store by target tapes boxes for returns for free. This store wants to charge a $1.00 to tape up a box. A whole roll of box tape cost $2.99

resp.text: We apologize for the inconvenience you may have received! This store has undergone new ownership as of April 2015. Our change in policies are geared towards providing positive customer service! We no longer charge for taping up boxes on drop offs. Please come visit us again!

name: Matthew Jones
text: Fast, friendly service.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. We really appreciate it!

name: Tom Barker
text: Super nice people, very helpful.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words :)

name: Kevin Fischer
text: I had the worst experience with this store and ups. They will say anything to avoid paying for there mistakes. I am done with UPS. I WILL NOT SHIP THROUGH THEM AGAIN.

resp.text: Kevin, I apologize for your bad experience with UPS. UPS denied your claim based on insufficient packing materials. You had a very large 80 pound box and the packing material you used was paper. The weight of your inner box crushed the paper causing the inner box to slide around inside of the larger box. UPS denied the claim for that purpose. For future you could allow The UPS Store to pack your items and then you would be protected by the Pack and Ship Guarantee.

name: Crystal Webb
text: Rep Marci is an extremely rude and snapped at my husband because his phone died and she couldn't scan and forcefully handed the package back to him.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We apologize for your experience inside the store.

name: David Vestal
text: Awesome service!

resp.text: :) We thank you for the kind words!!

name: Joshua Thurston
text: Beware if you want something notarized it is $10 per document! Even though I didn’t ask and should have they did not mention that their fee was so high!

resp.text: Hello we do apologize you didn't have a positive experience : (. Yes, there is a $5.00 Notary fee, and a $5.00 clerical fee for this service, so the total does add to $10.00. Our notaries go through extensive trainig. Please come and see us or call for any questions concerning notaries :)

name: philip ballou
text: Good service

resp.text: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate your kind words.

name: Robert Barinowski
text: Don't put up that you have extended hours when you don't.

resp.text: We apologize for the inconvenience of the store hours. We extended business hours the week prior to the Holiday week. Hours of operation reverted back to normal business hours on Monday 12/21 through the holidays. We apologize the website may have not updated as swiftly as we like. Please come by and see us to confirm store hours!

name: MARY GOMES
text: I luckily walked in at the right time because this facility is popular and was booked up but I was able to get a 5x10 that fit my needs perfectly. The staff was extremely helpful making sure I had full access on moving items in on a stressful day. I utilized the month needed and made sure I cleared everything out. Turning in my access card was quick and easy while staff did check to make sure nothing was left.

name: Nesse Nichols
text: Manager was nice and informative. But I didn't like how he tried to give me misinformation.  Told me if I brought it back after hours I would be charged a $20 fee. But on the site it said if I checked it back in on the mobile site, it was no charge, if I checked in with a rep, it would be a charge. I challenged his wording and started to show the site and email then he adjusted his words. I've done this a few times so I know the routine.

name: Robbie Forbes
text:
Hours said open at 9 am on Sunday. We arrived before 9 am and stayed till 9:15 am where no phone calls were answered, no knocks on the door were heard, and probably nobody was there while my family and 2 others cars were waiting outside.
Was not well received professionally.
We cut our loses with this U-haul facilities staff, unhitched the trailer, and left it in their parking lot.
I suggest you do the same if you encounter a similar situation with them.

Reattempted to call the office again at 9:28 to notify we left the trailer, but still no answer.

name: Richard Daniels
text: Rob answered all my questions. Helped me with equipment options and was very courteous.

name: pat crayton
text: Great customer service. I was pleased from the time I walked through the door and the transaction.

name: TN_Bob57
text: The U-Haul service/courtesy/professionalism of the owner at this location (Rob?) is absolutely fantastic. There are several locations nearer to me but I'd go back to this one in a heartbeat. I've never used the storage so I can't rate that.

name: Carmen Williamson
text: Great service and very courteous, polite

name: Christopher Thorne
text: Pretty good place for storage....

name: Tia Wheeler
text: I have rented from here at least 6 times and have always gotten first rate service.

name: LaNae R
text: I returned a truck & tow to this location after moving from another state. First, I received a text directing me to another Uhaul location on Sparkman. However, while enroute, I received a second text redirecting me to this location. Rob was awesome! He was friendly, professional & quick. I really appreciate the great customer service I received today. If I'm in need of such services again, I will go this location if possible because Rob is on point! Thanks again!

name: Nikee Smith
text: This place use to be very good to rent storage and uhaul trucks from. I’ve had storage with them for over 8 years. It is under new ownership with Joe and Carolyn Davenport. Joe Davenport has no customer service skills what’s so ever. I rented a Uhaul truck from them and when I opened the truck, it was full of adult and baby roaches. I was in a time constraint with moving so we killed them and kept going. The more we loaded the truck the more roaches came out. I shared the information with Joe Davenport when returning the truck in which his response was “Did you bring the roaches with you?” and “People in Alabama have roaches all the time!”. This response was so unprofessional in which he continued to make smart unprofessional remarks without providing a solution.  I gave them one star so that I could leave a review, they deserve no stars do not waste your money here. Do better Davenport’s!!! Be professional with your customers!!!

name: TG Green
text: Good Customer Service, often the storage unit was blocked with trucks and other Equipment

name: F. Slate
text: Good people running it, trucks was great. We just were charged for a dolly we didn't request or use. That's our only complaint.

name: A Cross
text: Used them several times and have never had an issue. Very easy to work with. Uhaul is pricey but at least they have good service.

name: Benita Brazelton
text: If people are respectable and you keep it nice and clean where's a good place to store your stuff

name: Terry Boatwright
text: Rude and not very helpful.  Was there to drop off a trailer and was told that the trailer rental came with a free month of storage.  Then was told that I would have to buy one of their padlocks or go get one of the same style, and that if I did use the padlock that I brought with me, they would cut it off and replace it with one of theirs and charge me for it!  I knew right then that I did not want to do business with these people.

name: Nicholas Burton
text: One of the worst decision I have ever made. The office slacks competency and customer service. Please take heed your business will be appreciated elsewhere! I will never trust this location or the Uhaul Company with ANYTHING!!!!!!

name: Christy Eggleston
text: Parking is nonexistent.. But They do get you in and out if you just pick up or drop off a truck

name: Leah Moss
text: Fruendly and courteous service, truck was right size and ready when we arrived!

name: Doris Matthews
text: Great prices and availability and services ☺️

name: Terry Wellington
text: Had a truck call another place didn't have one

name: Jo Wa
text: Friendly customer service by the Owners!

name: Co Co
text: Fast courteous service.

name: Timia Harris
text: They are rude they don't tell you everything. They over charge you and will not give your money back.

name: Maryann Hockman
text: Van was great, service and was wonderful

name: Kathy Mccaulley Clemons
text: Great service nice people

name: Benita Brazelton
text: Nice people nice and Cleaner

name: Samantha Tomlin
text: Very helpful

name: Cris Thompson
text: Helpful & courteous

name: Crystal Ray
text: Great service

name: Paul Micheletto
text: The BEST!!!

name: Mistie Malinowski
text: very friendly

name: Kenya Taylor
text: Good

name: Shane McCandless
text: They don't have dollys available and will act like it is not there problem. Had to spend 30 minutes on phone with customer service to address this issue. Tessa on the phone transferred me without even talking to me. This is absurd. I recommend trying another location or hiring a moving company....less trouble.

name: Kathryn Howard
text: We were supposed to pick up a truck from a different location, self pickup. When we got there and attempted to do it the system told us to go to the desk. That location was closed until TUESDAY!   We went to this location and Brian was able to help us get a truck in a timely fashion and was great about it. He even tried to help cancel the other reservation. Next time we need a truck I will be going to this location and hope Brian will be there again.   Thank you so much Brian.

name: C. Albert Bardi
text: Just returned a trailer that I rented for 24hrs.  I went online and bought the ball that was recommended for my suv/hitch,and a 7-to-4 wire adapter.  When I showed yesterday, the guy was friendly and helpful.  Bummer, but my suv didn’t play nice with the LED adapter I bought at auto zone or even a trailer with LED lights.  Smart dude figured it out right away though, and gave me a little older (no LED) but larger trailer at same rate that worked like a charm.  He also lent me an adapter at no charge!  A different guy helped at drop off and was super friendly.  Great all around.  One word to the wise: my pads and appliance dolly that I reserved didn’t show up on his computer at pick up, and I forgot about them (but lived without them). So if you reserve online you might want to double check that your extras are included when you pay.

name: Taylor M
text: SPARE YOURSELF and visit the location on University Drive (VERY FRIENDLY & HELPFUL). I ended up getting supplies from both locations in preparation for my move however rented a truck from the Governor's drive location. The manager and "assistant mgr" lack customer service skills and any question or request is an inconvenience to them. Upon arrival, they didn't acknowledge my existence in the store. I stood there for 5-10 minutes  while they were on the computer (no one else was in the store). Not even a simple hello, or I'll be right with you. They have no desire to help with an issue or concerns you may have. Furthermore, they put the incorrect return location on the truck which was a huge inconvenience. The University Drive location may be busy, but at least they are friendly and are willing to help.

name: Lee Anna Wright
text: Have been going here to fill up propane.  Today was met with the rudest service ever received anywhere.  After requesting service, he kept saying "I don't know what to tell you".  Ended up saying he didn't want our business.  Never again.  Hoping to contact the owner/manager next week.

name: LaNae R
text: I had a really good experience renting from this location for my out of state move. First, I reserved the wrong size truck. So I had to return to the location for a larger size. They were professional & very accommodating. After the truck was loaded, I returned to the location so they could attach my vehicle tow. Thanks for the great service!

name: Amy Hamlett
text: So disappointed. Made my appointment and paid for it. Tried to call all week, could never get an answer. Showed up for my appointment, the guy at the desk looked shock. Told me he couldn't do it. I live an hour away and took off work to get this done, they didn't even call me! The guy spoke to me like I was nothing and that I inconvenienced him by showing up. Never again going to this horrible place.

name: Jim Keel
text: Staff were deep in maskless conversation with each other while checking in, had me check myself in online. Was given the most dilapidated trailer I've ever received from U-Haul for a 17 hour interstate move. Trailer full of dirt and debris. I realized this trailer doesn't have d-rings on the floor in each corner and requested a trailer that does because the only item I'm hauling is a motorcycle (there were 5 other trailers of the same size lined up beside this one). Agent stated that this is the next trailer on the list to go out so...... I'm stuck pulling a beat trailer 17 hours with an extra hour of set up time to get the bike properly secured using the wall stakes (and hoping they don't fail). I rent from U-Haul somewhat frequently and almost always find outstanding customer service. Disappointed here though

name: Lori Diamond
text:
We had an appointment for two weeks, to have a trailer hitch put on my car. They knew we were out of town, over an hour away, and did not have the COMMON COURTESY to call and let me know that they did not have the parts. I asked when he thought he might have them, he’s response was “I’ve been waiting on something’s since December.”
Bad business!! Be professional and pick up the phone at let someone know something!

name: Bobbie
text: I had a problem with the U Haul on Drake.  I went to the main office on Governors.  They turned my day around.  Thank you guys for your diligent work fixing my problems with a smile.

name: William Lovett
text: They set an appointment for 7:15am, store doesn't open until 8am. when I call to make sure they gave me the right time, they said store is open from 7am-8pm. Then after showing up at 6:55am and waiting until 7:20am. I called and they said they don't open until 8am. Taking my money somewhere else.

name: Jeremy Owen
text: These guys are awsome. Helped me in so many ways. The guys that work behind the counter need a raise.

name: Doris Price
text: Great assistance at Huntsville AL Employee Creed gave excellent customer service.

name: Lianna Pabon
text: This uhaul business location on governor's drive has always been very helpful and I have never had any issues at all with them.  I'll continue to come back to this location as I always have and will recommend them to others also!

name: patton fussell
text:
HORRIBLE! Everything about my experience at this Uhaul location was a nightmare. I rented a trailer and upon taking it back, I shared with the representative that my truck had damage on the back side. He jumped on his phone and FaceTimed his boss while walking around the trailer to see if there was any damage. He could have cared less about my truck. Even so, he says, “no sir there’s no damage.” I had a witness riding with me that saw and heard the whole thing as well. Quickly after that I was rushed out the door to avoid any more questions about my truck. A month later, I receive a $1300 bill for damages to the trailer!!! I was stunned and figured it must have been a mistake.
Upon calling Uhaul corporate office, they told me the general manager was unaware I received a letter with charges and to be expecting a call from him. I did receive a call expecting an apology and info on what they planned on doing for my truck. Instead, he all of a sudden knew all about it(even though he wasn’t even there) and blamed me! I’ve been in a dispute for a month and it has taken so much time and it’s been awful. Do yourself a favor, and DO NOT utilize their services. You’ll regret it.

name: John Eells
text: Got a dirty truck full of leaves and such.  No biggie. The back was a bit dirty too. Mostly things that blew in from trees.  I swept it all out front and back and it was returned much cleaner than I got it.  They bothered to sneak in a $25 cleaning fee.  I’ve never earned a cleaning fee in my life. Luckily I caught it before leaving and they reversed it after about a week. If not for the attempted scam it would have been 4 or 5 stars.

name: Clint F.
text: Installed trailer hitch! They had factory installation instructions issue that took extra time to resolve. Chris credited my account back some money for the extra wait time without even asking. Great service.

name: matt barber
text: Entered the store to purchase moving supplies. No one was at counter. Made my selection while waiting for a representative to show up. About 5 minutes after being in the store with it entirely unattended I walked into the back area-found no one. Another client had since walked in to join the wait. Finally found a maintenance man outside who miraculously found 2 representatives. They never apologized about the wait time. They did not thank me for my patronage. Most importantly, anyone passerby off the street could have stolen a number of things during this entire ordeal. Horrible business practices and terrible customer service.

name: Matthew Wilson
text: I changed my previous one star review because Chris Holman took the time to fix the billing error by sitting down with me.  He impressed me with his helpfulness.  Would have rated higher but I had to take extra time to fix the problem.

name: V Lipscova
text: Came here just to buy a moving blanket or furniture cover -- the ones made out of recycled denim -- and the cashier had to count the entire cash register drawer just to take my cash payment. Very inconvenient. Not sure I'd go here again.

name: Britton Lynn
text:
When I picked up the trailer it was covered in dust and dirt on the inside. Then after I turned it back in I looked at my credit card bill and learned they charged me for $155 worth of boxes, plastic bubble wrap and all sorts of moving supplies??? I called and they told me to talk to customer service after being on the phone then they told me the GM would call me. If you want Uhaul to commit fraud and steal money from you then this is the place to go. I would HIGHLY suggest other locations.

It’s shocking that I never even signed this receipt they emailed me of stuff they charged me for and yet they are still charging me. I mean do they not have cameras to see me walking in and out of the store with no boxes????

name: regina jackson
text: Expected to have been worked with seeing as to though I left five minutes before and my address the bottom flooded and was notified as I’m driving away from the store turned around and asked to return even offered to pay the mileage and gas! But the boss has nothing for you smh

name: Carly D
text: Scheduled a pick up for tomorrow and just called to confirm my pickup. Tammy at governors informed my pickup was moved to Uncle Bobs storage on highway72 west. 1. I was not notified about the location change. 2. I live in South Huntsville. 3. Tammy hung up on me.

name: Ellen Montgomery
text: They gave us a horrible truck,  absolutely no steering!  VERY DANGEROUS! We had to drive from Huntsville, AL to Oceanside, CA!  I am not impressed at all with this company! Check your vehicles before you rent them out for an outrageous price to your customers! Horrible! We are a military family and we will be spreading the word that U-Haul is NOT the company to use or rely on! We are very open minded people,  we don't usually write negative reviews, I hope this helps future personnel and the problem is addressed. Thank you for your time and reviewing this.

name: Jonathan Pongetti
text: Employees were very helpful. No complaints.

name: Scott Chartier
text: Terrible Experience. Didn't have what I rented, staff was rude with no help given, no follow up. Go somewhere else if possible.
