text:
(Translated by Google) If you need to move, this is definitely the right place, there is EVERYTHING, and the attention is great

(Original)
Si necesitas mudarte, definitivamente este es el lugar indicado, hay de TODO, y la atención es genial

name: R T
text: I went by there to find out the cost to mail something simple 9 x 6 envelope with papers enclosed. I was given a price of $4.36 to mail it. I asked what the store store was (Surcharge) and the lady did not know. I left and did not mail it there. I took it to the post office downtown Decatur, Alabama and the Total cost was only $2. What kind of extra charges is this place charging?

name: Kris Small
text: I've never once been asked what I am shipping ever by any company. I was attempting to ship some very valuable items to my brother in Ca. today and was asked what I was shipping, I stated personal items nothing hazardous. She asked me to describe the item.... that's how they figure out what packages to steal I guess.  because I've had plenty of packages go missing in the mail. if it's hazardous sure I understand but it's not and not on the prohibited list. so they don't need to know. I'll take it to UPS or Fedex next time directly.

name: Joey Anderson
text: I am very impressed with this store and their employees. I was greated before I made it completely through the door. The staff is upbeat and professional. They were able to service all of my needs and super knowledgeable. I will definately be going back. Thank you for such a wonderful experience.

name: Jason Jameson
text: Amazing store, most polite employees, FedEx shipping. Ignore other reviews where people are not posting honest information. The Shipping Store & More offers FedEx shipping and has amazing employees!

name: Jay Boyd
text: The employees are very friendly and helpful at this esablishment. I am exteremly satisfied with their professionalism and expertise. I appreciate their services and friendly smiles.

name: Glen Hunter
text: The 2 clerk's working today were very helpful and professional and handled my packing and shipping needs very quickly. I would definitely recommend this store for all your packing and shipping needs.

name: Bill Jehle
text: As the chief cook and bottle washer of my own business, the kind folks at The Shipping Store are my staff. I could not run my business without them. Shipping and receiving, not a problem. Notary, not a problem. Photocopies, packing material, anything an average office would need, not a problem. Blueprints, full-sized plans that require a plotter, again, not a problem. Plus, it's great to walk in and folks know me by name. Let The Shipping Store be your secret weapon to make your life or business life a little bit easier.

name: Captain_Redpill
text: Won't be going back to this place ever.  The lady working there completely refused to serve me.  Went two miles down the road and had the service performed at the ups store,  without question.   Continue to watch your business fail.

name: Alexa Womack
text: Such a welcoming store! I was greeted by every person in the store upon entering and leaving. They were even willing to get my package ready to go even though it was UPS. I was only there for a few minutes but I really felt that the employees enjoyed their job! Definitely recommend using them.

name: Brian Moran
text: I have to say that I've never been taken care of in the way this team takes care of my needs. As a small business person myself, I appreciate the attention to detail, warm environment, and sincerity I receive when I walk into with The Shipping Store. I've read some of the other reviews and I would have to say that their prices are very fair. They provide a service that I have not seen matched with other big company chain stores. It is an absolute pleasure to do business with these guys!

name: Sandra Austin
text: Anytime I mail from here it takes many days for the package to get anywhere.

name: Christina Morse
text: The employees at The Shipping Store were super friendly and helpful! They did everything they could to save me money on shipping. If you have anything to ship, I would definitely recommend The Shipping Store. They made shipping a breeze!

name: Jennifer Melcher
text: We took in a fragile item and they packed it for us wonderfully. They were super nice and not just to us but to everyone that came in. They also showed us ways they could help our small business save money on shipping and printing. We will definitely use again!

name: John Wallace
text: They do not ship fedex, waste of my, yours and everyone's time.  Fedex sign in window, rude lady behind the counter..DO NOT GO HERE IF YOU ARE TRYING TK SHIP A FEDEX PACKAGE, FALSE ADVERTISEMENT..!!!!!

name: jose villa
text: Waste of time they say they ship fedex but they don't they are limited so you have to go to the one in Madison. Why even call it the ship in store where they can't ship nothing

name: susan hassett
text: I have used The Shipping Store for many years to mail packages, have copies made and faxes sent. I appreciate the professional and friendly staff. Their packaging services help me save time and enable me to send packages hassle-free.

name: Tracy Roberson
text: The staff are always professional and courteous when I bring things in to have shipped.  I wish the same was true of USPS. The Shipping Store has never lost any of my parcels with the many dealings I have had with the business. You can probably guess who has. I will continue to bring my business here as long as they are here. Thank you.

name: Jenna Burfield
text:
Store staff was very rude. TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE!! I brought in a package to be shipped and asked for documentation stating that I dropped a the package off. The lady behind the counter stated that if I wanted a receipt that I could wait until FedEx picked it from their location and scanned the barcode (who is to say they wouldn't loose my package) or I could drive to Madison.

Edited to inform that I was able to take my package to Walgreens for drop off. The Walgreens staff were friendly and promptly emailed me a recept for my records. THERE IS ABSOLUTELY NO EXCUSE for the pushback I received when I asked for a simple drop off receipt from The Shipping Store.

name: Mary McMahan
text: Amanda saved me from losing my $4900.00 ring to a scammer on Craigslist.  I am so grateful to her and to this store for hiring her.  This experience has brought renewed faith that there are still people who work for businesses that genuinely care about their customers !!  Amanda, you are an angel, I will always be grateful for you and I pray blessings upon you and your family !!  The Shipping Store....don't ever let her go !!!!!

name: Laron Hardy
text: Great people, great service!  The Shipping Store is a place where you will be taken care of.  Great folks!

name: AK Lee
text: They offer a great service and and I even paid for the tape it was worth it

name: L D
text: Way overpriced. $0.75/each for stamps! Their shipping costs are also astronomical. I went there to ship a package and was quoted an amount so high that I thought it was a joke. It wasn't. I then went to Staples right down the street to get a quote from their shipping center and it was 50% less. Stay away from this place!

resp.text:
Jill,

Firstly, thank you for patronizing our business.  We take great pride in our friendly, high level of customer service.  As to your comments about our service charges,  If we weren't able to realize some level of margin over our costs, we would not be able to maintain a viable business or be able to offer the level of service that we so pride ourselves in.

Thanks sincerely,
Don Cantrell
The Shipping Store and more...

name: cassandra chittam
text: Closest shipping place to our company.  We will be driving the extra distance to find an actual post office from now on.  Pricing is extremely high to send out items USPS.  When I called asking why they charged my assistant 10.74 for a small FLAT RATE box, I was told they do not honer flat rate shipping.  I then asked why did they not inform my assistant of this and they stated because all she said was she needed to ship these items. The lady behind the counter didn't know what she was doing.  First time she rang up the bill the total came to $4000 for USPS shipping. Wanting to use USPS services for your packages stay away from this place unless you want to pay double what you would if you went to the post office.

resp.text:
Ms. Chittam,
Firstly thank you for patronizing our store.  We take great pride in deliverying friendly, high quality goods and services.  As to your comments about USPS flat rate boxes, we do not offer them as they simply aren't big enough for average small shipments.   Per your comment about the cash register misring, we are sorry but we as humans are not infallable.  Fortunately, our system will catch any errors before the transaction is complete.  We apologize for the momentary delay.   Regarding your comment that our USPS prices are double the Post Office,  yes, we do charge a nominal service charge to cover our overhead and the ability to maintain a viable business thereby offering our customers a level of service they might not realize at the Post Office.    In fact many of our USPS prices are actually lower than the Post Office as we realize volume discounts that an individual would be unable to quality for.

Thank you again for your comments.
Sincerely,
Don Cantrell
President,
The Shipping Store and more...

name: Daryl Piner
text: Excellent service and very friendly people who will go the extra mile to help you.  I reccomend this place to everyone.

name: Lee Bates
text: Always friendly service and they do the job right. I drive extra miles for this quality.

name: Elise van zandt
text: A+++ service! Very friendly staff and super helpful!

name: Rodrigo Banzon
text: Excellent service.  Outstanding staff!

resp.text: Thank you. We take great pride in our level and quality of service.

name: Brenda Caudle
text: Fast and friendly service. The cost was higher than expected.

name: Misty Myres
text: Very rude staff. I called ahead to verify all details and was told something different when I got there leaving me to rush to FedEx in Madison to ship my packages.

resp.text:
Ms. Myres,
Firstly, thank you for patronizing our business.  We pride ourselves in deliverying friendly,  high quality goods and services.  However, we are unable to access your or any other customers FedEx account number to charge shipping to.  We gladly accept FedEx prepaid packages at no charge, which have the shipping label already affixed.  Otherwise we are glad to create a label for you for which there would be a charge.

Respectfully,
Don Cantrell
The Shipping Store and more...

name: Karla Gibson
text: People were Very nice and helpful.  Thank you!

name: John Buckelew
text: I use them for my mailbox, shipping, and FAX service. Professional in every way. Very friendly.

name: Jim Nichols
text: Its like when Butch said to Sundance, "Who ARE those guys?"

name: Rodney Scott
text: Had a legal document that had to be handled asap and the store more than exceeded.

name: Teresa Hutto
text: They are great people!!!

name: David R
text: Great ppl.. Reasonable prices and extremely nice.

name: Alex Kh
text: Fast loading time! Nice and friendly people!

name: Juan Alvarez
text: Friendly people good materials honest been in business forever wow my kind of place

name: Adam garrison
text: So cheap, and good lumber! Good people

name: Pamela Hampton jones
text: Very nice people.. And the $r great

name: Ronnie Taylor
text: Great Place to buy Lumber see Stan 2atdon Sr.or Jr

name: Bruce Spain
text: Loved looking for a new home there.

name: Rodney Hopkins
text: Good folks

name: Mediocre Photography
text: Off and on service.  Most times it is quick and easy drop offs for me.  One time I was told I had to buy the tape to tape my package up (they had always taped it for me).. So I bought an entire roll of package tape just for that one instance.  Most times the employees are friendly and helpful... But there is a young girl there that isn't friendly and gives one the sense of rudeness just in her lack of personality.  Oh well, thanks to Amazon's new set up that allows me to drop things off without a label, my experiences have been good ones.  🤗

resp.text: Thank you so much for the feedback! We definitely always want to try to have a smile on our faces when our customers walk through the door. Several new employees have started recently for the holiday rush so we apologize if you've experienced anything at all negative or unpleasant. We will be sure to remind all of our employees to keep a positive attitude towards everyone who walks into our store. Thank you!

name: Nathon Roden
text: I have no idea how ups is in other parts of the country but when it hits ft.payne it is the absolute worst shipping company ever. Swear they don't update tracking there 70% of the time. They constantly miss "scheduled delivery time" its so bad I've convinced my company to no longer use them and instead we ship FedEx. I swear I wish Amazon would make FedEx an option.

name: Jess Medley
text:
I had a package sent to Colorado that was time sensitive. I was assured it would be fine and to just let them take care of it. The package ended up getting lost, spent almost a month trying “to locate it”, and then redeliver to the correct address. The people that work at this location do not seem very knowledgeable about their jobs and were of no help, and very rude at that! The shipment was ruined by the time it was actually delivered and when I contacted them to see if I could at least get my money back for the shipping, or anything for that matter, they were extremely rude.
I recommend USPS or The Package Store! Anywhere but here!

name: Mariah Keith
text:
Unexceptable customer service!
Rude seasoned employee and improperly trained "new" one.  Listed as an Amazon no print return drop off facility however they are unable to scan the Amazon generated return label and want to charge you $2.33 for another. Waited for 10+ minutes for them to receive the label that was sent directly to their verified email twice. Asked about alternative options - none. Walked out and took the package to the local "Package Store" in and out in under 2 minutes free off charge.

name: david walker
text: The folks working there were friendly enough.  But I took a file by on Friday afternoon to be printed in book form on better paper stock than normal bond.  This is for an instructional manual for my office.  The printing is fine.  But when I got it back to my office and tried to add it to my 3-ring binder, the holes they punched would not work.  They're not standard.  On top of that, they punched the last 3 chapters and the index completely backwards.  My last time to use The UPS Store for anything.

resp.text: Mr. Walker, thank you for bringing this to our attention.  I am sorry that we did not do a good job.  If you will, let us reprint and punch the holes properly.  We checked the hole puncher and did find it out of adjustment.  It has been fixed.  We are sorry that this has happened.  Thank You.

name: Screw Rti
text: I ordered something that was expensive. My time frame window was between 9-1pm. I have stated home all day to insure the package was not left out too long due to I live in apartments. It’s nearly 5 and the package has not been delivered. These guys really need to stick to there quotes they give people. I’ve wasted my whole day waiting. I will not be using this service again if I can help it.

name: SHARRON “SHERRIE” BANNISTER
text:
I dont recommend this business, I was over charged, given terrible quality photos and was expected to keep.  She refused to make it right, would not give refund.  I wish I could show a picture of the items that I was charged for.

Update:
The owner contacted me and offered a complete refund.   I really appreciate that he was kind and understanding.   He asked for a copy to show the employees at that location the errors that were made.  I believe Larry is an honest business man and he deserves another chance.

resp.text:
Dear Sharron Bannister,

Firstly, we’d like to extend our most sincere condolences on the loss of your loved one. We can’t begin to know exactly what you're dealing with, and we extend our thoughts and prayers to you and your family during this trying time.

Concerning the event in question, we’re both sorry and surprised to hear of the negative experience you had at our store. As we all know, everyone has their own unique take on any given situation, and we’d just like to briefly give ours, so that we are all on the same page. When we assisted the customer on the day in question, we had the customer review and approve the print before moving forward. We do this to ensure that all of our customers are satisfied with the quality before we start running the job, as once we’ve begun, we cannot make adjustments and have already begun incurring costs.

In this case, seeing as the customer reviewed and approved a proof, we simply did not know there was even a concern until your family began leaving several reviews, all of which tell a different story than what we experienced, and candidly, we understand. This is a difficult time for all, and we can absolutely understand how difficult of a time this must be. We're dedicated to not only provided excellent products with equally excellent service, but we’re committed to being a part of the community, and we would never ask a customer to accept a product they weren’t happy with. Had we known there were issues with the prints prior to customer approval, or with the finished product when they were reviewed when you returned to pick them up, we would have done and will do everything possible to rectify this for you, and we’re committed to doing so again in the future.

Your feedback is important to us, and it doesn’t fall on deaf ears.
Thank You,
Larry Stephens

name: Bo Doeg
text: Only use this location if it is last ditch, while the atmosphere was comfortable and quiet the only thing these folks are interested in is how fast they can take your money. The young lady working the counter was rude and completely unhelpful. She had an air if disdain when I asked any questions as if it was just too much to bear. I asked for a next day shipment and was given a regular label. When I asked she just told me that I was doing ok. When I finished the label o asked if that was all I needed to do to get next day shipping, she got upset that I hadn't made it clear I wanted next day shipping. I clearly asked twice for a next day label. Over all I would use the USPS from now on, it is a small wonder that anything gets shipped from this location. This UPS store had garbage service. Customers BEWARE!

name: Logan LeGrande
text: Overpriced and management is rude to employees

name: Kevin Adams
text: So very sad that people choose to make money wrongfully, off the death of others family members. My sisters and I Went to the UPS store in Fort Payne to have some obituary cards printed of our deceased parents, the lady at the counter only let me print one copy and then made copies of that making all but the original very poor quality. On one family members cards the owner mistakenly forgot to turn the paper and double printed over the first copy making it completely impossible to read, but laminated over it anyway and charged me for the unreadable copy. Even worse blamed me for the error even though she was the only one with access to the printer which was behind the counter. Great way to run a business, blaming the customer for your error and even worse selling a product that was meant to be a gift that can’t even be read. When my sister took the cards back to the store the owner refused to try to make it up or even give a  refund while screaming and insulting my sister. A very expensive lesson since we were over charged to begin with and still are without the obituary cards. This is a very dishonest way of doing business, not worthy of anyone’s business. We will never do business with that store again.

resp.text:
Dear Kevin Adams,

Firstly, we’d like to extend our most sincere condolences on the loss of your loved one. We can’t begin to know exactly what you're dealing with, and we extend our thoughts and prayers to you and your family during this trying time.

Concerning the event in question, we’re both sorry and surprised to hear of the negative experience you had at our store. As we all know, everyone has their own unique take on any given situation, and we’d just like to briefly give ours, so that we are all on the same page. When we assisted the customer on the day in question, we had the customer review and approve the print before moving forward. We do this to ensure that all of our customers are satisfied with the quality before we start running the job, as once we’ve begun, we cannot make adjustments and have already begun incurring costs.

In this case, seeing as the customer reviewed and approved a proof, we simply did not know there was even a concern until your family began leaving several reviews, all of which tell a different story than what we experienced, and candidly, we understand. This is a difficult time for all, and we can absolutely understand how difficult of a time this must be. We're dedicated to not only provided excellent products with equally excellent service, but we’re committed to being a part of the community, and we would never ask a customer to accept a product they weren’t happy with. Had we known there were issues with the prints prior to customer approval, or with the finished product when they were reviewed when you returned to pick them up, we would have done and will do everything possible to rectify this for you, and we’re committed to doing so again in the future.

Your feedback is important to us, and it doesn’t fall on deaf ears.
Thank You,
Larry Stephens

name: Wendy Rosen
text: This UPS Store is the most hatefully, rude, disrespectful bunch of inexperienced kids I have ever seen in a franchised store. I deal with the local Authorized Shipping Center call "The Package Store" they are the best and very smart and knowledgeable people, they can ship "UPS", "FedEx". "DHL" and "USPS" giving customers more options instead of just one choice.

name: Warrior4truth
text: I was charged 2.50 for one copy of paper and no computer use. I sent my page via email to their computer and the foreign lady was rude and of absolutely no use or help to explain why. We will no longer use this location.

resp.text:
Being a small veteran owned business we do have to charge for our services.  We used our computer to retrieve your email, opening your file and printing your document.  These are the items that went into the $2.50 charge to get you your document.

Thank You,
Larry Stephens

name: Thori Brewer
text: Very friendly and knowledgeable staff!  Always have done a good job for me!

name: Becky Harris
text: Super friendly staff. Quick in and out stop.

name: d k
text: Nice store and staff.

name: Skillsusa Alabama
text: Great service.

name: Clara Darling
text: This was my first time using MoveDaddy, and I had a really great experience. David and Joshua were on time and professional the whole time. It was so hot outside, and they still moved quick, even running back to the truck in between loads! They also packed everything carefully so nothing was damaged. I highly recommend using this service for your move!

name: Max McGill
text: MoveDaddy and our moving team of Nick, David, Shep, & Seth did a fantastic job during our move. They were professional, on time, did what they said they would do and took great care of our belongings. They treated everything as if it was their own and went above and beyond to make sure the job was done completely. Not to mention it was the hottest day of the year the heat didn’t phase these guys. The whole 13 hours they had a great attitude and never stopped hustling. Thanks to MoveDaddy our moving experience was a positive one.

name: Megan Dean
text: Buster at move daddy was amazing yesterday. Buster showed up right on time and was time conscious throughout the move. Buster even helped pack up my vehicle. There were boxes I didn’t have quite ready yet and Buster was glad to help me get them packed and taped up. I really appreciate Buster and his crew. I will be using Move Daddy for moving in the future. Thank y’all for the excellent customer service!

name: Sean Berry
text: Awesome crew. Christian, Izaak, Nick, Phillip, Spencer, and Andrew were literally running to load the trucks as quickly as possible. The guys were polite and professional and they made our move 100% hassle free.

name: David Cox
text:
From start to finish Move Daddy exceeded our expectations. Easily the best moving service we have ever used. Moving is difficult. The Move Daddy Team of Zach and Spencer made it smooth, personal, and stress-free. They were a blessing!
It was clear when they arrived that their focus was on safety of our goods and our peace of mind. They had a 12+ hour day. Hard work. Exceptional attitudes throughout.
We Highly recommend this company and these movers.

name: Shirley Obert
text: My experience with MoveDaddy was one of the best of my many moves over my lifetime; as an Army brat and now retired Army officer.  Everyone was prompt, professional and careful throughout the entire job.  They worked quickly and carefully, packing and unpacking.  Spencer and all the guys were so positive and appeared to love what they do! I highly recommend MoveDaddy.

name: Kathryn Mercer
text: We were so thankful to have Zack and O'Brian help us with our move. They were professional and efficient. They made our moving process so easy and stress free.

name: M Mahan
text: Christian, Andrew, Spencer and Murph moved me just 8 short miles but it was brutally hot and it poured like crazy when they were trying to load in. Those poor guys were soaked, used moving blankets to cover the boxes and kept on working. No one complained and no one slacked off. 5th time I’ve used MoveDaddy and if I need movers again, I’ll be back. Have always had such a good experience with them and this one was no different. Thanks so much!

name: Madeline Martindale
text: Excellent!! Super fast, great personality! Worked hard and had a great time helping. Nick and Seth (Buster) are highly recommended!!

name: Alice Van Dover
text: I called today to setup appointment for moving my mom and the price that was sent to me by email they will not honor the hourly rate that was quoted to me.  They said that their pricing will go up on 8/16/21.  That was not noted on the paperwork.  They need to honor the pricing that they email people.  Very bad business for them.  He told me to find another moving company to use.

resp.text:
It is true that our local moving rates will be increasing before the date of your move. We appreciate that Kylan made sure you were aware of the increase prior to scheduling your move. We are sorry that you took exception to the information.
We have made every effort to delay increasing our rates to the levels of our competitors. However, due to increased labor cost, and general expenses, we must raise our rates to a more comparable rate to remain financially healthy.
Often, a bad review is more a reflection of the person leaving it than those they are criticizing.

name: Aletta Williamson
text: Awesome job! On time and worked hard! Great company. Excellent job David, Nick, Matthew and John!

name: D K
text: This was my second move using MoveDaddy and both were great. I was moving my parents to a retirement community and Andrew and Spencer were efficient, courteous, and on time. I was working against the clock on my parents arrival at the community and they accommodated my need for getting certain rooms and furniture set up first. Shout out to Kylan for getting it all set up for me on a quick turnaround. I will be calling MoveDaddy again for another move in a couple of months.

name: Jason Miklic
text:
today we used christian and charlie and they were beyond great , respectful , professional and efficient.  this is our 4 th move with move daddy. EVERY single employee we have used in our 4 moves were phenomenal. IT is so impressive to see their work ethic,it’s almost military style the way they work together , and handle
issues together.  I could not imagine using any other company for future moves.  They employee young , ambitious , respectful people.

name: Ann Summar
text: Seth and JP were great! They had great attitudes worked quickly and hard.

name: Taylor Pruett
text: Zach and Andrew did such a great job with my recent move. This was my second experience with the company and I would highly recommend them!!

name: Danny Shaw
text: Christian, David Andrew were the most professional and courteous movers that I have dealt with.  They were on time and provided great care in the meticulous packing but also the move and delivery of every item. They didn't waste ANY time when moving, they worked diligently through out the entire move.  I was greatly impressed by this team and company.

name: Lauren Seal
text: We had the best experience with movedaddy. Kylan was very responsive with emails. Mcmanus and John were prompt, careful and strategic about the move. everything went smoothly from the booking to the end result. Would highly recommend them.

name: obed perez
text: There’s not enough to say about this company. My first interaction was with Jared on my way to my destination in Alabama via phone. He first told me that it may be a longshot to get help to unload my truck Because of how last-minute it was that I called, however he would do whatever he could to help me and he came through. Carlos and Jacob were sent to my rescue. These two individuals were extremely professional, well mannered, and cared for my items. Honestly without them I could not get it done. I will be using this company again this week for another truck unload. Keep up the good work.

name: Donna Strange
text:
Kylan, Logan, Carlos, and Seth
We are so thankful and blessed to have been able to use this company. Each young man was respectful, professional, kind, helpful, generous, well-mannered, I could go on with nothing but positive encouraging words. Not one of them, not once stepped out of line, or were slacking at their duties.
There is always one in a group that stands out to work harder and faster then the others, that was not the case in this group. Everyone of them worked their tails off making sure the job was completed and we were happy along the way with the progress.

name: Robin Brown
text: I've used MoveDaddy twice now and both experiences were perfect!  Jacob and Phillip did an excellent job in our move! They were punctual, professional, polite besides the quick and perfect move itself! I would recommend them to anyone! (And I have!!) Excellent Service and reasonable prices!

name: Clint Watson
text: McManus and Murph were a huge help in getting my stuff moved to storage. They were on time and took their job seriously, and I appreciated it.

name: Rebecca Prisoc
text: 4th move with Move Daddy never a problem until now. 2 inexperienced movers took 8.85 hours & MAJOR damage to 3 different pieces of furniture. Called Kylan & was told MD isn’t responsible. Unprofessional movers never said anything about damages.  BEWARE.

resp.text:
Thank you for your patience as we address your claim. In the meantime, I would like to remind you that Movedaddy is only responsible for damage that occurs in our care, custody, and control. We are not responsible for damage that we discover prior to moving.

Additionally, your move totaled 7.5 hours, not 8.85. Of the total 7.5 hours, only 4.75 was spent loading and unloading your property. The remainder was spent driving to Jasper, your unload address, and returning from your unload address.

Furthermore, the men who serviced you are regarded by our customers as 5 star performers and mentioned by name in many of our reviews. They are neither inexperienced, nor unprofessional by any account other than yours.

Again, thank you for your patience, and look forward to correspondence from this office in the next 2-3 business days.

name: Ryan Holley
text: Chris and Izaak did an amazing job getting me moved from Pleasant Grove to Concord. Both were extremely professional and very careful with my property. Treated my things as if it was their own. I would definitely recommend this service and definitely Chris and Izaak to my friends and family.

name: Hunter Smith
text: Logan, Zack, Issac and Will are the most professional, efficient, and kindest movers I’ve ever come across. I’ve had to move twice in 2 months and they are absolutely incredible. Every single person I run into that is moving I recommend MoveDaddy. Ask for any of these 5 men and they will go above and beyond. I could not be happier with how effortless they made two of the most stressful moves ever. I am completely blown away. They should be given raises and bonuses as well. Great teamwork, great company, great prices.

name: Valerie Watson
text:
I've used MoveDaddy many times in the past few years, both for local and out of state moves. They have also helped me with small jobs such as taking things to a storage unit, packing or unpacking, and moving heavy pieces around the house. I have always enjoyed working with their crews. They have all been friendly, efficient, professional and careful with my possessions.

Most recently Nick and Christian helped me with a small move. I had not met them before but once again I was totally satisfied.They are professional, smart, hard working young men. They finished my job in less time than I expected and placed things exactly as I requested.

I also enjoy working with Kylan in the office. He schedules the crews and has always gone out of his way to accommodate my requests. I highly recommend MoveDaddy and will continue to call them for my moving needs.

name: Gayla Short
text:
David and Andrew were great
Very professional and knowledgeable

name: Jeanne Nappi
text: Nick and David did an outstanding job for us.  We moved from Birmingham to Jasper and the move went very smooth.  They were most helpful.  Great attitude.  Two outstanding young men.  Will use this company again if anything in the future comes up.

name: Jaccob Davis
text: Jacob and Isaac showed up on time and promptly went to work. They were very professional, and courteous. They handled my move with great care and I was very pleased with the service these young men provided. Great work. I would definitely use these guys again.

name: Kim Rhoades
text: Izaak and Christian were on time, respectful and polite.  They were professional and made everything go off seamlessly. We knew we were in good hands when we saw how quickly and efficiently they worked. Well done gentlemen. Thank you!

name: Jane Darbyshire
text: David and Phillip did excellent work moving my belongings to storage.   Great job.  Thanks guys!

name: Kara V
text: We used MoveDaddy for our local move from Fultondale to Kimberly. We have two small children and lots of furniture, etc. MoveDaddy did an excellent job getting us setup in the new place. They were quick, efficient, and courteous-extremely professional, and their hourly rate was very reasonable. I will not hesitate to use them again in the future. The day of our move Izaak, Chris, & Will showed up to get our things, and I recommend each of them very highly.

name: Tyler Watts
text: Good job!  On time, ran to and from the truck.  Great effort!  Fix the blinkers on the truck!

name: Martin Howell
text:
Super impressed with Move Daddy. (Our first time ever hiring a moving company.) They communicated great. Followed up with what they said they would do (paper work exactly as discussed). They showed up on time! The two movers, Chris and Izaak, we very professional, hussled and respectful (to us and our property).

We can say enough about the positive experience we had.

Note: Our move was a simple pickup from one place and drop off at another. It was a short 2 hour minimum job but they treated it as if it was a big job.

Great job Move Daddy and your team!!!

name: Anjum Swaroop
text: Jacob and Carols helped us move last week. They were professional, knowledgeable and extremely helpful. The service is reasonably priced and I highly recommend using them.

name: natalie heard
text: Logan  and Nick were fantastic. I was extremely  pleased with how they handled my belongings. They  made the move easy and stress free. Best  movers in the world, definitely worth every penny!

name: Angelique Davis
text: Izaak and Mark did a wonderful job helping with our move. They made everything easy and took a huge load off of me. Both boys were very professional and efficient in their work.

name: Abigail Hayes
text: Jacob & Aaron did an awesome job moving all of my items. They were very fast and efficient! I would not hesitate to use their services again and highly recommend Move Daddy!

name: Leslie Pickle
text: Truck #5- Jacob and Phillip were great!!! Very professional and helpful in making my move run smoothly. They did an excellent job and I would highly recommend them!!!!

name: Nancy Musser Haines
text: Hands down, the best movers we have ever used! Promptly at 8a, Christian, Spencer, Charlie, Andrew and Phillip showed up at our house in Homewood with 2 large trucks. They were amazing. Efficiently and carefully, they started in the attic on the third floor of the house and worked their way down carrying heavy boxes, Christmas decorations and furniture. They loaded 4 king beds with no problem. Three heavy beds had to be carried down 16 steps and two had to be carried up 15 steps at the new house.  When two trucks were loaded, they headed to The Preserve and unloaded quickly putting everything exactly where it went. After lunch, they headed back to the Homewood house and packed everything else that we wanted, including a swing set that they took down and put back up at our new house. They loaded 2 large, 200 lb each, patio umbrellas and a wooden porch swing with ease.They packed all of my potted plants, including the huge and heavy ones! Everything they did was seamless and done efficiently. I did not think our sectional would fit in the garage apt staircase and they assured me it would work, which it did! Not one piece of furniture was scratched or damaged! Amazing! For hours, these 5 guys ran up and down steps loading and unloading with incredible ease. All of this with a smile on their faces and being so respectful! When they left, all of the beds were up, all of our furniture was put together and everything was in the right place! I would hire these guys again in an instant! Worth every penny and more! I seriously can’t brag enough on each of these young men! Move Daddy is the company to use for efficient, professional and quality service!

name: Nancy Hubert
text: Jacob, Phillip and Jerrod were very ready and eager to help with anything and everything throughout the whole process (same for Kylan in the office). So easy to work with, always pleasant and polite. You can tell that they enjoy what they do and work well together. Recommend without a doubt!

name: Russ Brown
text: Jacob and Chris were courteous, professional, careful and customer focused.  Our local move was without a hitch.  Move was local and extremely cost effective.  I recommend Move Daddy in Birmingham without hesitation.  These two workers were outstanding!

name: Adam Johnson
text: My wife and I used Move Daddy to move from our two houses and into our forever home. Jacob and Christian worked for us Friday and Saturday. On Saturday Izaak and Chase joined us to finish the last two trips. The gentlemen were very professional, efficient and took great care of our belongings. If you are moving be sure you give Move Daddy a call. You will be happy you did!

name: Emery H
text: We had the pleasure of having Mark, Isaak, Christian, and Phillip move us yesterday.  These guys are professional, kind, super hard working, know what they are doing, enjoy their work, and hustle all day!  Mark and Isaak helped move my parents and they had a great experience too so we requested them when we booked our move. They know how to get this stuff done efficiently and safely.  We’ve used other companies and not had this kind of experience.  If you’re reading this, save yourself the stress and request these guys.

name: Nathaniel Cartmell
text:
Last Tuesday, Jenkins, Zach, and Angel helped on our move which involved one stop and six flights of stairs in total. They were top-notch. I have used a lot of different movers and this crew has provided the single best experience. I will likely call on them again for my next move.

The first thing that impressed me was how punctual the team was. They were outside at 8:00 am sharp (one advantage of having a location so close to central city).

The next thing that I noticed was how efficient they were. Jenkins walked through the apartment, asked about each item to be moved, and there and then formulated a plan to move each item in the right order. The entire crew then worked with purpose in clearing the apartment.

Also worth a mention is how respectful they were--not just in their bearing, attitude, and speech, but also in the way they treated our property. The move covered only a short distance, but the team did not take any shortcuts in transport, using the full range of blankets, pads, ropes, and other restraints to make sure the items did not move, scratch, or break during transport.

Finally, other than an hour break for lunch (for which we were not charged), the entire group worked diligently until the entire truck was unloaded.

name: Cody Jenkins
text: This is my second time using Move Daddy, this time the movers were Jenkins, Ryan and Zach. Once again,  excellent service. These guys were punctual, courteous, and respectful. They handled all of our items with care and they stayed moving the whole time, didn't drag around any. I will always choose Move Daddy for any future needs. Excellent service, would recommend to anyone. Thanks guys!

name: Deedra Moore
text: Our whole experience with Move Daddy was great!  They were very professional from the first call made to the last item moved.  Kylan took my call and took care of the booking.  We didn't need a full move.  We only needed movers to meet us at our destination to unload a UHaul.  I didn't know if that was even a service that Move Daddy provided.  Kylan was very helpful in taking care of answering all my questions and getting us booked.  McManus and Charlie were wonderful movers and so polite!  They took so much care in making sure we were happy with everything and handling our furniture with care.  They wanted to make sure everything was placed in the correct places even offering to move it for us if it wasn't placed just right.  They went above and beyond to make us happy.  We were very impressed with them and how mannerly they were.  If you are looking for a moving company, be sure to hire Move Daddy and hope you get McManus and Charlie as part of your moving team!

name: Mitchell Johnson
text: Jacob and Zach were right on time for the move that we made. They were both very courteous and helpful. Treated our belongings like it was their own and were as helpful as I could've expected. Thanks guys for your help!

name: Abby Killian
text: Christian & Phillip were amazing, they ran as if it was a race and just made our move easy. Huge weight lifted from my shoulders. Highly recommend.

name: Abigail Larson
text: Great experience! Have used this company before and will use again in the future. Christian and Harrison did a wonderful job!

name: Bryan Knox
text: Words can’t describe how absolutely HAPPY we are with the services they provided. Jacob and Luke went above and beyond, were wonderfully respectful, worked like Trojans and made the move a pleasant experience. We would hire them again in a minute!!!! It is so refreshing to see respectful young men work hard and take pride in a job well done.  Well done, gentlemen!

name: Gerald Maye
text: I've used this service on a few occasions since moving to Birmingham. They have always been extremely professional and accommodating. They are responsive to requests and deliver a high degree of service. I've also recommended them to some friends who have upcoming moves. I recommend them to anyone who needs a dependable moving company. Two thumbs up guys.

name: Jim Duren
text: Christian and Phillip with MoveDaddy are professional young men that are good at planning, executing, and following directions to make an in-town move successful. They worked diligently and expediently to make sure every detail was attended to make this transition to another home  a positive experience.  They were extremely organized, trained and their prior experiences helped made this move a big success!! Thank you Christian and Phillip!! You rock!! We will use you again!!

name: Victoria Patterson
text: The office was so professional! Gave me great advice and tips that no one else did!!! Made sense and the pricing was straight forward! No hidden agenda here! I had an excellent team! Jacob and Angel were THE BEST!!!! Straight forward, hard working, on time, professional and just straight out great! This company exceeded all expectations I had and I will say I’ve expected quite a bit! They stayed in constant contact and handled our items like it was their own. Not a fan of the commercials at all! Not at all. I must say I was shocked when I choose them. Having said this I will NEVER use anyone else! They just aren’t enough good words to say about these guys!

name: Eta Nu
text: MoveDaddy was professional from scheduling to payment.  The guys were respectfully and were swift but  took their time to make sure that everything was what I wanted.  I will be using them in the future. I even got a follow up call to see how I enjoyed the service.  They were ready to listen to my experience.

name: David Nabors
text: We used this service for the first time today.  Mark and David were great.  They were on time, had great attitudes, were very professional,  and hustled from beginning to end.  Made the entire process much easier than I had been dreading.  We will certainly call them the next time we need items moved for any reason.

name: Anna Murphy
text: My husband and I bought our first house, and it is an hour and a half from our previous home. So we new we needed to hire movers, given the size of the move. We had several people recommend MoveDaddy, and they did not disappoint! Jacob & Angel were very professional, communicated well, were very personable and made us feel at ease the whole day during the move! They were worth every penny, and if we ever move again, we will use them! Worth every penny!

name: BGEagle
text: Logan and Issac were assigned to our move as requested. They had moved us to storage seven months or so ago and they were really good. This time around, they were even better. They wasted no time and really hustled throughout the move. I would not hesitate to recommend them to anyone planning a move! They are both a credit to MoveDaddy.

name: Deborah Holley
text: Christian and Phillip were totally awesome!   They worked fast and got things done quickly. They were also careful and attentive to the things being moved. I am impressed with these two and how well they worked together. Great job!!

name: Andrew St. John
text: First time using MoveDaddy. Angel and Chris were quick, friendly, and super professional; always making sure if I wanted something in a specific spot or not when bringing pieces in or if there was anything else I needed them to take. Takes a lot to move heavy furniture up three flights of narrow stairs, so I’m very grateful for what they did. Definitely worth going with them for an easy, efficient move.

name: Carli Dalton
text: Logan, Chris, and Chase arrived right on time and had me moved in just 1 hour! They were extremely polite, respectful, and careful with all of my belongings. They were so accommodating and kind when we requested they wear shoe covers as to not track dirt on my white rug. I strongly recommend Move Daddy (especially Logan, Chris, and Chase)!

name: Diego Gonzalez
text: First time using a moving company. Christian and Phillip were very professional and wasted no time. I would definitely use this company again. For the price and service, they can’t be beat.

name: MARK TAYLOR
text: This is our first time using MoveDaddy. Our crew of Jenkins, Nick, Philip and Dontae were fantastic. Worked extremely hard, communicated well, were responsive, interacted well with each other, and careful with every piece of furniture that they moved...both from our previous home to our new home. And they moved as fast as they could have. Couldn't have been more pleased.

name: Sally Ann Nichols
text: Thank you so much to Jacob and Phillip who moved us to Birmingham all the way from Florida! They were SO quick loading and unloading and were very sweet and respectful! Also, thank you to Movedaddy for being so flexible with us as our closing date kept changing. You guys rock.

name: Terry C
text:
I can’t say enough good things about how MoveDaddy handled my recent move, specifically Christian and Phillip.  These young men were extremely professional, hardworking, energetic and respectful. They knew what they were doing and throughout the day they could be seen running back to the truck for another load!  Nothing was damaged and my items were handled with care.
This move was temporary and I’ll definitely use MoveDaddy for my next move and request Christian and Phillip again.  Thank you so much guys!

name: Laura Brunson
text: I can’t say enough good things about Logan, Mark and Zack! They were on time, worked well as a team, took care of every detail and were fun!!! They moved a very heavy antique piano as well as a house full of furniture! I’m very impressed with them and they represent Move Daddy very well! They worked very hard all day and I would highly recommend them for any moving job! Thanks so much to your company and especially those guys!! Laura B.

name: Susan Stinson
text:
Christian and Mick are great movers.  Literally...moved  fast and very efficient at packing the truck to use every inch of space.
They worked well together and were courteous and well young men.  Will definitely use them again!

name: Randy Merritt
text: Very good experience with Chris and Izaak.  On time, hard-working, careful, and professional.  Everything was top-notch.  Would definitely recommend to friends

name: Matt
text: Jenkins and Zach did a fantastic job moving my mom today. Both were very hard working, professional, and flexible. Would definitely request those two again. Great job!

name: Sarah Garcia
text: Christian and Izaak did an awesome job completing a move for one of my elderly clients. They were respectful, efficient and had great attitudes. I am impressed as usual with Move Daddy. 100% recommend!

name: paula anne edwards
text: Jenkins and Nick were amazing! I had a last minute need for help on a Saturday, and they were able to work me in. These guys were efficient and professional, but very good natured as well which was important because I was stressed! I was amazed at how much they got done in a small block of time. Highly recommend. Thank you, Jenkins and Nick!

name: Cassi Busby
text: Mark and Tucker did such a good job. I plan to use them again for my next move in a few months. Very prompt and productive with their time spent. Used caution when moving breakable items and were very friendly. They really seemed to enjoy their job and made it a great experience for us.

name: Carter Ward
text: Christian and Phillip did an excellent job helping us with our move! They were fast, efficient, and careful with all of our belongings. Not to mention a pleasure to be around. I would highly recommend these two and MoveDaddy!

name: Marc Miles
text: Jenkins, Jacob, Christian, Tyler and Nick were outstanding!  Very friendly, careful and responsive.  They were right on time each day and handled every requests in a friendly and outstanding manner!  Highly recommended!

name: Lindsay Morris Hirsowitz
text: My husband and I moved last weekend. We did a lot of research on movers and chose MoveDaddy to help us. I’m pregnant and my husband hurt is wrist so we really couldn’t do much ourselves but pack. They did EVERYTHING! We had two young guys Nick and Brady. Gentle giants I called them as they were so polite and attention to detail. They went above and beyond. Highly recommend them and will definitely use them if and when we move again! Thank you again Nick and Brady.

name: Kenneth Mahler
text: This is an exceptional moving company, very thorough and professional.  Mark did a great job in coordinating the move, on time and all procedures explained.  Christian and Seth worked with me for a half day, moving and storing furniture.  They were outstanding.  I highly recommend this moving firm.

name: April Weeks
text: We could not be more pleased with our recent move. Taylor and his coworker were very professional, courteous and on time.

name: Drew Kennedy
text: Excellent service and great workers.  Logan, Mark, Nick, and Izaakk were very conscientious and polite both to us and to others at our storage facility.  They had great attitudes and all four worked hard and well together.  They took great care of of us and all our stuff - especially the baby grand piano.  Would definitely want them on our next move!

name: P P
text: Move Daddy is the best moving company we have ever used! Jenkins and Tucker were professional, on time, and did not stop working from the time they arrived, to the time they left. They were fast, efficient, and patient (with two OCD customers that kept changing our minds on what we wanted to move and where it would go). We will not be using another moving company other than Move Daddy from now on. Highly recommend them!

name: Kim Matthews
text: Move Daddy saved the day....I called this company after speaking with two others and this one was not only available when I needed on a fairly short notice but also more affordable than other quotes I received.  Nick and Dekoda came on time, they were very professional, nice and efficient.  Would definitely be using Move Daddy again if possible.

name: Debby Rosser
text: Dakota and Nick moved my son to Mobile.   I was so impressed how hardworking these men were!  They made sure everything went smoothly.    They were so careful with our belongings, and never took a break to rest.  They were amazing!   I will be asking for them when my son moves back in four years.  Thank you Move Daddy!

name: Shannon Parker
text: Christian, Nick and Seth were all friendly and professional. They did a great job moving items out of an apartment and into storage. We had some items that needed to be disassembled and proved to be a bit of a challenge. They kept at it, worked hard and moved everything without damage. They even helped arrange things in the storage unit so I can access certain items easily.

name: Pete Black
text: The Movedaddy team was absolutely incredible!! Kudos to Mark (teamleader), David, Christian and Nick!! What a wonderful group of fellows to work with. If you are looking for a first class mover. Look no further than Movedaddy! You won't be disappointed.

name: Lee
text: Logan, David and Jacob are absolutely the best in the moving market!! They exceeded all expectations and were purely delightful!

name: Shae Lovelady
text: logan and david helped make my move easy and simple!!

name: Tom D
text: Everything from start to finish was amazing! Chris, Izaak and Tanner were awesome, polite and extremely professional. Got everything quickly and carefully. Filled up a Pod expertlyz

name: Kayla Watson
text: Christian & Nick were very careful with all of our belongings. They made our move stress & worry free. Definitely recommend these guys!!! I would use again for sure. Thanks guys!

name: Richard Mickwee
text: Move Daddy helped us out on our latest move.  Chris and Tyler showed up on time, were helpful and courteous, and hustled throughout the entire day.  They did not call it a day until we told them they were done, and graciously met all of our requests for delivery.  Thanks!

name: Sarah G
text: Move daddy sent two movers — Strickland and Tucker — to help us unload our truck. They were very professional, hard working, and respectful of our belongings and our house. They worked efficiently but took their time with tricky furniture or tricky corners so as not to damage our walls. We will definitely be using move daddy again and recommending them to friends and family.

name: John Herndon
text: Jenkins, Andrew, and Ryan did an outstanding job moving everything out of our apartment. They worked very quickly and efficiently, they even jogged back and forth between loads. Our particular moving day included some rain and it did not slow them down at all. They were very careful with our belongings and absolutely nothing was damaged. All 3 of them were extremely polite. I would highly recommend to anyone considering moving!

name: fliza
text:
Chris and Mcneise did an amazing job. They were professional and handled my furniture with care. I would highly recommend them for your moving needs.
Thanks, Ken Johnson.

name: Klint Kallies
text: Christian and Andrew were excellent. They both deserve big raises and company franchise of their own.

name: Claire Drummond
text: Jenkins, Andrew, Ryan, Christian and Mikale were amazing! They went above and beyond - they were basically running the whole time. Each one had an amazing attitude and were willing to help with whatever was needed even after 8 hours of work! Jenkins was the team leader and was a delight..a great leader, positive, super hard working. We couldn’t have had a better experience..I highly recommend MoveDaddy!

name: Katrina Lenart
text: Logan, Kylan, JR, Zack, David, Nick, Christian & Luke were the absolute best crew I could have asked form.  They we on time, polite, and energetic.  They were so careful with all of our belongings and made sure we were happy with everything.  They kept me updated throughout the day about the progress and next steps.  Mark in the office was responsive to all of my needs before the move and even offered to have a crew come back out to rearrange anything we may need after the move.  I have hired a lot of moving companies in my life, but this was by far the best crew and move I have ever had.

name: Steve Layton
text: Chris, Isaac & Brad did a great job. Very professional and considerate. I recommend them highly.

name: Sandy Newman
text: My experience with MoveDaddy could not have gone better. Jacob and Logan are fine young men who did an outstanding job of moving my furniture from Mobile to Birmingham.

name: Will Brunson
text: Mark and Zach were excellent in every way during our move. Thanks guys!

name: Jesse Garris
text: Parked the truck perpendicular to the road and IN the road so as to block all traffic. Thanks move daddy. 👍🏼

name: john mielke
text: MOVEDADDY is the only service I would use to move my stuff. Mark and Tucker were extremely professional. They got me set up fast.

name: Tyler Stone
text: Strickland and Nick were on time, professional, hard working, and had great attitudes during the 95 degree heat! I could not have asked for two better guys to help us move in a pinch. We would have been helpless with out nick and Strickland. If every mover had guys like these two, the world would be a better place. I’d give 6 stars because of them if I could.

name: AK Hester
text: My husband and I cannot say enough good things about our experience with Move Daddy. Our movers, Izaak Rhoades & Andrew Strickland, worked hard and were very respectful. They were very careful not to damage our belongings or our home. They are outstanding young men.

name: Sally Clark
text: Great experience with Logan and David yesterday moving out of my son’s apartment. They were professional, efficient and courteous young men. Thank you!   Recommend highly !

name: Denee Fargason
text: The office staff was friendly and professional. Our movers, Logan, Jacob, Izaak, Nick and Luke were amazing! They arrived on time, verified everything multiple times, handled our belongings with care and got the job done quickly. I highly recommend MoveDaddy and this team!

name: Diane Bellew
text: I called at 11:30 to schedule a move and Logan and Nick were here by 1:30.  Talk about prompt service!    Jacob snd Izaak came to help at the end. All the guys were so professional, trustworthy, polite and made the move a smooth transition.   I would call them for your next move.

name: Ashley Ellis
text: Kylan and Andrew were THE BEST!! So friendly and on time. They worked fast, but were very careful. Cannot day enough good, positive things about this company and their movers!! USE THIS COMPANY! 🙌🏻🙌🏻🤗

name: Kevin Poe
text: Logan, Kylan, Zack, and Luke were all amazing! They worked hard, fast and respectfully! They were the hardest working group of young men I have seen in a long time and would highly recommend them!! Great job!!

name: Angie Denton
text: Jacob, Luke, and Josiah did an excellent job of moving our Mamaw's things  out of an independent living facility to the basement for temporary storage. They were very helpful and communicated with us well about times. We were not the first job of the day but they still finished in a timely manner. We plan on having them come again to finish putting things in their eventually permanent place. MoveDaddy was contacted because a friend in the decorating business told me she'd heard good things. We only have good things to say and hope to get situated  soon to have them back again!  Good price, good value, excellent service, good choice-

name: Virginia B
text: Andy, Logan, and Harris were absolutely amazing! Not only did they move my stuff quickly and efficiently, they had such an amazing attitude! They were really a delight to be around. They called before meeting me, arrived when they said they would, quickly and safely loaded up a truckload of boxes, and promptly delivered and unloaded them. I will be recommending MoveDaddy to everyone I know. Thank you guys!

name: Katie Fogg
text: Fantastic experience! Couldn't have been happier with the move process from MoveDaddy.

name: Michael Graydon
text: Izaak and Strickland were very professional and efficient. Extremely nice and did an amazing job! Highly recommend Move Daddy!

name: Elizabeth Blair
text: Christian and Brad were great! They arrived early, worked hard, and took care of our house like it was their own.

name: Fred Dyess
text:
I own an antiques business. I recommended Move Daddy to a customer to have furniture he had purchased from me delivered.
I’m impressed with the professionalism, promptness, care of the items. Dakota and Christian did a great job! I will continue to recommend Move Daddy every chance I get.

name: Jay Carter
text: what a GREAT team: Logan, Kylan, Jack, Josiah, David, Zack and Seth....these young men absolutely rocked our move. They literally ran from truck to home to truck. Just a bunch of delightful young men. Thanks, so much!!!

name: Heather Chafin
text: Wow. That was the best moving experience I have ever had. Dakota and Caleb are so professional! They really know what they are doing! They are fast! They took care of my furniture like it was there own! I will recommend them and this company to everyone I know! And the cherry to the cake...they were so nice I had so much fun setting up my new home with them! Thank you so much!!!!

name: Scott Padgitt
text: Dakota and his crew were on time, they worked hard and got my move done just about as quickly as it could be done.  Moved from a house into a high-rise condo. The elevator slowed us down, but they stayed diligent and got it all done.  VERY respectful of my newly painted walls in my new place.  Would definitely use them again.

name: Mary Maze
text: I’m a home stager and have used Moved Daddy for several jobs now.  Kylan, Seth, Christian, and Tucker are awesome! They are all professional, respectful, and extremely hard working!  I look forward to working with them on the next project.

name: Stuart Lee
text: Kylan and Andrew did an amazing job moving our things. They showed up early and were very polite and energetic. They took extreme care not to damage any of our things or scratch the walls and floor. Outstanding job by Kylan and Andrew!

name: Sharon B.
text: Mark and Tyler were absolutely amazing!! They were on time, very professional, very courteous, they were very careful moving my boxes, and they really hustled!!! I was very impressed by their professionalism and how hard they worked. They were the best movers I have ever hired!

name: Jay Elmore
text: Mark, Zack, and David did excellent job on our move.  Would use MoveDaddy again.

name: Allyson Gilbert
text: Mark, JR, Nathan & Andy were awesome! Very friendly and professional, and moved our stuff as efficiently and carefully as possible. Also help me set-up beds in the bedrooms. What really impressed me is that they called the next day to see if there was any additional furniture they could come back and help us move/rearrange if needed, free of charge! I don’t know any moving company that does that!  Will be recommending them to everyone I know.

name: Holly Crimm
text: Jack and Luke were awesome! Hustled the whole time, very polite and helpful, and even gave some excellent interior design insights! I Highly recommend MoveDaddy.

name: Laura Berry
text: My movers, Mark, Andy, Collin and Logan arrived on time and unloaded 2 large trucks quickly & efficiently. They set up 3 beds, moved a pulled out bed couch to the 3rd floor, hooked up my washer and dryer without a single scratch to my freshly painted house. I would highly recommend this team at Move Daddy.

name: Carmen Snyder
text:
Andrew was very helpful in getting our move scheduled. Quotes were very accurate to actual cost.

We did a local move to a storage unit, followed by a full move to Atlanta.

Mark & Darius were incredible!!!!!!!!! Politest movers ever. So kind, personable and did an excellent job. I don’t know where they get their energy and strength!

Mark is a genius and made more fit in our storage unit than I thought possible.

Would HIGHLY recommend Move Daddy and would encourage people to specifically request Mark & Darius!

name: Vincente Garcia
text: JR and Nick thank you for your prompt move and making sure everything was safe. Made sure what was going before they started. These 2 guys worked smart and very efficient! Couldnt ask for better! Again thank you so much. Vince Garcia

name: Allan Gambrell
text: Two young men, Isaac and Logan, got to my house right on time and got straight to work, didn't waste time, and they packed that truck to the brim - we managed to get our whole house in one load. They had tons of moving blankets and straps to load their truck efficiently. They lifted some very heavy items without complaining. very classy performance by these guys, and I would hire them again without a second thought. Also, the price was very reasonable.

name: Scott Fortenberry
text: These guys were awesome from start to finish. Logan, Kylan, Zack and David  were all good natured guys that worked HARD in the Alabama heat and humidity of July .  I felt like I got my money worth.   If you need movers then this is the only call you need make.

name: Thomas Jackson
text: Mark and Glenn were very professional. They were courteous and efficient. Our move was complete within the time range and price range discussed. I have used Move Daddy for both local and long distance moves, and would definitely do so in the future.

name: Hillary Swift
text: Used Move Daddy this week and couldn’t be more pleased. Jenkins, Tucker & Tyler were prompt and professional. They were literally running back and forth to the truck which I appreciate since you pay by the hour, but certainly did not expect that. I will definitely be using Move Daddy again- thanks guys!

name: Carol Harris
text: Logan and Toliver went over and beyond to move our house! Great job! I would highly recommend them and GoDaddy!

name: Vickie Carter
text:
I have previously used Move Daddy & always will. Without a doubt I had the A-Team this time!! Jenkins & Kaleb are The BEST in the COUNTRY!! They were fast, but careful with all my furniture! Very polite and helped me arrange everything! Thank you for doing such a great job on Halloween! 🎃
Thanks again,
Vickie McNeely Carter

name: Jeff Drummonds
text: Andrew was great with scheduling. We had to change 6 times and he was always helpful. Collins and Kaleb did the move and these two young men practically ran in and out of the house all day to expedite the move. They were very polite and professional. My wife and I are very pleased. We received more value than the hourly rate.

name: Susan Schell
text: Logan and Charlie were awesome! Timely, quick moving, and polite. Highly recommend!

name: Christian Milam
text: Kylan, Nick, & Christian moved my mom into her new home today and they were awesome. They were very professional, polite and knew exactly what they were doing. I highly recommend them and Move Daddy!

name: Tamarie PHILLIPS
text: Dekoda and Nathan did a wonderful job with our move from Birmingham to North Carolina. They made sure all our stuff was taken care of like it was their own. We  used Move Daddy before in Birmingham for our cross town move and when we found out we were moving out of state we knew we had to use them again.

name: Robert S. Elliott
text: Alonzo and Logan were excellent movers who exceeded expectations. They were skilled, efficient, and courteous. Very professional. Andrew was extremely helpful with scheduling and providing a quote. Move Daddy offered services other providers would not. I don't know what I would have done without them. I appreciate their hard work and high quality. I already referred Move Daddy to my mom and suggest anyone looking for help moving to hire them.

name: Dianne Shaw
text: Excellent moving experience with this company.... please use them.  They are THE BEST!

name: Ashlyn Pate
text: We had a great moving experience with Move Daddy. Justin and Payton were our movers and they did a fantastic job! They had our entire house loaded on the truck in 2 hours. We had no damage to furniture and they were very professional and friendly. We were also very pleased with the professionalism of the office staff. Andrew was very helpful and his quote was timely and accurate. I have already recommended them to several other people for their moves!

name: Elizabeth Mapoles
text: Great moving company! Logan and Isaac were our movers and they were very efficient and careful. Excellent customer service. We would use them again for sure. Highly recommended!

name: Randell Hill
text: I moved a few weeks ago on the hottest weekend of the summer. The guys were courteous and efficient. I had a tight move out schedule but their hard work made it happen. I have and will continue to recommend Move Daddy. A special thanks to JR, Brent, Wells and Edwards for the hard work!

name: Al Foster
text: Moved two upright pianos and did an excellent job.

name: Kelli Sahai
text: We have used MoveDaddy 2 times and they were exceptional both times.  Our last move in June we had Mark and Logan they were very efficient and professional.  We definitely recommend MoveDaddy.

name: Nick McKenzie
text: The movers (Logan, Izaak, and Tucker) were very professional and worked harder than any movers I have had prior. I didn’t have to worry about my furniture being scratched or dinged. I would highly recommend this company and those specific guys for your next move.

name: Jared Varner
text: Kylan & Logan were extremely careful with my fragile items. They moved all of my belongings in a timely & efficient manner. Definitely will recommend MoveDaddy to my friends and family. Thanks Guys!!

name: Lori McHugh
text: We have moved 3 times in the last 5 years and MoveDaddy has by far been the best! It was extremely hot outside and the guys worked really hard non-stop. I definitely recommend them to anyone! The price was reasonable as well!

name: Wendi Griggs
text: Co-workers recommended Move Daddy from the positive experience that they had. I will also pass along the great experience and couldn't ask for a better team for our packing and loading experience Jr. and Kaleb.  Thank you!

name: Lindsey Herring
text: We had an amazing experience with Move Daddy 2 days ago. Katelyn booked our move. She made booking the move seamless and easy. She also did a great job quoting our move. She said she thought 5-6 hours max (only because I wasn't exactly sure my storage size) and it took 4.5 hours. Our movers were Jordan and Justin and they are AMAZING. Cannot say enough good things about them. They are professional and so nice. When their hands were free of furniture, they were jogging to go back and get more furniture. I will be using Move Daddy again because of them and would highly recommend them. Thank you Jordan and Justin for making a stressful situation so easy!!! Y'all are the best.

name: Michael Alexander
text: I would highly recommend MoveDaddy. Mark and D. loaded PODS and then unloaded them at our new house. They were more than just fast. They were careful with our stuff, they offered suggestions about how to layout a room, they were always polite, and... they were fast! Overall fantastic experience with Mark and D of MoveDaddy.

name: John English
text: This is our third time using MoveDaddy. Jenkins and Nathan did an outstanding job. Very efficient and careful. Will definitely use them again.

name: Paige Helferstay
text: Andrew and Kylan were wonderful. The guys showed up on time and got straight to work. They catered to my every need and got my move done in a timely manner. Will be calling you guys again in the future!

name: Melinda Coats
text: I cannot say enough good things about Move Daddy.  From the scheduling to the move and delivery, they were both professional and efficient.  Mark and Kaleb did exceptional work and made the entire office move effortless. Thank you Move Daddy!

name: robert e
text: Mark and Dakoda were great. I had a great experience loading and unloading being kept informed of all details during the process. They were friendly and pleasant and I would definitely ask for them next move!

name: Austin Pike
text: Kylan and Andy were awesome. Great hardworking young men. I was blown away at the pace these guys moved at. Outstanding, thanks again.

name: Gretchen Schnader
text: Kaleb and Collin were so helpful! I moved out of my apartment and into my house. They were not only professional but very friendly! I didn’t even have to worry one bit with my furniture because they took care of it all! I am so happy I used MoveDaddy!

name: Joanna Bradley
text: Justin and Logan arrived right on time and worked until the job was finished with only a 30 minute lunch break (you don't pay for that time). At first I was apprehensive because they looked so young. But they proved to be careful and efficient. They worked quickly loading a full house of furniture including a piano in two and a half hours. The unloading in the new house took more time. We had brand new hardwoods and they moved everything in without a scratch! They have a special dolly for hardwoods. They even lifted the sleeper sofa over the kitchen island! Justin has over 4 years of experience with MoveDaddy and he made sure we were satisfied before he left. He hooked up our washer and dryer, put the doors back on the refrigerator (had had the tools and expertise to remove them in order to get the refrigerator through a narrow doorway at the old house) and set up our beds! They never dragged one single piece of furniture during the move. I highly recommend them for large or small moves!

name: Laura Lamb
text: This was the first time I've ever hired a moving company.  I obtained bids from 4 companies, and MoveDaddy was the lowest bid.  That almost made me nervous, but I called the storage facility where we had my daughter's stuff stored, and their top recommendation was MoveDaddy.  Best decision ever!  Andrew was great to work with on the administrative side.  I was concerned because the move was complicated, involving 4 locations over 2 days.  Everything went so incredibly smoothly!  Mark and Logan were just amazing...great attitudes, hard workers, friendly and polite, and just wanted us to be happy.  They showed up on time, listened when I mentioned a few special pieces of furniture, and loaded and unloaded in less time than we could have imagined.  We absolutely could not have asked for better service!  I hope we don't have any more moves for a long time, but I would use them again in a heartbeat!

text: 5 stars across the board ! Kylan, JR, and Izaak were the movers that assisted us in our move from a 3rd floor apartment to a house. name: Jonathan Moseley
text: They took their time moving. One mover broke a piece of glass to a table, and I heard him say, “that’s ok, we’ll milk the clock and make the best of it.” It’s been 4 days and I have heard nothing about the broken piece they said they would replace, after they told me I would hear from them within 24-48 hours. I would suggest any other moving company over this one

resp.text:
Mr. Moseley, as you know, you were told our office would contact you in 2-3 business days. Please refer to your copy of the move sheet and your copy of the damage report stating 2-3 business days. On the 3rd business day, we explained to you that the replacement was delayed due to business closures related to the current pandemic, and that we would continue working diligently to complete the replacement. We regretted that the accident occurred and expected the matter to be resolved the following Monday or Tuesday.
Despite your sense of urgency, we attempted to contact you every day for 6 days to schedule delivery. On Saturday, you returned our call, and on Monday we delivered your table. As a courtesy, we delivered the table to an address unrelated to your move, an hour round trip from our office.
Your claim that one of the men said, “that’s ok, we’ll milk the clock and make the best of it” is absurd nonsense. The 2 matters are unrelated, and no one stands to gain anything by making your move take longer than it should. If you would like your moves to take less time, consider reserving an apartment on the main level, and reserve your storage on the main level.
This move and your previous move conducted by the same movers both took 5 hours. Both moves took less time than we would expect. Perhaps their performance is the cause for you to use our service again. We are truly sorry for whatever happened to cause you to post such an untruthful and deceptive review, but we wish you the best and hope you get through it.

Update 08/06/2020 Dream Team Jenkins & Nick
