text: It is ok when not on busy day

name: westonincr
text: Excellent customer service! Manager Nikki was very helpful.

name: Stephanie Brinkman
text: Nicki and the crew here were so helpful to us! We were working on the road and our company screwed up our delivery and we ended up spending the night in Tuscaloosa. The next morning as soon as we arrived to pick up, they were already trying to track down our package. It took some time but they located our parts and we were on our way. Thanks guys for all your help, and thanks Tuscaloosa, ROLL TIDE!

name: HumaneSociety WestAlabama
text: Nikki and her staff at the UPS Store have been nothing but kind and supportive of our rescue. They regularly print our large batch newsletters and our annual calendars with an incredibly quick turnaround time. We're always very pleased with how the products turn out too, so there is never any worry that we're sacrificing quality for speed. Thank you, Nikki!

name: Max Power
text:
Tried and failed to have them process an Amazon return. They couldn't get the qr code to work from two phones and appeared to have no idea what the code was for or what to do with it. They kept trying to see what the instructions part of the email was too. The instructions are to scan the code. Which they couldn't do. I'm not always thrilled with these stores, but shouldn't the franchise come with some instructions on how to do what is a simple and common procedure everywhere else?

Edited to add that the owner was standing behind the counter while this occurred. You ignored the opportunity to understand at the time.

resp.text:
Hi Mr. Power. I am sorry to hear of your recent failed transaction.  Could you please call the the store and ask for the owner, Nikki, at 205-345-5345, so we can rectify this situation.   Unless our system was offline, we should have been able to scan your code and process your return so I would like to understand this situation better.  Thank You.

Hi Mr. Power.  Would you mind me asking how many times you have visited our store? Are you certain it was the owner behind the counter? We process Amazon returns everyday all day, so I am a bit perplexed as to the issue at   hand. Thank you.

name: Christopher Spencer
text: Been going to this particular UPS Store for years and it is way out of my way. But the employees there have always been so helpful and nice and that is why I keep going there.

name: maddie myers
text: I went to drop my Dyson vacuum cleaner off for the second time because it was damaged in shipping the first time. I did  not wait that long in line but when she went to take it back, I told her I did not package it well and I needed it re-packaged but she said  that it is fine because it was already cracked. That gives me an uneasy feeling because if it gets damaged I will be held liable.

resp.text: Hi Maddie.  I apologize for this, as this is not the standard of our UPS Store.  We pride ourselves in being the packaging experts therefore you should have been insured your package would arrive safely. Please contact Nikki at 205-345-5345 if there are any issues with your package arriving damaged at the Dyson facility.

name: rick a
text: I like being able to have my Amazon packages held for pick up so I don't have to worry about them being stolen while I'm at work.  The 69 South staff are always very friendly and helpful.

name: Heather Garcia
text: I had a package held here for pickup and they couldn’t locate the package when I arrived.  The tracking number showed it had been signed for by someone in this office.  After three different employees argued with me that they didn’t have it, they finally located it.  Then I was charged $5 because I picked it up here instead of letting it come to my house.  That charge seemed a bit suspicious to me, but oh well.  The manager got an attitude again about the charge.  The customer service was nonexistent.  Ridiculous!

resp.text: Hi Heather.  We apologize for not being able to locate your package immediately.  As advised, in the future you can avoid the $5.00 pickup charge by processing this as an Access Point/Shop Assist package.  This can be done by visiting UPS.com/mychoice.   Thank You.

name: Lexiek98
text: Nikki and Riley are awesome. Even at the busiest times they are still extremely polite and provide awesome customer service.

resp.text:
Hi Alexie!  Thank you for the positive feedback.  Our mission is to provide exceptional customer service on all fronts and we are glad we could provide you with a positive experience.  Please come see us soon!!!

Nikki

name: Ana Leigh
text: I had a great experience here. They were friendly and professional. Helped me pick out and print photos for a party at work celebrating our founder. I promised one of the guys cake and I forgot so one of these days I need to pop over there with some cake. XD

resp.text: Thank you, Anastasia! You don't need to bring us cake, just come back and see us whenever we can help you!

name: K James
text: Never had a problem here. Nice and friendly service. They close at 3 on Saturday , so I can't understand why so many think it's 5 when the website has always said 3... SMH

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words.  We appreciate your business at The UPS Store 2777!  We hope to see you soon!!

name: D Fulton
text: I made a notary appointment online two weeks in advance, and subsequently received an "Appointment Confirmation" e-mail and an "Appointment Reminder" e-mail for this appointment.  However, when I arrived, I was told that no notary was working that day and that appointments made online are NOT coordinated with the store.  Absolutely nothing led me at any time to believe that the appointment I made wasn't actually made.  Shame on this store for apparently knowing that this non-coordination existed but doing nothing to fix the problem.  I wrote to this store, but after more than two weeks have received no reply.  It's obvious to me that customer service/satisfaction is not a high priority for the 1105 Southview Lane UPS Store in Tuscaloosa.

name: Jack Burkhart
text:
We went to this place expecting to barely make it since it closes at 5 according to the website and Google. When we got there, we found out it closed at 3 on Saturdays.
I would expect the times to be correct but I guess not.

name: Smitty Johnson
text: They lie and say my package is undeliverable because of no apartment number, yet they have my apartment number in the address they have, they just fail at delivering my package EVERY TIME and come up with different lies about why they can't.

resp.text:
Hi Nicholas.  I apologize for the negative experience you had with UPS not delivering your package at your apartment.  If you would like to call 205-345-5345 and ask for Nikki we can discuss other options as to try to eliminate this from reoccurring.

Thank You,

The UPS Store 2777

name: Alan wilson
text: Family owned and operated. They are very personable and friendly!

resp.text: Thank you for your business, Alan. We truly appreciate it!

name: Kathryn B
text: This store helped format and print flyers and info cards for promotional purposes. They were great -- professional and friendly service, outstanding quality,  and timely delivery.

resp.text: Thank you, Kathryn. We appreciate your business!

name: Samantha Bell
text: They dilivered my mail in the rain without a response letting me know it was sitting on the porch clearly I was home and you could have knocked on the door my package is ruined $ 93 dwn the drain

resp.text:
Samantha,

We apologize for the package being ruined due to its placement during bad weather. Unfortunately, this store is a franchised retail store which is not owned by UPS, nor do we have anything to do with the package delivery aspect. For future complaints, the number to UPS is 1-800-742-5877, option 0. Thank you and again we apologize for UPS' poor decision making.

name: bmjnk3
text: Called and was told they closed at 5 on Saturday , same as listed on Google.  They close at 3pm wasted 20 minutes of my time driving here.

name: Vyom Parmar
text: No drop box!

resp.text: Hi Vyom.  I apologize regarding the issue you had with us not having a drop box.  If this need arises in the future, there is a drop box located in the parking lot of West Alabama Bank on 69 South.

name: Jennifer Reiff
text: This UPS store is being used to send out thousands of Spam mail.   At the bottom of every message says to write a letter to them to get off the list.  Why would I write a snail mail letter to get off a spam list?

resp.text:
Jennifer,

We apologize for the email issue. We were apparently hacked. Hopefully you are not receiving them anymore. Please let us know if this problem has persisted.

name: Jonathan R
text: This location is the one you need to use in Dothan. I’ve used all other locations around here, and the Apple Avenue location offers the quickest and friendliest service by far. They grabbed the door so I could haul in my items and took their time to figure out the best way to ship everything together for the lowest price. If a regional manager reads this review, Alan is #1 and needs a huge raise.

name: Gina Marie
text: Absolutely the friendliest, most helpful, super convenient place to pack & mail your important stuff. Prices are very fair & comparable. My new “go to” place! Thanks, local owners Wade & Ruby Miller for standing out above the rest.

name: Joan Brown
text: Always helpful. Pleasant clerk too.

name: A B
text: I haven't been to this location before and only went since I had an Amazon return. The fella who helped me was very professional and courteous. I apologize as I didn't remember seeing a name tag otherwise I'd thank him publicly on here. I also cannot wear a mask and no mention of it came from him. He scanned the code off my phone and took the package. I was there less than 30 seconds. It was clean inside and easy to find.

name: Sabrina Rohr
text: Had a very nice laptop computer to send to our grandson so he could complete his high school work.  It was in already in a box of course but the UPS Store recommended that it be placed in another protective box.  He boxed it up and ensured there was more than adequate packing material used.  The computer arrived on schedule with the outer box intact.  It was perfectly fine when our grandson opened the box, inspected the computer for damage, turned it on and made sure it operated correctly, and it did with no problems.  I am completely satisfied with my experience with this UPS Store with them also being so very nice, friendly, and professional.

name: Scott Trott
text: Who reviews a UPS store?  Well, this one needs it.  They are always super helpful.  Today I had an amazon return and had messed it up.  They went out of their way to fix it and make my day that much better. They did not have to do that.  Very impressed.

name: J T
text: Wouldn't let me ship a package without a phone number and ID. I'll gladly take my business elsewhere.

name: Soritza Robinson
text:
My daughter and I went into this branch store to mail and care package to my nephew that had braces placed today. I'm a dentist and I making sure he has all the necessary items to keep a healthy smile.
The staff took out every single item in my sucured bag to place it in a box. I've never experienced anything like this before and I've used this store several times. The service was unprofessional! I will drive further out to use Safe Ship on Murphey Mills Rd to mail anything else in the future.

name: Barbara Taylor
text: Staff are friendly and efficient. Usually no line.

name: Jesse Hardin
text: Kristine went above and beyond to help me. Highly recommend.

name: ElizaBeth Elliott
text:
Awesome Customer Service!
Thank you Ms. Jean and Ms. Terri!

God bless you and The UPS Store ❤️

name: Autumn Jones
text: I've always been able to drop off my USPS packages and receive a receipt confirmation.  But now they refuse to give one, leaving the customer with no proof that they actually mailed anything.  Not cool and not safe for the customer.  Don't offer to accept packages for USPS if you refuse to give a receipt for them.  I'll definitely take my business to the other location in town, where they DO provide drop off receipts.  Without a receipt, packages can easily be walked off with and you are left with zero proof that you dropped off a package in the first place.

resp.text:
Autumn,

I understand your concern in not receiving a receipt for your USPS package.  We provide a service to our USPS customers by providing a convenient and safe location to drop off USPS packages.  Those packages are in a secure area of our store until they are picked up by USPS.  We opened in 2018 and elected at that time not to provide receipts for USPS packages.  USPS does not provide us with a receipt when they pick up.  We do provide receipts for all UPS shipments and all UPS drop offs shipments.

Wade Miller
Owner of The UPS Store

name: Debbie Latta
text: Alway been super friendly, fast and very helpful.

name: Vilma Perez-Munoz
text:
Amazing service, super friendly and made me love UPS again! New loyal customer here!!!
Their smile was so nice in a world that doesn't smile much anymore. :)

name: KevinMcPCFII
text: Quick and efficient service. It is a very convenient location. So glad there is a location on the West side!

name: Dave Wiltshire
text: Finally, a location on the west side of town. Great customer service with a smile!

name: Toni Woodham
text: Great, friendly service!

name: Linda Whitehead
text: Excellent service

name: Gottfried Kibelka
text: Friendly, professional, and efficient. I wish they had an online gadget that could tell me if the last truck had already picked-up. Getting there shortly after 5 pm might make you miss the truck meaning that your overnight is delayed by a day. When I missed the pickup the service representative let me know the next pickup place to try and catch the truck. I did appreciate the information.

name: Katie Caldwell
text: Randy and John are always so kind, friendly and courteous. They are such a help and we love bringing our shipments to them! Many thanks to them for being an all star team!

name: Nancy Hunter
text: Closed for whatever reason but not stated on website under hours. Nor is there just a drop box during CLOSED times.

name: Jack Herman
text: Jasmian was a HUGE help and finished packing and sending my boxes for me because I was in a rush.  Great customer service, thanks guys!!

name: GRANDMLLLC COMPANY
text: FRINDLY STAFF BUT SLOW SERVICE

name: Tiffany Taylor
text: I didn’t get the assistant managers name on 6/10/21 but he was very helpful!

name: Jennifer Brasher
text: I needed some help scanning some documents to email.  The woman working this afternoon was extremely helpful.  I was able to get it done quickly.  I never expected it to be so quick and easy!  Thank you!

name: Lillian Maatouk
text: Amy is a hard worker. Always smiling and great with customers. All the customers appreciate her

name: George Faragalla
text: Amy B. Works hard and smiling. Good customer service!

name: Renee Lewis
text: Excellent customer service!

name: Terrell Griffin
text: The people working there the two times i went there were great and helped me get in and out in as fast as possible. They were great people and I wouldn't mind going there for any future projects.

name: Rebecca Fisher
text: Very efficient.  Very helpful.  Took care of my needs with a smile.

name: Tracy Kiker
text: These are some of the nicest and most helpful ppl that work there.

name: C K
text: They're always quick amd helpful.  A go to drop off.

name: William Dougan
text: neighborly, clean, very helpfull. I am not an employee of fedex :)

name: Kim P
text: Stood in line for 20min with 2 employees and only 3 customers in front of me.  I just wanted to drop off a package.

name: william smith
text: they cant scan my documents but will RENT me a computer so I can do it

name: Erin Talbot
text: Slow service. Pricy. At least they are open 7 days a week.

name: Brianne Harrelson
text: They were very helpful and was very fast.

name: Pam p
text: Ms. Rhonda was very nice and helpful

name: Pgp Newyork
text: we ship anything... UNLESS we can’t be bothered to wrap it!  Tried to ship a large return here, thu didn’t have a box and would not allow me to buy the supplies to make one...pitiful service!

name: Johnney07
text: I was suppose to gotten a package yesterday. It left oxford, al yesterday morning and now it says it is in Georgia. Now it says it won't deliver until Tuesday. Slow service.

name: Nathaniel “Ryan” Bowman
text: Don't expect fast service.

name: Nathaniel “Ryan” Bowman
text: Don't expect fast service.

name: Britt Jones
text: Terrible customer service!!  It pains me to say being I try to always buy local but this business is clueless and has the absolute worst customer service.  Their unresponsive and just downright rude.

name: Scottie N LaSha Page
text: Great employees in the hr dept! So helpful & friendly!

name: Eric Selz
text: A low cost, and independent folding carton manufacturer.

name: Teresa Goins (Nana ReeseCup)
text: Job hunting

name: Timothy coy Panter
text: Nice people

name: Jim Dodgen
text: It's work.

name: Shoggoth Fodder
text: I've been here maybe four times and have absolutely nothing to complain about.  The service is always incredibly friendly and helpful, and they really know their stuff.  I guess if I had to find a negative, it would be that the room is a bit small and can be crowded at times, but the kindness and friendliness of the staff make it an enjoyable place to be.  This place is well run, well organized, and well maintained.

name: Joe Tillman
text: I’m not sure what the folks with 1 Star or giving bad reviews. Went in there today for a public notary. The woman there was more than helpful and found me the cheapest shipping rates. Great experience.

name: Farrah Tucker
text: This place is horrible! My husband went in to ship a 2 oz bottle of vitamins back to the company and he was charged $18! They charge for a box and peanuts which is fine but they also charged him $5 to put it in the box! She never told him that he could avoid this charge if he packaged the item himself! I have always known that they were outrageously high on shipping but I will definitely never step foot back in this place! I don’t mind paying for goods and services but I never expected to be robbed by someone just to put a bottle in a box and tape it it up with tape and a box that I paid for! These people should be ashamed!

name: Amy Starkey
text: This lady charges wayyy too much. $5 to package something I had already bubble wrapped. Never going back.

name: doris breasseale
text: Great ladies to do business with.  Very helpful!!

name: Stahler Heath
text: Great customer service

name: Sarah Capps
text: Great fast hones service, if the USPS can do it cheaper, they will let you know.  But usually I'm there because I don't want to wait in line at the USPS

name: G Mitchell
text: Very High Ship rates.. wanted $49 to ship  my package with UPS... I went 1/2 mile away and shipped with another Large UPS "retailer" for only $25.00! $24.00 savings! Later ,I checked on UPS site and sure enough the listed shipping rate(listed on website) was $25.. but some shady "retailers" add  very LARGE additional fees.. Beware of pakmail

name: Maggie Wright
text: Best ever people very friendly

name: Summer Todd
text: Came in desperate 1 minute before closing time and the lady helped me and never once acted bothered by helping me. This place is great because of the ladies that work there!!

name: Amanda Havely
text: Absolutely sad. Misinformed, ignorant. Waste of time and money for the company. If I was the employer I would be upset.  Will not ever return. Some businesses thrive when they mind their own businesses.

name: Rich Morovitz
text: Very friendly and courteous staff, tremendously helpful in shipping my bulky packages.

name: M Kennedy
text: Always attentive and nice.

name: Stephanie Pugh
text: Very nice lady

name: Frank George
text: Complete ignorance. One poor girl working in there on a Saturday with at least 20 people lined up out the door. Cannot believe they try to run a business this way. Waited 15 min to drop off a prelabeled box. She said that the store was not allowed to have more than one employee working on Saturdays.

resp.text:
Good Morning George,
Sorry to hear about your bad experience at our store. We are currently understaffed and urgently hiring as you see everywhere right now. We are doing our best to run the store with the employees we have. We apologize for your wait. If you ever have a prelabeled box with UPS or USPS label and don't need a receipt you are welcome to put it on the front counter.

Thank you,
The UPS Store

name: Shelby Cleveland
text: I’ve never had an issue before sending my ole man his cigars from this location. Now all of sudden they can’t, some kid was doing the check out and didn’t feel comfortable sending them, even had the nerve to ask me if they was even cigars in it. Each package was still sealed in the box. Will never use this ups again. 👎👎

resp.text:
Good Morning  Shelby,
I am very sorry about your experience at our store. However, when our employee was informed you was shipping cigars our store reserves the right to refuse, due to our location not having a license. Shipments containing tobacco products are accepted for transportation only from shippers who are licensed and authorized to ship tobacco products based on local and federal laws. Therefore, against local and federal laws our store under no circumstances may ship tobacco. My employees are aware of this, therefore is why they refused to ship your tobacco. I also would like to inform you UPS prohibits the shipment of cigarettes or cigars to consumers regardless of the destination state. I am sorry for your frustration as we follow local and federal laws pertaining to tobacco.

name: wade graff
text:
on behalf of 24/7 Contracting, I had wonderful service here,
Great and friendly staff working this morning.  This will be my go-to place for copies or anything I need for my office. A+.
Thank you guys so much.

name: Amy Parker
text: I shipped a card on November 13th, using their "Priority" option.  I specifically asked the girl, "What is the fastest for it to get there and how much?". She said, " Priority will get it there by Saturday.". It is now November 30th, and the card has been all over the place, but where it was to be delivered!   I called the store, and their only response is to call the UPS 1-800 #.  But because THEY didn't send it via UPS, but instead decided to MAIL (without me knowing) it via the USPS, UPS will not talk to me!  This store is not the only option in town, and I will not use them again.  But I will be sure to let everyone know the job they did!

name: General Lee
text: I needed to return a tablet I purchased from Amazon. The girl at the counter was extremely kind and courteous and made the process easy. I shipped the tablet in the box back for $20. Quick and simple!

name: n8
text:
Nice and friendly staff.  I called prior to going because I wanted to confirm if the bad reviews were true about their pricing for boxing.
I understand that a business needs to make money and just make sure you box up what ever you're shipping, or it may fit in their inexpensive shipping bags.

name: Byron Phillips
text: Incompetence by definition. The owner of this business should watch any video he may have of 07/11/20 between 10:45-11:00 a.m. of his employee spending 30 mins with 2 customers who have NO information about what and/ where they are sending a package. As she laughs & they talk on the phone & hold hands. The owner may also want to take notice of ALL of the people (business) that walks out the door.

name: Daniel cook
text: This location is closed

name: Cheryl Gatlin
text: They are always really helpful and friendly at this store.

name: Jason Nicklaus
text: This place obviously gets a bad rap from the reviews I saw so I thought I would share my experiences. I have used shipping, printing, and faxing services at this location and have never had any issue. Every staff member I have dealt with was very friendly and helpful and even went as far as to listen to my small business pitch and take my business cards (they didn't print) to hand out to prospective clients. The only negative I could possibly come up with would be the shipping cost but that is set by UPS and not this branch. I would recommend them to anyone who needs their services.

name: Mike Bradford
text: Complete rip off. Charged $67.00 for a box and bubble wrap. Was not told the price until being rung up. I questioned the associate and she had no control over it. Do not get them to box up anything.

name: Robby Walker
text: This is the 2nd time I have used this store over the last 2 months. Both times I dropped off the package by 8:00am . Both times my packages were not processed until after 5:00pm that day and NOT picked up by UPS until the following day. When  I ship something, time is usually an important factor. I lost a full day, plus it pushed it into the holiday weekend costing even more days. USPS always processes my packages on the same day ... I'm not sure why it takes so long with UPS. I am a very dissatisfied customer.

name: Greg T.
text: People are snooty and try to up-sale you. Also the google information pictures are outdated and show pictures of the old store and location shown at street view is without the store anywhere because that view is outdated. .

name: Kayla Palmer
text: Got an estimate of $3 online. Needed a box, thought a few more $. Went to the store and was charged $54! What a ripoff. They’re con artists of the worst kind. I hope corporate shuts them down.

resp.text: Ms. Palmer, we are very sorry about the confusion with the cost of our packing and shipping service. Unfortunately, we are not sure what tool you used online to get that estimate. Neither UPS nor any other shipping service has the capability to ship a canvas for only three dollars. We always recommend you call or come by our center to obtain a more accurate quote, since shipping prices vary according to multiple factors, such as dimensional weight and shipment location. Our certified packing experts packaged your canvas according to corporate standards, using a quality shipping box and packaging materials, to protect and insure it against loss and damage during transit with our Pack and Ship Guarantee. We hope you can see the value in allowing us to pack your fragile item. Again, we apologize for the misleading estimate you received online. We hope you will consider shipping with UPS in the future.

name: ER DRAFTERS AND DESIGNERS
text: We have been doing business with these guys for over a year.  They are GREAT!! Supper friendly and provide awesome customer service.

name: Melanie Lawson
text: Needed special printing done. They were very helpful and made some suggestions to help the printing look great.

name: Brett Rogers
text: they charge $70 for 3 months and won`t give a refund back after the days of having it & wanting to cancel it. advertises it can be used as physical address-but that`s not the reality. better off sticking with usps then this hoax! usps will also refund you your $. i think this place is for money laundering & drug deals.

resp.text: I apologize for your undesirable experience. However, when the question was asked about cancelling the service in our initial discussion before the Mailbox was rented we explained that Mailbox Services are Non Refundable. I am sorry for your frustration, as we tried to relate our policies clearly when the mailbox was opened and the Mailbox Service Agreement was signed for over two weeks ago on August 8, 2016.

name: Darrin Gordon
text: Very slow loading. Four hours, I was only truck there

name: Will Rasely
text: Great place for corrugated boxes.

name: Ashley Langston
text: Chris is awesome , very nice guy , nice place to have a unit ....

name: Ang MCcarty (tater tot)
text: Horrible place ruined my storage over charge and was robbed and they cussed me . Horrible don't use don't go near.  Just horrible owners and employees was long time customer. Now hate that I lost almost everything to rain leakage or rats eating my furniture.  Was so sad and they cussed me out.  Wow

name: Angela Cameron
text: Horrible don't use they charge to much and don't care abt ur stuff. My stuff got ruined by leak in roof and they bullied me cause I wanted them to replace . well they didn't and were horrible to me afterwards they called and hung up on my cell phone for a month everyday. Don't use them .

name: William Lafayette
text: Good prices and friendly staff

name: Will Thornton
text: Older storage facility, decent sized units, and fairly clean, great staff as well!

name: Deborah Lamb-Davis
text: It's fine. Only been there once.

name: Palmer Alexander
text: Went to the car wash on the side of the storage building

name: Larry Waldrup
text: Keypad entrance is a nightmare.

resp.text: we got a brand new one installed a few months ago, sorry for the inconvenience!

name: aseel jad
text: Most likely the worst customer service experience in my life. From the only employee I’ve ever seen there (Jay?) to the actual customer service online. The employee clearly wasn’t trained on how to properly communicate to customers as there are a couple of issues that I would like to point out from that alone. He speaks in a manner that tells me, “Get out of my face, I don’t want to deal with this,” or “I know what I’m talking about and you don’t,” which seems to not be the case as I’m reading the everlasting one-star ratings. We walk into the store with no one at the front office and him doing whatever that he does. After the wait, he comes out, talking on the phone. I cannot even begin to explain how and why this was extremely disrespectful and even offending. We were having issues with the transaction of our package, however the way handled this was- to say the least- atrocious. He started muttering under his breath in his language, no doubt something less than appropriate in the workforce, directly to our faces. Not to mention the stench of smoke was absolutely putrid in this building. It’s atrocious. I was thankful I had my mask, but it was still so strong that I couldn’t wait to exit the establishment (from both his attitude and the stench). Speaking of masks, he did not have one throughout the entire time I came in. In a pandemic. Do I need to elaborate any further? In case you thought there couldn’t be any more wrong with this situation, I called customer service and got hung up twice. The third time they tell me I have to make an account on their website in order to have any of my questions answered. That is by far the most ridiculous thing I’ve ever heard and if they wasn’t enough, when I actually made an account, they acted as if I didn’t. I don’t think they actually allow customer service calls at all and this is their way of doing so. This is just for this location because I called customer service for every other UPS near me and they picked up right away. I am 110% sure that Jay is the reason I cannot call, as he was using the phone for his own personal enjoyment. I have nothing to say about this entire matter except that I will never be going here again. It’s worth the extra drive.

name: Alex Bemis
text: Went in to return a package. The company I was sending it back to said if I don’t have a printer, I can take the package and my phone to a UPS store and they can scan the label from my phone. The man at the store refused to scan the label and he can’t print it out, even though the large sign on the door says “we print”. Don’t waste your time going to this store.

name: Michael Chandler
text: Wish I had read these reviews before stopping into this UPS store. One star is too high for this location. Had two documents notarized and the guy charged $40, $20 a page, ridiculous. Could have had the same notarized  at the UPS store on 31 for $15. Stay away from this place.

name: Chris Villa
text:
For the second time I dropped off a Amazon return. Owner was on phone, scanned my return, said I didn’t need return tracking after I requested.

No refund, item not returned, says Amazon.

Second time Amazon went ahead and gave me the refund anyhow.

Yeah Amazon!!!!!

Lesson finally learned........

name: Suzanne Talley
text: This place is horrible! If you’re not a smoker you will hate it! Why is this even legal???? And the service is just as bad. I don’t do reviews but hope UPS will do something about this place. It’s the closest one to us but I will drive to the next one.

name: scott Ludwick
text: Guy is clueless. Tells me its "against UPS policy to print their own labels.

name: Akio Horri
text: Literally have never had any of the bad experiences people are talking about. Not great service but it's passable. Also people who complain about the cigarette smell, its literally right next door to a cigar shop...

name: BJ Vail
text:
Smells horrible. It used to smell like incense or hookah. Now it’s like really old cigarette smoke. Hate that this is the closest store to me.

Decent service... horrible smell.

name: Katherine Simpson
text: Wish I could give it 0 star. Smells like smoke every time. They literally close down the back in the middle of the day when they are supposed to be open alllll the time. When I asked about their hours the employees was super rude.  Not worth going here. There are other ups stores I’d rather drive a little farther to.  Ups should fire the guy that works here most of the time. He sucks and is going to lose them business. Should honestly just close down this location.

name: Manish e.v
text:
worst service i have experienced with this store. Those guys are very rude and they r not at all helpful.
I really suggest you to pick some other store.

name: Fred Jeffrey
text: I've visited this location 3 times and all 3 times they were very unprofessional and rude. When I drop off stuff at Inverness &/or Greystone locations, I get a "drop off receipt". Not at this location and when I asked about it, the guy got an attitude with me. On my most recent visit, I dropped off a return for Amazon which is now lost (or not shipped yet) my guess is the latter (10 days since I dropped off). Thankfully I made the guy let me take a pic of the packing slip since he refused to provide me with a "drop off receipt".  Also, like others have stated this place smells like smoke due to there being a cigar shop next door.  I HIGHLY suggest you avoid this UPS location and go to ANY OTHER locations where they care about their customers and actually do their job!!!

name: Melissa Shepherd
text: This store smells like cigarette smoke. Employee wasn't wearing a mask even though it is a state mandate.

name: Kenny Spradling
text:
UPS damaged my package (my wife's anniversary present) in transit and told me to work with the owner of the store to file a claim. Over the next few months, the owner would tell me he put in the claim, but customer service tells me the owner never filed one. So, someone is lying to me and I'll never be able to recoup what I lost on her present.

Overall, UPS has designed their damaged goods process so the customer has no way of recovering either the item or their monetary value.

Do not use this store and don't use UPS.

name: K Curt
text: Horrible service. I went to check on a package that we dropped off almost a month ago. The guy didn't even try to look around to see if it had gotten over looked, he immediately got hostile and tried telling me to contact to receiver. Then he said to contact UPS customer service.  UPS tracking says it was never even shipped. UPS having to open a lost package claim. I'm never using this UPS Store again.

name: Games Luis
text:
First UPS store I come to that doesn't have access to their own store email. They refused to print a label I had because there was "no way I could get it off my phone" no pendrive was offered, nothing. It was like they just didn't want to print my label I had from my email

Edit: by reading other reviews, it is obvious that they refused service because I wasn't going to purchase anything from the store. This is unbelievable.

name: Leisha Kennedy
text: Don't go here! Very unprofessional and rude. I had taken a package here for an amazon return. I brought my own shipping label. I was told you by the clerk at the UPS store, know this is not free! Obviously I knew it was not free. Fast forward to today, I had not received a refund on my credit card yet. I went to the store and the clerk argued with me that they do not put tracking numbers on packages that it happens when it gets to the warehouse. I told him that's impossible and showed him a copy of the label in my hand. He kept repeating that he does not have the tracking number and I needed to call UPS Corporate to have them tell me the tracking number. I left in frustration and told him he better pray that my package turns up, it's value was 400 dollars I am not just going to let that go. I came back to my office and called 4 different 800 numbers given by the customer support reps at UPS. All of them told me that he has to give me a tracking number. I go back and tell him what UPS said and he finally asked for my phone number and guess what?!?!?!? he had the tracking number! DO NOT GO HERE!

name: Prince Amariru
text: Very poor customer service. The smells like cigarettes too. Plus the guy lied to my face .

name: Rob McDonald
text: Went to drop an Amazon return (shoes) which were shipped to me in their own box, unsealed, inside of a thin white plastic bag which was sealed. When I asked for such a bag the clerk said "that's just what they ship in - we don't have those" as though I should have known that. But as I was in a hurry and had already driven there, I agreed to let them put it in a box and seal it. This cost me $11! Not for shipping, just a box and tape. And mild rudeness. I won't go back to this one. Most are staffed by friendly, helpful people. That was not my experience at this location.

name: Jonathan Theisen
text: Literally in and out in 30 seconds. Super easy process

name: James Hill
text: Don't do it!! Go elsewhere!!! Charged me $6.53 for a BOX to return a pair of Bose Headphones. The bad attitude, however, was absolutely free. The other reviews were spot-on. The place does smell like cat pee and cigarette smoke. I don't recommend this UPS Store.

name: Leslie Busby
text: Went to store at 8:40 and waiting for 15 min still no service. The store opens at 8:30 & I saw him unlock the door. I called but no answer. Very disappointed & btw the office is a complete mess & it stinks.

name: Kimberly Bearden
text: Awful customer service and very rude staff.  I actually waited until I was sure my package was received by the recipient before posting this review because I felt sure the staff would have thrown my package away if I had reacted in a reciprocating manner or mentioned that I would be giving them a poor review.  The store smelled awful as well.  I was amazed that this was even a UPS store - I never have had more awful service.

name: Mary Dixon
text: This is the third time this week I’ve tried to drop off a package before work. Don’t claim you open at 7:30 if you’re not going to open at that time. I’m surprised this store is still in business.

name: justin bailey
text: Two out of the three times I’ve come by here in the past two weeks the inside of the store has actually been closed and I’ve come by around 3 both times. The only reason I’m back for a third time is because the gentleman working did not cover the original label with the return label instead covering my return label inky for my package to be shipped back to my house rather than being returned. I will never use this place again unless it’s to tell the worker inside how stupid he is.

name: Savannah Kliman
text: Had a very important package I needed AND PAID EXTRA to have next day shipped to me. Had issues and now it's been 6 days, and my package still hasn't arrived. Tried contacting the store, over a span of 8 hours, 17 different times and not a SINGLE time did anyone answer. On top of that, I would get sent to voicemail half of the time, considering it would ring once and immediately send me to the mailbox- compared to the others when it would ring out several times. I do not understand how the employees could be so incompetent as to even allow this to happen. Customer service was also useless, 0/10. Would never recommend this store to anyone.

name: Shannon Jenkins
text: The staff is VERY rude. Especially one lady who works the front. I pay extra for next day shipping and they never get there in time. I have called corporate many times wondering if my packages get lost on the truck, they always tell me that the store is misplacing them before they get picked up. I have gone to speak with staff members about this and I always get yelled it and told that I am wrong. I will no longer use this location.

name: Misty Doles-Busic
text: Walked through the door on an August summer day and it was so hot you couldn’t breathe inside and on top of that it smelled like cigarette smoke. Besides that, no one helped me. Never again.

name: Tommy Daspit
text: Completely worthless and unhelpful. Would NEVER go back there again. TERRIBLE customer service.

name: john glancy
text: Worst service and employees ever, they should have their franchise removed. Shipped a tablet and phone, had them pack it, and also purchased insurance. Box was heavily dented on arrival and the tablet screen was broken. It has been a non-stop run around trying to file a claim with these people. Initially filed over two weeks ago. They asked for photos and a receipt, which I promptly emailed. I have since; called over a dozen times to which I can never reach the original employee, never received feedback via email, and I have even driven over there twice at which both times they were closed on posted business hours. STAY FAR AWAY FROM THIS STORE!

name: Claire Tolbert
text: Drive to a different UPS! They told me it was $30 to send a 1oz envelope for ground shipping! I went to another UPS in Vestavia and it cost $9 for the same thing. They obviously upcharge because UPS shipping is standardized across all stores. The staff wasn't wearing UPS shirts or nametags and the had their personal cigarettes on the counter. Place smells like smoke, they upcharge, and were very unprofessional!

name: Jason Mccormick
text:
If I could give this store -10 I would. I shipped a chainsaw from this location and was told it would arrive a few days. The tracking number was never activated, I tried calling several times and never reached the owner. Finally I got to speak with the owner and he couldn't tell me anything about my package. The district manager got involved and he admitted this location had issues with items coming up missing. After a week, I went back down there and pretty much threaten the owner... a miracle happened and my saw was in the back and never shipped...
Excuse was,"we put the package in the sun and label come off and they had no idea who's it was".

I would avoid this store and go to the other Pelham location or Valleydale Rd.

Bunch of thieves.

name: JT Lane
text: I went into this place on 6-4-2016 just to ask a few questions about sending something back I had bought through Amazon.   The guy I had to talk to that day was a complete jerk.  Acted as if I was asking stupid questions and should go away.  This is how he made me feel.  I will drive 5 miles the other way and go to another store.   Just like other people have commented, they do not won't your business and do not know the  meaning of customer service.

name: Linda Edwards
text: I used them for my business & rented mail box & never had a problem..Jay is owner I assume & he has always been very helpful....he has been short of help at times..

name: Eartha Drew
text: I often used this UPS store but the last few times I had to hold my breath because of the strong smell of tobacco smoke. One employee told me that they now allow the employees to smoke in the store. Can't imagine what the smoke does to the open cards, paper, and packaging material?

name: bob hyatt
text:
I dropped off two packages on November 7, headed to San Antonio TX.  Paid a whopping $172.00 to ship them (about 50 pounds total).  I noticed late that night that the tracking only said "label has been produced" but none of the usual arrival/departure scans.  Package was promised to be delivered by November 10.

Next day I called and the owner/manager? (Patel) told me it was put on a truck to the UPS facility in Birmingham that same day.  Still no tracking.  I called the next day, same story and still no tracking.  Thursday night I contacted UPS (not this rag-tag store) and initiated a lost package (2) investigation.  That dragged on through the weekend.  Monday I called the local UPS store and was again guaranteed it had left their store on the 7th.  I called UPS that afternoon and they were still looking.

I noticed that last night (November 13) the package magically showed up with an arrival scan at the local UPS facility in Homewood.  One week late.  I tried to call the UPS store a dozen times this morning but get the "this number has not set up a voice mail..."  I called the missing package group at UPS again and they told me it had been in the local UPS store the entire week., was found and shipped last night.  But that is not the end of the story.

The tracking now shows delivery is scheduled for Thursday, November 24.  This store was too sorry to upgrade the shipping after they had held it for a week.  I would suggest to everyone that you do NOT ship from this location.  The Alabaster UPS store told me they had heard plenty of complaints about this store.  UPS should close them down.

I wish there was something worse than one star to give them.  Worst customer service I have ever had.  Then they lie to me about it being shipped.  And then did not upgrade to next-day which would have only made the package 5 days late.  I plan on explaining to them why this is not acceptable, in court.

name: Kelly Gartman
text: A fax of 12 pages cost me $24.00!! Definately overpriced and customer service was not "all that"... Suggest you go elsewhere!!

name: Mary Honnoll
text: I over nighted some meds to my husband in Texas.  Somehow the package that Jay wrapped was opened and thrown away.  It was pain meds.  Now 3 weeks later still no refund and I have talked to people that all tell me something different and they will call me back.  Not one return call so far.  I used FedEx last time no problem.

name: Pj Ward
text: I use this store regularly.  I have always found the staff to be courteous and helpful.

name: Jack Smith
text: Went there to ship some items to my brother. The owner was very helpful in helping me pack  the items and ship them.

name: Jimmy Johnson
text: Have a sign in the window that’s says we print and had 2 separate people tell me they can’t print a prepaid label. Funny cause I do this all the time at other ups stores. Will be complaining to UPS. Surely they don’t want someone using their name treating customers like this

name: Juan Mejia
text: Worse customer service

name: T S
text: I call and call during business hours. No answer! No voicemail!

name: Jeannine Cain
text: We dropped off a package to mail April 15th, 2019 in the afternoon, but it is showing that it never shipped.  We have filed a claim with USPS and have sent an email to the UPS store.  Hopefully it shows up, but we will not be using this store again.  I really hope that the package is found ASAP.

name: Elizabeth Gar
text:
I was there in the morning, the sign shows that they open at 7:30 am I was there at 7:35 am to drop off a package . I waited to see if they would open  until 8:07 am , the place was closed.
Very unprofessional. Stick by your sign and your business hours.

name: Rakesh Chalakapalli
text: Poor quality of service, I like UPS in general they are best of all of the courier services but this store is very badly maintained no courtesy towards customers

name: Boyi Guo
text: Couldn’t be worse. Can’t even speak to people politely.

name: Yuanjing Wang
text: No nice story

name: Ryan Williams
text: Not helpful.  They lost a package and I had to pry information out of them to reach a useless resolution.

name: Mlu Rucker
text: Called first to be sure open until 2:30 on Sat., before driving all the way down there.  Got there at 2:23 pm and was dark & locked up.  They should have told me if they planned to close early.

name: Blake Tidwell
text:
Store opens at 8:30 am on Saturdays.  I pull up at 8:20 and see the hours posted so decide to wait.  It is 8:45 now and still not open.  Keep telling myself they will be here any minute...but who knows.

8:51...still waiting

name: Sammy Po
text: Helpful, promptly forwards mail.

name: Ann Puccio Tyler
text: Horrible, do not use.  Not helpful.  There are too many of these stores to choose from so never again with this bunch.

name: Jennifer Roach
text: Came here to try and get something notarized. Only the front half of the store is open (mail boxes). The actual counter for printing and staff is locked up.

name: Steve Sink
text: I have used the services of this UPS Store numerous times and have always been pleased. I’ve mailed many packages & urgent delivery envelopes, never with any problems. I’ve also asked them to do a handful of print jobs. Even though they were small jobs (minuscule profit to them, I’m sure) the owners were always careful to understand what I was trying to accomplish, advised me on best options, and the results were outstanding every time. I think they’re great!

name: Jaz Wilson
text: I love this place. I order all of my supplies for my small business and have them sent here, where I have a personal mailbox. My fiancé and I are “regulars” and we always get a first class experience. Highly recommend.

name: baalu v
text: Phone doesn’t work at all. Don’t know how they are running business.

name: Amy Johnson
text: This location refused to notarize our marriage certificate. I don’t know what possible reason they have for rejecting our business, but I certainly think it is inappropriate.

name: Chelsea Ryles
text: Guy at the counter was rude about getting invitations I ordered cut . I don’t need to be told what I ordered . I asked could they be cut ..it’s a yes or no answer ...will not return to this location

name: Alisha Fulenwider
text: Jarrett is the absolute best driver!!! So many times I have called upon him to take care of packages and deliveries!! He always comes through with a smile and he makes our clinics pick-up the best part of our day!!! So many great saving moments from one person!!! Jarrett, & UPS- thank you!!!! Thanks for always going out of your way to take care of us!!

name: Colby Lane
text: This is a best Shipping and mailing service.

name: Gonzo Thegreat
text: Only 1 out of 4 employees wearing a mask. With over 1600 americans dead these past two days, this is putting the lives of customers at risk. If you go in here, protect yourself because it is clear this UPS location does not care about your safety.

resp.text: Thank you for visiting our store. We do care about customer safety as we installed the acrylic shields at our own personal cost back in March. When the Jefferson County ordiance went into effect in June, all employees are wearing masks.

name: Hill Allen
text: Have used them for both notary and faxing services.  Great customer service. Cheerful and good people. Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you! As owners, we strive to provide excellent customer service. We hope to see you soon. We appreciate your business.--The Basses

name: Major Khan
text: Much better than USPS, very courteous and helpful. though it is little bit expensive than USPS but much better behavior, convenient and courteous.

resp.text: Major Kahn, Thank you for your kind words! We take pride in our customer service and appreciate your business.

name: SamMuel Arter
text: Never a problem. Everyone is always happy to assist you as soon as you walk in. This store and UPS service is always up to the par. Keep it up!

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate your business.

name: HENRY LAPIDUS
text: I use this store for just about everything they do and I’m always satisfied

resp.text: Henry, We are grateful you took the time to give us a positive review. We truly appreciate your business!

name: Amanda Fox
text: Love picking up packages here! Prompt and friendly service.

resp.text: Amanda, Thank you for your business!

name: D Corbin
text: Really nice people , a great place to ship your packages!

resp.text: Darrell, Thank you for your kind words! We hope you are still coming to see us. We appreciate your business!

name: Charlene Samuels
text: Do not do fingerprints at this store

resp.text: We took over ownership at this location in June 2013 and have never offered fingerprinting services. Perhaps you visited a different UPS Store location in the area. We are all individually owned franchises.

name: Shawndrea Deshazo
text:
The worst customer service experience ever. I went to have invites printed while on my lunch break which typically does not take long. The owner Matthew Bass first stated that I would not be able to fit two 5x5 invites on one sheet of paper which is clearly incorrect. The owner proceeded to assist 3 customers which came in after I did and then stated that he could resize the invites or I could do it myself but I would have to come back. I again stated to him that I was on my lunch break and would need the print job done asap. He then stated I can't expect to come in and have a print job done immediately and I told him to dont worry about it. He proceeded to give me my flash drive and I asked who was the manager and he stated he was the owner and I stated you have wasted my time and I could have went to another store which would have been more helpful. The owner then stated well you have wasted my time with your attitude which was very rude. I felt that he did not know how to do the job and proceeded to push me off so he did not have to do it. I have been to two other UPS Stores which can have the print job done in 10-15 mins tops. I will never go to this store again

As you can see below the manager response is still rude and inaccurate. Again if you would like better service visit another UPS store. I went to the UPS store off of Valleydale and they complete the print job cut and resize within 30 mins.

resp.text: Shawndrea, We offered to produce your job for you to pick up at a later time. We do not offer print on demand, especially when customer jobs need to be resized and cut, as did yours. You forgot to mention that you walked out to your car, and that is when other customers were helped. You also forgot to mention that the owner was working by himself as his employee was at lunch. A print job that was emailed earlier in the morning was being produced and we have one color machine, so it's impossible to work on 2 print jobs at the same time. So, that order would have been completed first. That's why you were offered to leave your flash drive and come back. We do know that more than one file, 5x5, fits on one page. The owner misspoke because his mind was on the other print job. We produce hundreds of these type of print jobs (invites, note cards, business cards, etc) each year and would be happy to assist you in the future. The best way for us to produce print jobs is when customers email us their files: store0924@theupsstore.com and let us know when they are needed. Then, we can provide an accurate quote and time, so the customer doesn't have to wait in the store, especially if they are busy like you were.

name: Ismael Torres
text: Worse customer service, would no recommend use the place, have to wait 5 min for someone to come from the back to make everything complicated when i have a paid rretur label ready

name: A Robin
text: Do not go here if you need a passport photo!  Camera was falling apart.  No one knew how to print the photo or the specs for passport photos.  I was there almost 30 minutes and left for a photo at Walgreens.  And will now be in heavy traffic.

resp.text: Dear A Robin, We apologize for the inconvenience of not getting your passport photo when you needed it done. Please come back and see us. We are happy to print one for you at no cost. --Matthew and Stephanie Bass, franchise owners

name: Clinton Kennedy
text: Expertly ran store

resp.text: Clinton, We appreciate your business! Come back and see us again. --Stephanie, owner

name: john dabrowski
text: Very helpful staff

name: Jose Munoz
text: Super nice gang

resp.text: Thank you, Jose. We appreciate your business!

name: James Phear
text: great service, never any problems, always happy to do business there

name: Chris Forbes
text: Always a positive experience. In and out very quickly.  Especially with Amazon returns. Convenient to my neighborhood.  Great folks to do business with.

name: Gerald Reed
text:
this place is friendly and my score isn't a representation of the store but of the young man who waited on me. he is younger, like between 18 and 22. glasses and had a complex about himself as if he knows everything and no one else can tell him everything. I went to send off 3 packages and one of them was going to my grandma (which I explained it to him) he was more focused on what he "needed " to say versus on getting the customer in and out of the store. he was so slow, that a line starred forming behind me, to the point, other employees came out to see what the issue was. he needs to learn how to talk to people regardless of what they look like. I have 10 more packages to send off in the next 3 weeks, if I see him working, I'm walking out.

if I see one of the others working, I'll stay.

name: Pamela Martin
text: I would give Steve and this UPS store a 10-star rating if they allowed. I live in Richmond VA and needed a piece of furniture, not only packed and shipped, but picked up as well. I did not give great instructions as to where to go, but Steve found the furniture store to get my stool, the day it was ready, packed it like a professional mover would and I received in 2 days from our first chat! I actually asked him to get another from the same store and 2 hours later it was in the mail. And, could not be nicer man! Thanks Steve. Pam Martin

name: Carly
text: Always fast in and out. never had any bad experience.

name: Staci Galey
text: Staff always greets me when I walk in the door. They are always friendly, and very quick. Always leave me with a goodbye and have a nice day. Great service all around.

name: Ricky Smith
text:
What a joke!!!! I went in to send a briefcase back to my company in Atlanta and needed a box to send it in. The young guy behind the counter gave me a price of around $12.00 bucks. Thought was a little high so told him would get one from home and come back later. When I was leaving out of the store I noticed that they had moving boxes on display and picked out one for $2.50. Went to tape up the box myself and the guy said that I had to purchase the tape on the shelves to tape up the box. I asked him if I could use the tape machine behind him and he said that I could only use one piece across the bottom and said that wasn't sure it would hold. I said you couldn't add 2 more pieces and he said NO!!!    Can you freaking believe this???? I'm so PISS because of the at least 100 plus times in the last 10 years of doing business there. I know my little bit of business isn't going to affect this place either way, but someone should tell the owners of this place if they have to charge customers to use one or two pieces of box tape they should find another type of business to look into. Will never go back there again don't care if I have to drive my packages to where their going.
What A JOKE!!!!

name: Atarsha McMillian
text: I emailed the store a document I wanted printed along with all the details related to the printing specifications. Unknowingly, I left off one key detail. Once I went to pick up the documents and noticed the details were off, without hesitation, the staff offered to fix the issue and re-print the documents. It was ready on the date and at the time quoted for no additional cost. The service was kind, efficient and totally professional!

name: Bryan Parker
text: Friendly, helpful service. Very helpful with design ideas for graphics. Quick turnaround, great quality. Need keys cut? Can do. Need notary? Can do.

resp.text: Thank you Bryan! We appreciate you and your business!

name: Ben Hutsler
text: Best UPS Store anywhere! Always there to help out, ask questions and even help me bring boxes in from the car if they aren't too busy. I love Steve and Adam and the rest of the staff as they really seem to care about their customers. Keep up the great work all!

name: Jeanine Dumas
text: Very friendly staff, shipped a laptop and the staff packed it for me perfectly. My friend received it next day as promised and she commented on how well it was packed! Will use this store again

name: M. Williams
text: I always get better products than I asked for, at a lower cost than I expected. Steve and his entire staff are always friendly.

name: Erin Scott
text: Super friendly and helpful staff! Highly recommend this location. Great customer service.

name: Ben Turner
text: Great place to do business! Steve, Adam and the crew are always very helpful and more than once I have been unloading my vehicle to bring boxes into the store and I turn around and someone is there with a cart to help me! Thanks team for the great work! BH

name: William Frantom
text: Always friendly and accommodating.  I enjoy my visits and know that I will be treated as a valued customer.

name: Kenny Johnson
text: I took 4 days off to to receive a signature package never got it they kept telling me they would send ups driver refused to come down my road worst parcel experince ever

resp.text:
Kenny,
I am sorry about your experience you had while using UPS, However, we are not UPS. We are an independently owned and operated UPS Store located off of Highway 31 in Pelham. We do not have anything to do with the UPS drivers or deliveries. Here is a link to the location you are looking for

https://www.google.com/search?q=ups+customer+center+alabaster+al&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjk8aeH15rnAhXOfXAKHU7pDG4QuzEICigA&biw=1920&bih=937&dpr=1

thank you,
The UPS Store #1183

name: P F (Passiflora)
text: Small-business friendly! I have had a great experience every time.

name: John Garlick
text: They always get my print jobs done quickly, professionally and with great quality.  Awesome staff!

name: Retro Man
text: Just shipped a package from this location today and I was very impressed. Nice people.

name: Ryan Stuart
text: I couldn't possibly recommend another shipper more than these guys!  Totally professional and very accommodating!

name: Ramarao Chodavarapu
text:
Very courteous friendly and efficient service/help at every single visit.
Best little store in town!

name: Chuck Deering
text: This store is Great!...Wonderful staff, and fast service!

name: Lou Grala
text: Staff is always helpful and friendly.

name: Brittany Fischer
text: It’s smells so bad of cigarette smoke inside I could almost vomit 🤦🏻‍♀️

resp.text:
Hi Brittany, we believe you are confusing us with the other Pelham location. We are the south Pelham store located in the Keystone Shopping Plaza with Staples, Big Lots and The Foundry Thrift Store. Come visit us next time!

thank you
The UPS Store #1183

name: Creative IMD Source360-Media
text: Great Customer Service!! Every Day. The location is also a plus.

name: preston naish
text: Always fast and friendly

name: Tim Richardson
text: Best UPS store in the USA

name: Stacy Rakestraw
text: Very nice and welcoming!

name: Jim Brown
text: Been doing business here for 19 years! The staff is like family! Be sure to say "Hi" to Steve and Adam!

name: Katie Pitts
text: Very friendly associates.  They always help me when I'm in a pinch!

name: Shane Richardson
text: I've been using this store for 4 years now and couldn't be happier with all the staff there.

name: Defne Ozturk
text: Garret, Justin and Kenny were efficient, helpful and overall a great crew! They moved our 2 bedroom apartment in about 3.5 hours total, while also carefully packing our drawers, tables and all our big furniture. It was raining the entire time they were moving, but with their speed and packing barely any of our items got wet. Will recommend and use again!

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Defne. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us.

Cheers,

All My Sons Moving & Storage

name: April Hebert
text: I couldn’t say enough good things about All My Sons. They were extremely easy to work with and very professional. Emily, Garrett and Cameron did an exceptional job moving us out of our old home and into our new home. They took great care of our things and were very kind and respectful. They were a perfect balance of careful and speedy. All around a great experience and I would highly recommend them over and over again.

resp.text: April thank you for 5 stars!

name: Jasmine Jordan
text: If there was a way to give 0 stars I would. We had a terrible experience with this company. We called 3 weeks prior to move and set up the appointment for 8 am. We get a call 3 days before move in saying “we don’t think we will be able to make it to you”. Which is an  absurd excuse when we were the first people of the day. Do not book with this company because this is terrible business. We chose this company because we heard great things and that impression was not left. They then proceeded to ask if we could move the next day as if we don’t work full time jobs and can just take off when we want to. I cannot express how disappointed I am in this company and their ways of handling such ordeals. Please re consider before booking with them if you don’t want your plans canceled last minute. And please don’t hit me with sorry for the inconvenience cause that’s absolute bull. Be a better company and live up to your google reviews cause the service was trash.

name: Myra Rivers
text: Garret, Kalbe, Austin and Kenny were my movers and they showed up on time. I was moving my 3BR/2BA home into a storage unit until my new home is ready. Very polite and respectful. They took time out with me to listen to all my concerns and addressed each one specifically. They were careful with all my items and treated them as if it were their own personal property. They were efficient with the job and got it done in a timely fashion. I would like to use these gentlemen again on my next move to my new home.I can’t say enough about them. I will definitely use this company again. Also, Garrett Allen from the office was very helpful in letting me know upfront what the possible cost would be. Awesome efforts from all.

resp.text: Myra We are so happy to hear that!

name: Tonya Young
text: Terrence, Keddrick, and Kenny did an awesome job with my move today! They were on time and very professional. They moved very quickly and at the same time handled my things with care. I am very satisfied with the service I got with these 3 young men!

resp.text: Hi, Tonya. Your feedback is highly appreciated. Thank you for the review!

name: Lynette Clark
text:
WOW...The crew (Jay, Terrence aka Tee, Rom and Kenny) that moved us were AMAZING!!! I will name them the Fantastic Four :)  They had the best attitude and all worked so hard! They were also very polite and very neat!
When we get ready to move our items from storage to a new home, we will definitely use All My Sons Moving and ask for the Fantastic Four.

resp.text: Hi, Lynette. Your feedback is highly appreciated. Thank you for the review!

name: Steve Newsom
text: This is by far the best moving experience I've ever had. Very professional. No hidden fees or add on type BS. The 3 guys they sent (Terrence, Devonta, and Imani) worked fast while still paying attention to detail. Definitely ask for that team by name.

resp.text: Steve We are so happy to hear that!

name: Alisha Shearer
text: First and foremost the movers showed up without masks on.we have a toddler in the house and the business website specifically states that they adhere to covid 19 regulations. I'm here to tell you that this business does not have any regard for your health or your possessions. There is a lack of leadership at the office and the manager/supervisor Brad is a waste of space. He did not care about the problems we were having with his team.. I would have recieved better customer service from a brick wall. All my sons is a horrible and SOCIALLY IRRESPONSIBLE company. If you value yourself then you will not call these overpriced charlatans. This company has zero customer service and really deplorable movers. I had to ENLIST the help of my FAMILY to help the HIRED MOVING COMPANY to move things out of my home. Please stay away from this company.All my sons should be called ALL MY FAMILY because that's who had to move my things. The only person on that team who is a hard worker is Tawne. He really carried his team today. I feel like I just wasted my hard on money on this con of a company.

name: Jan Baker
text: Fabulous guys: Jacob in scheduling and 4 movers to load truck including Garret, Will, Kaleb and Kenny.  All were extremely hard working, very professional and personable, worked hard and fast the entire time and made sure everything was done exactly right!  Best movers I have ever used and I highly recommend them!  All My Sons moving is extremely fortunate to have such hard working and professional men representing the company!  Sincere thanks to these 5 guys for outstanding service!  Jan

resp.text: Hi, Jan. We appreciate the kind words and are glad we could provide you with a positive experience!

name: Jeremy Atchley
text: Josh Edison and his group did a great job getting us moved. The guys stayed focused, never complained about the three drops I requested, and moved fast. I want to commend Josh on his ability to stack and pack sensitive household items in climate storage. This is expensive and hard to find space but Josh made it happen. Best gift of the trip was there were no surprises at the end of the move. Overall, I was pleased with the value of this service.

resp.text: Hi, Jeremy. We are thrilled to learn that you had a positive experience with us!

name: Tiffany Williams
text:
I wasn't ale to use this company. But what I can say, they have GREAT stellar customer service reps. They were very friendly and nice. Made me feel comfortable during our conversation. I received my  quote and it wasn't in my budget because of my location. I still received a follow up call the following day. And even though I still couldn't use them. They recommended another moving company who may be able to help me and within my budget and closer.

The customer service was so AWESOME, just think how your moving experience would be. You said it AWESOME yet again.  I recommend
ALL MY SONS MOVING & STORAGE.

resp.text: Hi, Tiffany. Thank you so much for leaving us a stellar review!

name: Shena Gazaway
text: Terrence, Will, and Celeb were professional, timely, and were great with unpacking our pod. Highly recommend the service. Will use again.

resp.text: Hi, Shena. We appreciate the kind words and are glad we could provide you with a positive experience!

name: Bonnie Whitener
text: The movers I had--Garret, Gary, and Sam--were excellent. I had nothing broken and they set some of my furniture up for me. Garrett even carried my geriatric 60lb dog up two solid flights of stairs for me. All of them were respectful of my things and how difficult a move it was. They were very kind to me and I recommend asking for them by name. They make a great team and  deserve 5+stars. The biggest difficulty I had was with management. I needed my whole house packed. I commute 300 miles a week for my job and the biggest reason I contacted movers was for packing help. For whatever reason, this message did not get across to those who set up the move. This caused my move to be delayed for a day. It was only because Garret, Gary, and Sam came the following day with extra materials that I was packed up and moved out so efficiently. I recommend this company, these three movers in particular, but be crystal clear about your expectations when speaking to management.

name: Raven Miller
text: I would never recommend anyone to this unprofessional company! My husband and I were moving from our apartment to a temporary location. A mover named Will came in my home. I advised him what was and wasn’t supposed to go on their truck. He walks out calls his manager and tells him my home isn’t ready, and pulls off. Didn’t say anything to me and left his manager to call me to tell me he didn’t feel the home was ready. This is after I specifically told this boy what was to be moved and what isn’t. They don’t tell me how I should have my home set up for a move, I’m paying them!!! Move and focus on only what I tell you to focus on, simple! Luckily we had another moving company to help us, which was less expensive! I would never use or recommend anyone to use this careless company for moving purposes!

name: Laura Morris
text: We have used alot of moving companies in our time for major moves. We had a small move needed of basically one bedroom of furniture, dressers, TV, etc. All My Sons Moving far exceeds any company we  have ever used. Jay and Tommy were terrific and if we ever need moving services again we will surely hire All My Sons and request these two gentlemen.

resp.text:
Thank you for taking the time to share your experience!

That person was on their phone MULTIPLE times until they saw I was watching and they would put it down. I called the office while they were driving to the new place and told them about my problems and they told me they would tel that person to “pep it up” as if my money wasn’t being wasted. They also stopped at a gas station for 30 minutes and ended up behind us because they were thirsty. I understand the importance of hydration, but not while I’m paying for the time. Once they finally arrived, the  crew member did NOT “pep it up” and they lost a bottom part of one of my shelves so it sits crooked. I used this company in the past and had no issues but I will NEVER use them again after this experience and their unwillingness to make it right.

text: I will never be using this service again and would not recommend it to any one!! It was an absolute scam, as I have moved multiple times and have NEVER been charged this much for movers. Last week, I hired 2 movers for 2 hours and told it would be $129 for these 2 hours. When the move was complete I was then charged a total of $380 for 1.5 hours of work. When I called to verify why I was being charged $250 more than originally promised, they claimed it was a “travel fee” for the movers to travel to my apartment in downtown Birmingham. This was never explained to me and it’s absolutely ridiculous that I paid ~$400 for 1.5 hours of work for the movers to load 15 items into the uhaul that I provided!!! And I I tipped the movers $40 without knowing about these extra “travel fees” so my total was $420. Absolutely ridiculous!

text: Please read before you consider doing business with this company. They do not wear proper PPE(masks completely off, etc) when entering homes. This company lacks professionalism and decency. They do not value your time either. I hired this company a week in advance to move big items out of my home. I called first at 10am to get a time frame on when they’d arrive and they said within an hr. That hr turned into close to 6hrs. The only explanation i could think of is they were traveling on the other side of God’s back to get to my home. When they entered my place, they did not have on masks and they smelled like they took a lengthy break to get high. They entered the home briefly, asked a question, then left out saying they were getting the truck ready. There I was waiting for an hr or so for them to return and they did not. I spoke with their manager over the phone and he said they wouldn’t be returning with no explanation. I explained to him that the guys did not say anything other than they’d be back after getting the truck ready. The manager was uncooperative and hung up in my face. This whole process has been a nightmare. Please avoid this company when moving, it’ll save you a lot of time and energy. If i could give 0 stars i would.

name: Jared Cooper
text: Save yourself some trouble and do not use this company. They were supposed to show up yesterday to move us into our new home and called the morning of to inform me that the crew who was supposed to move us “did not show up.” Things happen, so I said okay and was told that another crew may be able to come later in the day after performing their first job. About 6 hours pass, and I have to call back again to find out that there would be no other crew coming, “we can reschedule to tomorrow morning between 8:30-8:45” so I said okay. Tomorrow morning arrives and the movers are an hour late. I call again and am told that they’re “on their way, probably just getting gas.” After waiting another hour and still not having movers, I call again. This time it’s “well there was a mix up and your movers were sent to a different location, but they can be there in about 3 hours.” At that point, I canceled because I wasn’t about to be burned again, and there was no real effort being made to reconcile on the part of the company. I will say that the people of the phone were pleasant enough, but every time you call you wait on hold and are connected with someone different. I will certainly never attempt to use All My Sons again.

name: Courtney Vaughn
text:
My movers were Tommy and Skye, and I couldn’t have asked for anyone better! They called me about 30 minutes before arriving, and got to work as soon as they got there. They were both super friendly and professional. I am moving out of a basement unit, so I was afraid the stairs would be a challenge. They handled my furniture carefully and were sure to load it up in the right order. I had (key word: HAD) a couch that was going to be a beast to get up my stairs, and I asked them to take it apart so I could get rid of it. They got that thing apart in no time!

When we got to my new apartment, they were quick to unload everything and get it situated exactly how I wanted. They even offered to help put my bed and kitchen table back together for me! These guys are awesome!

Also, the pricing of All My Sons is incredible. These guys worked in the July heat for right at three hours and I could not believe how low the cost was, considering the work! I compared several moving companies and decided on All My Sons after one conversation with Hannah. Everyone I have dealt with has been both professional and nice, which is a rare combination these days!

I definitely give this experience an 11/10 and will recommend All My Sons to anyone I know who needs a hand! Thanks!

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience!
