name: Melynda Buck
text:
I called about 30 days in advance to schedule my move for August 8, 2020.  I was told I would have four guys to move a three bedroom apartment fourteen miles down the road.  My package included all blankets and wrapping material to protect my furniture.
Needless to say this move was anything but pleasant. The moving crew showed up 45 minutes late.  The moving crew supervisor quite before the furniture was completely loaded.   I repeatedly call Brad (owner & manager) with every negligent action that occurred with the remaining moving crew.  I had damage to my new hardwood floor, busted freshly painted door frames, knocked a hole in my ceiling, broken dresser handles, strap indentions on bedroom dresser and slid my leather couch across the cement front porch shredding the side corners. Beds were made to look like they were put together but not one single crew was installed.  I found this out when I went to but sheets on the beds and they fell apart.  I was also told all furniture was off the truck when I discovered my bedroom nightstand was missing.  I found this and a busted chest of drawers with clothes spread out under blankets so I would not find them. Brads response was for me not to worry about it that he’d take care of me.
All boxes, TV’s, and hanging clothes were moved independently.  They were strictly moving furniture.
I did everything I was instructed to do to file my claim and have yet to hear back from the insurance company.  My confirmation email stated it would take 30 days to process.  It has now been 60 days and I haven’t heard a word.
I will say Brad was very pleasant every time I called and listened to all my complaints but the downfall in any business is lack of action in customer service.

They also refused to send the check for the tiny fraction of what the items were worth until all reviews, photos and posts were deleted. Seriously do not use this company. text:
****EDIT TO ADD****
Motivated movers was able to get the same size truck in with no problem! They were great to work with and very professional. Give them a call instead!!

I scheduled to move with All My Sons a month in advance for a move this morning. The crew pulled up to my house, and with out attempting to use the back access drive, calls me and says the 26 foot truck they brought wouldn’t fit due to a power line. The driver said he would speak to his manager, pick up a 13 foot truck, and call me back with an update shortly. After an hour with no call, I called the customer service line. I spoke with the manager who apathetically said they didn’t have the truck needed to move me, so they could refund me my deposit but they couldn’t move me within the next three days. Unsatisfied with his response and lack of customer service ask to speak with his supervisor. His supervisor is the owner of the company and basically gave me the same regurgitated answer the manager did. They didn’t even bother to call me and let me know my move was cancelled, I had to call them. I wouldn’t even recommend All My Sons to even my worst enemy. They can expect a call from the Better Business Bureau.

text: Used all my sons Birmingham for our move to Atlanta and it was flawless. The 3 guys (Matthew, Gary and Trent) showed up on time, did an excellent job wrapping all furniture with a great system and organization in the truck for safety. They communicated while driving to Atlanta about stopping for food and few checkpoints on how far out they were. We were never worried about our stuff. Upon arrival at our new home in Atlanta, they put all furniture back together and didn’t scratch or damage anything. Moving is stressful especially Out of state/distance moves..but they made it stress free and painless. I would highly recommend using them for your move.

name: Carla Shirley
text: I used all my sons to move from one house to another. The gentlemen in the office were great, and worked with me on my closing and delivery of my son in the midst of scheduling the movers. They showed up on Saturday the 26th of December and one of them had on house shoes. It was 2 males and one female, they worked fast, but once we arrived at the new house for them to unload the truck they walked around and looked lost. I watch the female drop my bedside table, then they hurried and left without putting my kitchen table back together that they took apart, or putting my tv back on the stand they took it off of to move it. I’ve called and spoke to Larry about the matter at hand which was of course all my fault, and I have yet to hear from customer service on the damages done to my belongings. I will not recommend using this company unless you have the ability to micromanage them the entire time they’re there. Half of my boxes are missing, and no one at the company cares to help find the boxes or help with my belongings. Also I was quoted one amount, and charged double that amount, even with the damages and missing items.

name: Danni Freeman
text: So not happy with this business. Would Not recommend them. Will never use them again!! We moved 5.6 miles down the road. They had no boxes to move only furniture. We took the bed apart and the mirror off our dresser. There was no sofa to move.  This still took them 8 hours to complete! They took multiple smoke breaks. Moved at a turtles pace. Argued with each other. Bad mouthed my husband when they did not realize I was standing right behind them. Took an hour lunch break when they are only allowed 30 minutes. When we called to ask where they were they stated they had to stop and run a few errands. They scratched up multiple pieces of furniture. Put dents in the floor and walls. But what really really was the final straw and what prompted me to post this review was the fact we are about to paint so pulled out dresser out and found a huge hole in the back!!!! Instead of being honest about it they thought they could hide it bc how often to pull out large furniture. You can't miss it either it is right by where the mirror attaches. Refer back to where I stated we took that mirror off ourselves.. that is how I know it was not damaged prior. The bedroom set is only 1 year old. Super upset by the entire experience.

name: Maine E
text: They will say anything under the sun and will be extremely nice and attentive to get your business, but if you have any issues after your move don't expect any results. Movers didn't put my headboard on. I didn't notice because they made it look like they did. Sent email with pics and asked someone to come back out. No response for a week. Finally spoke with manager and requested a refund of deposit. He agreed. It's literally been over a month, and I still have not gotten my refund and now the manager is completely ignoring all my calls, VMs, and texts. Customer service is awful, I will literally never use them again. Would not recommend. And to think I was considering recommending them for our office relocation. Nope. Not to mention they sweet talked me into the higher package with more movers because it would "save me money" but it took 3 guys almost 5 hours to move a 1 bedroom apartment that was already packed up.

text: Didn’t put me on schedule.  Just charged me for deposit and sent conf email. Waited 3 hours with moving truck at storage unit for a scraped together crew. Packed poorly resulting in damage, paid over $500 to load 1 26ft truck. Took 3 of them 3 hours to load.  Movers didn’t load all furniture instead filling 1/2 truck with random boxes.  Asked for discount due to their errors in scheduling and was given $50 off.  In contrast, a different company with 3 men unloaded the 26ft truck, 2 12ft trailers, and 2 pickups in under 3 hours including placing items and building beds. The cost for unloading was $400.  All my Sons really dropped the ball on my move.

text: 10 minutes prior to scheduled arrival they cancelled on me. I can not express enough the logistical bind this put me in. So incredibly disappointed in the way this was handled and how helpless this left me. I would not recommend using this company.

text: I would NOT recommend this company!  A representative called me every day for a week until I pledged my business during our recent move.  A sales manager named Hannah apparently wanted to "sweeten the deal" and offered a sale rate they were running.  A call was made to us just 2 days before our move. Nate, the local store manager wanted to adjust our rates higher.  Furthermore, he was not professional in his interactions with me.  When I asked for a corporate phone number, I had to ask 3 times and he gave me a number that was not working.  I canceled a company just moments before to give this company our business.  I hope no one else has to deal with this hassle.

text: Moved us in the rain. Made sure our furniture was wrapped and protected. Work efficiently even through difficult weather. I was impressed with the guys, Colin,  Andrew and Tommy.

name: Alicia Stallworth
text: As some one who just  had open heart surgery and wanted to make it as easy as possible this move was a nightmare the workers were standing around not doing anything a 2 hr move took 4 hrs they literally were standing around instead of moving stuff....my DVD stand was missing I asked about it and they said they didn't move it when I saw it being loaded  other things were missing and this move was $800 for  a crooked company and a bunch of thieves....don't use them look elsewhere...total crooks

text: They worked fast, efficient, and made sure that my money was well spent. They had great attitudes and were constantly smiling and joking with the family. Definitely will use again!!!

name: Roy Kennedy
text: Showed up 4 hours late. Poor management ,manager got an attitude with me when I asked why they were late, movers  broke several glasses, scratched up furniture and our $3000 washer and dryer set. My wife and I were at our new house while they were packing the old one and once they were done we went to our old place to clean up and we noticed many items were left behind that we specifically asked them to load up on the truck. my wife goes to get her food out of the fridge and we realized one of the movers ate her food and used our condiments. I called the management, this dude didn't even apologize  and just asked if we wanted some gift cards to pay for the food the movers stole. Do not hire this company, I paid over $800 for terrible service. I'm not one to complain, really. But guys you have to get better management. If managed properly this would be a great company.

name: Jhavalen Brown
text:
I typically don’t leave reviews unless I am completely blown away or utterly dissatisfied. This company has been nothing more than a headache. My wife and I met a very professional man who guaranteed our furniture and home would be taken care of from the move. We were blown away and felt like this was the obvious choice from other companies. On move day they were hours late. To the point where we were rushing to get off the property before the new owners arrived. Only one of the 3 guys worked the whole time and the others were constantly on their phone sitting in the truck. As you can imagine this made the move out considerably longer. They damaged a wall in the staircase multiple times. It looks horrible. The new home owners were upset with what they were left with. My wife and I contacted the office and informed of the damage in which they made it seem like they would take care of it. Well it’s now 3 weeks later and they have just advised we need to provide them an estimate. Why was this not stated weeks ago. They have attempted to give us $180 to repair a desk, bed, and dresser, and wall. That is ridiculous. Now it’s to the point where I just want the wall fixed and that not enough to pay a handy man to drive out to provide an estimate and then have to go back for the repair. I could not be more disappointed and dissatisfied. You could do better to hire literally anyone else.

Ps. The driver/mover was the only positive thing about the move after it started. Luckily we got him as he did make sure to take care not to damage the new house.

name: Blaine Rosenberg
text: Thomas and his team did a great job! Quick and efficient and very personable

resp.text: Hi, Blaine. Your feedback is highly appreciated. Thank you for the review!

name: Jordan Merklein (Jordan M.)
text: Absolute TRASH! Our movers called us an hour before our move and told us they were at our storage unit and we needed to be there to let them in. I told them we signed up for 9:30 not 8:30 and we were in our closing and couldn’t be there for another hour. They then hung up on us and called back 3 more times while I was in my closing and couldn’t answer. My husband called them at 9 when our closing was finished and told them he’d be there in 30 minutes and they yelled at him and hung up. We called customer service to complain and they said they didn’t have anyone else to send out other than that crew and they were sorry. We ended up cancelling because why would we pay a company over $1000 and trust them with all of our belongings when they were so rude and yellowing/hanging up on us before the move even started?!?! Please, do not give this company your money!!

text: Matt, Randy, and Antone is a hard working crew. They did a great job moving an entire house full of furniture in a timely manner. I would definitely recommend this crew to others.

perience.

text: Let’s start at the beginning! The men showed up with no TOOLS! I was being charged $175 per hour and they showed up with no tools. Then when they came back they took forever! I moved 5 minutes down the street out of a two bedroom townhouse to a 2 bedroom apartment and it took 4 hours with three men! I was charged $895 to move 5 minutes up the road with only two beds, couch, washer dryer, chest drawer, desk and deep freezer. I moved majority of the my personal belongings on my own so it shouldn’t have taken that long! They also installed my bed incorrect now my $2200 kings size bed is on the floor because the panel on the side is split in half because it was set up properly.

name: daniel smith
text:
Was told they would send two trucks, sent one and jammed most of a 2400 square foot house into it.  Paid for a full pack, and the jokers who showed up didn't even know they were supposed to pack it up.  Were three hours late, so they were late leaving out and caused us to use a vacation day bc we had to overnight at the destination.  Broke my king bed and big screen TV.  Tried to hide the broken bed; didn't find out about the TV until we plugged it in. Scuffed a bunch more of our wooden furniture.  Soaked a queen mattress...who knows how?  Now has stains and mold on it.
Was told by "Brad" that we'd be compensated for the stuff they destroyed.  No dice.  Tried to get the reimbursement claim, but didn't even get one sent to us.  They left a quarter of our stuff still in the old house the day before the house had a final walkthrough before sell date.  Had to send the second truck (was told two trucks from the start!), and one of the guys they sent sassed me when I asked him if he would wrap some loose items.  Asked for a tip after they busted our stuff.  Tried to call Brad multiple times without answers or recompense.  Stay away.  Would give negative stars if I could.

name: Michelle Davis
text: We have used All My Sons twice in the past 3 weeks. Everyone was very helpful and professional. Josh, Quinton, Jerome (and 3 more guys whose names I can’t remember - so sorry) worked very hard and efficiently which I really appreciated since they charge by the hour. I would definitely recommend them!

name: Michael Hubbard
text: Wonderful job!  All My Sons Moving was on time, professional, and focused. We will use them again. Thank you.

name: Kylee Tinney
text:
The All My Sons Pelham office should be AVOIDED AT ALL COSTS. I have never written a negative Yelp/Google review, BUT I have also never been treated so poorly (thank you Nate) as a paying customer of a business. We booked with All My Sons for our Saturday move a few weeks in advance. My husband spoke to MULTIPLE different reps, male and females, confirming that movers would be at our house at 8:00am. On the day of our move, we got a call saying, “the crew never showed up” and they were going to be late. 9:00am rolls around, and we get another call saying they won’t be there until 9:45am. Frustrated that we have now lost 2 hours of moving time (moves are already high-stress to begin with without the added frustration of movers not showing), I call the office to express my concerns. Enter the ever-so-lovely “Nate”, who I HOPE does not have a “Manager” title to his name. If so, you should seriously reconsider. Argumentative, rude, arrogant…the list goes on. Nate probably needs a refresher in Customer Service 101, “the customer is always right”. Nate tells me that their moves start from “8-10am”, so “technically” they weren’t late and “no one would have told us they were going to be there by 8am”. I explained that we spoke with MULTIPLE people and that was not the case….we were assured they would be there at 8am. After a few LOVELY back and forths with this Nate character, he says, “Alright, I’m cancelling your move and you can find someone else.”
*Click*
He hangs up the phone. If you are the owner of All My Sons, please know that you have someone representing your business in the POOREST way. I have already submitted a complaint to the BBB. This business needs to be INVESTIGATED and management needs to be reevaluated. My experience is NO WAY to treat a paying customer. Cancelling someone’s day-of service because they receive a VALID complaint is beyond me and I hope there are repercussions for Nate treating people the way he does. Based on Google/Yelp reviews, this is not an isolated incident.  Luckily, the bright spot in the day was calling MOVEDADDY who completely rearranged their moving schedule to accommodate us and did so with the most POSITIVE attitude. And they were $50+ less expensive/hour. SO all-in-all crisis averted in doing business with All My Sons, and I’m glad they did not get a PENNY of my money. What a joke.

text: Joshua E, Jerome K, and Quinton W were the best! They worked very quickly and efficiently, and they were courteous and polite throughout the day. They made the process simple and easy! We will definitely recommend All My Sons to others!

text: 1st move went smoothly. 2nd move was horrible. Moving crew was an hour and a half late arriving. One of the three crew members was very rude, unprofessional, using profanities. He was complaining about the amount of stuff that was to be moved. Just all around nasty attitude the whole move. Other two guys were very pleasant and mannerable. Nate was totally nonchalant about team being late and would not budge on price for the inconvenience to me. As a returning customer, I would not recommend.

After we paid for the move and even tipped the guys $100 each, still no word on the wall damage, not even from the office.

name: Kelsea Nassif
text: INCREDIBLE experience. Very polite, very quick, and exactly the price I expected to spend. I didn’t have to do a thing! They brought padding, tape, and shrink wrap and took great care of all my things. Very thankful for Justin and his partner! Couldn’t have done it without them. Thanks, guys!

name: Jimmy Lauderdale
text:
Daughter recommended them after a move. Talked to several movers before deciding on AMS. In house estimator was on time and thorough. We walked down the move and discussed site conditions and options to overcome any challenges (mainly very steep and long drive). AMS still had the best price.
On the day of the move, Josh and the guys were right on time. Unfortunately for them, the drive was so steep that the truck bound against the concrete even when empty. They parked the truck on the road and came in to walk down the move.
The guys really needed a smaller truck to shuttle things down a long steep drive. After talking among themselves, they determined the move had to take place and promptly began to wrap and carry things to the truck parked on the street.
An hour into the move came the 560# gun safe which they gang tackled and rolled with the aid of only a set of hand trucks. It wasn’t easy. But, the task was completed without incident.
These guys were great!
The delivery was much easier and just as professional.
This was the first of a two part move. They will be doing the next move as well. Hopefully with a truck that can handle the driveway.

name: Santana T.
text: JAY WAS AWESOME HE CALLED ME VERY PROFESSIONAL WHEN WE TALKED ON THE PHONE THEY WAS ON TIME ALL AROUND GREAT......

resp.text: Hi, Santana. Thank you so much for leaving us a stellar review!

text: INCREDIBLE experience. Very polite, very quick, and exactly the price I expected to spend. I didn’t have to do a thing! They brought padding, tape, and shrink wrap and took great care of all my things. Very thankful for Justin and his partner! Couldn’t have done it without them. Thanks, guys!

text: Guys were awesome. Everything went smooth and cost less than I thought it would since they got it all done in a timely manner. Will definitely use All My Sons again and recommend it to my family and friends.

text: Made a short move across town this morning with the help of All My Sons. The guys were very hard working and got right to work. Very pleased with their effort and professionalism.

text: All My Sons did a great job for our move on 11/23! Quick and fast, and they showed up earlier than expected which was awesome! They had a 3 man crew and extremely efficient! Will you use them again!

name: Lisa Hall
text: The 2 young men who moved us today were so good and very nice! They called right on time this morning and didn’t waste time. This is the 2nd time we’ve used AMS Moving and will definitely use again when we’re ready to move these things out of storage. Cheers to a job well done! Thank you.

name: Hannah C
text: I’m giving them two stars because the actual movers themselves were nice, once they actually arrived. I was supposed to move at around 8 or 9 in the morning and they didn’t show up at my house until 1:30 pm. The manager claimed that one of their truck’s battery had died and they had to wait until another truck was available. I understand these issues happen, but it is extremely inconvenient that they called about this 15 minutes before they were supposed to arrive. I had no other day to move as I had to work at 7 am the next morning. The manager could not give us an exact time for when the movers would arrive, just that they would be arriving some time that day. The person we talked to on the phone was condescending, saying that they’ve been doing this “for 20 years” and that “they’d handle this situation” while refusing to give us an estimated time of when the movers would be here. At one point, we’d try to call and they wouldn’t even answer the phone. I didn’t have time to wait around for them to show up. I guess I’m surprised and grateful they showed up at all, given the other poor reviews about this moving company. It sounds like they have serious management issues. I will never be using this company again.

name: Ambria Hardy
text:
Paid deposit on my 8-9 am deposit, but didn’t get a truck at my house until after noon. Local office was very apathetic.
Not a great experience, should’ve used Uhaul.

Also NOT COVID friendly. They preach about this on their site, but movers came up wearing no masks unlike the ones in the pictures on the website.

I would recommend this company to anyone looking for a great price and great service.

name: Ritika Ramchandani
text: My friend hired these movers to move only furniture and 4 boxes from an apartment to her home 45 minutes away. They were 4 hours late, said it was because they accidentally went to the house instead of the apartment, then said they broke down on the way. Come to find out, they were busy working on another job and broke down in the Hoover area. *no transparency!* why lie?? The movers were nice but did mention “wanting to go home” which is unprofessional in my opinion. THE KICKER IS THAT THEY DROVE THE TRUCK THROUGH THEIR LAWN *forcing them to have to file an unnecessary insurance claim* THIS IS AFTER SHE GAVE THEM instructions on how to properly get onto the driveway, that they failed to follow. What should’ve been 8 a.m.-12:30 p.m. ended up being 1 p.m.-7p.m. I would recommend Moving On Birmingham LLC! Great company that moved me in and out of my last place! Moving is stressful; you shouldn’t pay over $1,000 for it to be MORE stressful!

Move was 6 months ago and I still don't have the heart to unpack all the items in my garage because I find broken pieces every time I do.  The "manager" was nice but some of the other men were impossible to work with.  When they drove off, one of the trucks accidentally pulled our telephone wire off the house.  Needless to say, I would never call these folks to move me again.

name: David Alexander
text:
Horrible! Don't believe the sales pitch when they come out to do a quote.

-showed up late morning of move
-the older guy in charge of the crew spent the whole time complaining about how the other three weren't doing a good job but never did anything to correct it
-were suppose to send three movers to unload at destination, only sent two
-we just replaced the hardwoods, which they knew, and were suppose to do "full protection" on the house. The full protection stuff somehow did not make it onto the truck
-they took about their make shift floor protection towards the end of the move, before they were done with the dolly's, and scratched our new hardwood floors
-tried to overcharge me on the unload since it took the two guys a lot longer than was quoted (they were suppose to send three), and I had to be the one to catch that and say no I'm not paying more than the quote. Then their manager acted like they were doing me a favor by giving me some discount on the labor.

Overall, awful experience, stay away, don't believe their sales pitch. I'm not sure if other moving companies are any better, but they can't be worse

name: Nala Evans
text: I have used All My Sons twice. The first time was for a local move and it was perfect. I decided to use them again for an out of state move because they were the cheapest for the long distance. My two movers were great with getting me packed up and got to my location in a timely fashion. However, I noticed that they left a few items. I dismissed it as an oversight. However, I noticed several dents and dings in my belongings at drop off. I also noticed that some of my items were never delivered after they left. All My Sons promises to disassemble and reassemble whatever is needed, but my movers refused to put together my dining table. After a phone call to the HQ, they gave a meager attempt to put it together but then stopped because they “didn’t know how to put it together”. I paid over $1000 for poor service and called to give feedback. I was promised a callback by a manager within 20 minutes and no one ever answered. If you can spare the extra funds, please use a different mover for long distance. I was also charged an extra $100 until I caught the error.

text: We had a great experience with All My Sons. Would definitely recommend!

name: Steven Puckett
text: Use a reputable company.  These guys were useless.  Yes, we have a steep driveway, and yes, for 2 weeks we reminded them that they needed a high back truck.  Did they listen?  Nope.  They showed up with the wrong trucks, look at it, decide they need a different truck and leave.  Then they show up the NEXT day, again with the wrong trucks, THEN they decide nope, can't do it....and leave...  We are out vacation time, and now have to schedule with (hopefully) a REAL company that knows what they are doing...more than a week out!  Thanks guys!  We really appreciated it!

name: Sara Miller
text: Josh and crew did amazing. Will recommend to family and friends moving in the future.

name: Andrea Childress
text: NEVER AGAIN! This company took 10 hours to complete a very simple move. I was left with several broken items and have been unable to locate my candelabras. The job started with three movers at the 6 hour mark, they sent an additional man. The movers came unprepared (no tools to remove the washing machine) and to top it all off after wasting 7 hours the “boss’s” son refused to move the washing machine. I had to call the office before they finally agreed to put my perfectly fine washing machine on the truck. Toward the end of my hellish experience with this unprofessional company, I asked the movers to move a piece a furniture and they agreed claiming they had to run to the truck to grab something. After a long wait, I went to check on them only to see them pulling out of my driveway. Long story short... I was out of $1200 after being quoted $700. Save yourself the aggravation and money, GO WITH SOMEONE ELSE!!!

name: Tamesha Turner
text: All my Sons is the most reliable movers I have ever dealt with. They arrived at 8a and was done by 10:45a. Collin, Zack, and Joe (I really hope I got his name right) were very funny and I am looking forward to working with these guys again. I had to move out my apartment very quickly and the stress that I had up until Friday was gone. I would recommend All my Sons for your moving needs. Fast, friendly, and reliable with great prices.

name: Eryk Johnson
text: I'll give them 1 star for all the current reviews being 1 star reviews. The workplace is toxic. They treat their good helpers and movers like they're easily replaceable. They can't keep good workers because of this. The manager also forms favorites and knows what she's doing when she distributes out certain jobs to workers. I use to work for this company but after all I've seen I wouldn't call all my son's to help move your family. I've had dear friends use this company also and they'd complain about all the smoke breaks and mostly would complain about communication with the management. I use to tell customers all the time that we can only help the moving end of things and that we, the movers, can't help that All My Sons overcharges for material. I've seen so much circus acts at all my son's. The workers getting in fist fights and even taking it across the street. They run their business like a drama soap opera. Not to mention the management forming favorites and even having affairs with employees. Theirs also "gang" members that work here and they keep it all in the family. When I worked for all my son's my best friend was going to use them and I told him to ask for me and my dad (my "dad" works there what I mean by "keeping it all in the family") and when my friend couldn't get me to cover his job because of unknown reasons I told him to just use another moving company because you will be disappointed and better off moving your own things or calling another company that cares. All my son's doesn't care about a good portion of jobs because the workers have 2 0r 3 jobs a day and they either hurry up and damage things or they milk the clock and overcharge on materials. Sue me but it's the truth. Could say more but I'm not.

text: This company is a rip off!! I moved from my daughter's home to an apartment;no more than 8-10 miles. The movers took shelves out of a bookcase and now the shelves cannot be found. I was originally told it would be 90.00 per hr. Ended up at 99.00. Management is uncaring. Prices are made up as they go along. This company is the worst. I am out 500.00 and the shelves from my bookcase. These con men need to be investigated!!! Never ever again!!! Don't waste your time and money.

text: That’s how moving should be done. I couldn’t have did better myself

name: Ryan Staniscavage
text:
We have moved several times because of my job and this one was the worst experience.  This time, this was a local move.  It was an easy move for the movers as well.  I had already taken most of our things, but I hired All My Sons to move a few dressers, an fridge, washer, dryer, and a couple of game tables.  We also had a large piece of furniture in storage.  But, they didn't have to move beds, clothes, dishes, etc.  The move should have taken about 2-3 hours.

My move was scheduled to start at 8am.  At 7:45am, I received a call that due to DOT requirements, the driver could not arrive until 10-10:30am.  I get it.  I work with DOT every day.  But this was poor scheduling and the last-minute notice wasn't pleasing, but I was willing to let it slide.  But the driver did not arrive until 11:45am.  I had an important appointment at 2pm that day.  I told the driver we needed to get moving.  He replied saying his boss called him at 10am wanting to know if he could work.  Now, I finally know the truth.

At first, the guys were moving well.  They loaded up the house in about 35 minutes.  I was pleased.  Then we dropped by our storage unit and the driver was more interested in looking at our pictures or checking out our motorized toys.  At this point, I knew he was dragging his feet and running up the clock.  They finished the move in about 4.5-5 hours.  We were moving to a new home that we built.  They scratched the staircase in two places pretty severely.

I spoke to the supervisor and told him about my complaints.  He asked me what I was looking for.  I told him I would leave the resolution up to him, but I knew if I ran my business with this type of communication and lack of urgency, I would lose my customers.  He responded, "Well, you were moved today and the guys have to get paid."  So, I paid, but I promised myself I would leave reviews everywhere I could.  I was completely disappointed.

The response below seems to be the same cut and paste response issued by All My Sons to every negative review.  I gave All My Sons the opportunity to make the transaction right over the phone.  I told them I would leave the remedy up to them and the response I got was, "You got moved today and the guys have to be paid."

text: In 2014, I had them help me move from an apartment to a house.  Everything was going well.  They moved fast and were nice guys. They said they were stuck in traffic on the interstate.  My husband went back to the apartment and all they way back to the new house using various routes. To this day,  we don't know where they actually were.  It ended up costing several hundred dollars more for "travel time."  We chose them because they had the best rates,  but that was a mistake.  We are getting ready to move again,  but I will never use them again. The thought still upsets me.

name: Greg Smith
text: This move was for my daughter and it was terrible from the initial first call to the last piece of furniture coming off truck. We were told 8-9 am but when it reached 8:30 we called local office and spoke to someone named Chris. He sounded very rude on the phone. Apparently had a few issues that morning delaying crew getting to our house. So they finally arrived later in morning. Everything was off to ok start until I noticed a lot of cursing going on that was upsetting. I asked them to please tone it down and be professional. That just pissed them off even more to the point they were being very careless with the furniture. The manager Chris was calling crew throughout day over and over and over yelling and screaming at top of his lungs to where I could hear every word from across the room in kitchen. I asked what was that? And crew said oh he's always like that. So now crew is trying to rush and throw everything on truck on top of already not doing a great job. One of the crewmen even made the comment we are way overworked and underpaid and management is horrible. Needless to say we have a lot of damage, the movers hate management and their jobs, and we had to pay for a horrible move. I spoke with friends afterward who encountered a lot of these same issues. Even had same issue with managers calling a ridiculous number of times. Get these people out of business as this seems to be a reoccurring issue. I will also be following up with BBB and stopping payment on my credit card.

resp.text: Hi Greg, we're very sorry to hear about this experience. We expect our crews to act very professionally when they're out working on a move. It seems to me that was not the case with your move so we understand your frustration. We take this feedback very seriously and will use it to ensure that nothing of this nature happens again in the future. If you are still needing assistance with any items that were damaged during the move, please reach out to us so we can help you resolve it. (866) 941-1883

name: JACQUELINE SOMMERVILLE
text:
What ever you do, PLEASE, PLEASE do not use this company!!!!!  Very unprofessional, unethical and plain rude!!!!!  I WISH I HAD READ PREVIOUS REVIEWS BEFORE I SCHEDULED A MOVE!  AAANND I WISH I COULD RATE THEM A ZERO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
I called several weeks in advance to schedule a moving date. The customer service was awesome! I even called back several other times to verify some other information.  NEVER  IN ANY OF THOSE CONVERSATIONS WAS I GIVEN DIRECTIONS HOW TO SET UP MY HOUSE FOR MY MOVE!!!
Saturday, April 13,  2019  the movers arrived. They walked through then had me to sign some papers. They begin to move a few things. The heavier set gentleman was on the phone. Still no moving going on! The next thing I know a lady shows up , introduces herself and said she was doing a walk through. I said okay. She walked my town house and stated to me that I need to clean my dresser off. There was some sticky residue on there. I said okay and cleaned the dresser.  I went back to sit down. I noticed they had packed my TV and I needed it because Direct TV was headed to the new location. My friend was coming to pick it up the TV.  I went to the truck to get the TV. The manger and the heavier set guy were behind the truck smoking cigarettes. So I asked,  "Were we moving anything today." "You all are on a smoke break and nothing has been moved!" She said , no ma'am.  We are getting ready to move you. "I suppose what I said led to what happened next"  She sent  the African American guy into my town house to let me know they had to CANCELED my move today.  I guess because I was African American that was the reason for sending him. He had no explanation. I asked since she was the manger why didn't she come and tell me what the problem was and why my move was canceled.  He said she a White lady. In other words, he was sent to do the dirty work! By this time I am furious! I call the office and some gentleman couldn't really explain either. He just said it was cancelled. I used some unprofessional words and hung the phone up. I called back to speak to her and she stated that there was no room for their dollies to pass through, there was an odor and it was not clean. All of those were lies! I don't know any place that will be clean when you are moving.  I had all of my boxes and bags in one  location. They were labeled and separated.  The only items upstairs were the bedrooms. I used some more unprofessional , choice words again! My issue with the entire thing is NO ONE explained to me how to set up for the move or came our prior for a walk through. SHE told me that was COMMON SENSE! I gave some more unprofessional , choice words.  I live in a town house which does not have a lot of room. I can not help how many items I had. I did contact corporate office and explained EVERYTHING! I even expressed that I used unprofessional words and I did apologize to the corporate office.  Thank God I have awesome family and friends!!! They moved me with no hesitation and never complained. What about the people who don't have family and friends in the city!  Treat people how you want to be treated!  KARMA is for real!!!!  SO WHO EVER READS THIS DON'T EVER USE THESE RUDE AND UNPROFESSIONAL, SMOKE BREAK PEOPLE IF YOU CAN HELP IT!!!!! UGGGH!!!!!!

name: Sara Gracee
text: First time using movers and will be using all my son's in the future!

name: Kristie Carty
text: My name is Kristie Carty ,and I am the sales and Marketing Director at Sunrise Ridge Assisted Living in Trussville , Al. We have many movers in our community with helping new residents move into  their new home. "All My Sons" sent 3 young men to help move a resident  . Josh , Josh and Zach were incredibly polite and also courteous. All 3 facilitated the move very well, and there were no problems experienced . I truly appreciated such a smooth and easy transition for the family I was working with . It's important to have no mishaps on moving day! Thank you to all who were involved ! Especially Josh, Josh and Zach!

text: The crew that moved us was fantastic!!!  They were in and out very professional and courteous.  We got a very reasonable price and would use them again.  There was only 1 broken item, which in my opinion for any move is amazing!!  My only issue is with scheduling.  Josh the guy that scheduled our move gave us a 7:30-8 am move time, then it was changed to 9:00-9:30 am then I called after 10 am to find out where they where.  The guys arrived at 11:30 am to begin.  I called and booked this move on April 4th for an early morning move, we actually had a move date of May 11th.  Even after confirming 24 hours in advance for our move time of 7:30-8:00 there was a job before us.

name: Barbara Cargle
text: First i was told 8am to 830am movers would arrive i received a call at 940am stating they were 15 mintues away. Finally at 10am they arrive and start but before could start. I was toldi have no tools to bresk down any of the furniture and asked if i had any tools. At this point i am already disappointed late and you can't get started due to lack of proper equipment . All i can say is wow and totally unprofessional. Then there is the can i use the bathroom the lead guy asked and i said yes he stayed in there 35 minutes on the phone while the other two worked. Then after all of that i get a sad story about the lead being owed money and had to go back to the office to get it. Stated 10 minutes tops. I arrived at the delivery locstion for a hour before anyone showed up. They finally arrived and started to unload my dining table top was not put back on correctly screws are missing. One of my pieces to my sedtional is chipped but the best part another 30 minute i have to use the rest room while the other to work.  Now to the pay part I am charged for 7 hours of labor when it should have been 5 dont use them pay more for quality service.

resp.text: Barbara, we regret to hear that you had a negative experience with us, but would appreciate the chance to turn your experience around. We would like to work towards a resolution, so if you are willing, please reach out to us at (866) 941-1849 to discuss this further.

name: Rachel Meadors
text: I will only book with All my 2 sons. Always great. I have bad experiences with 2 men and truck, but never all my sons. Friendly, hard working, trust worthy.

name: Donald Rizzardi
text: Their three man crew (Josh, Shane and Edwin) were timely and polite, even as the temps were in the mid-90s. They treated our family's heirlooms as if they were their own...would definitely use this company again and would certainly recommend my  three service professionals!

resp.text: Donald Rizzardi, thank you for sharing your positive experience! Your recommendation means so much to us and we're so happy to have earned it. Thank you again for taking the time to let the world know about your positive experience. Have a great day!

name: Krissy Bailey
text: If I could give All My Sons, more than 5 stars, I would!  I have use movers several times before, and never before have I received the level of service that I experienced throughout the entire process of this move. Scheduling my moving day and receiving my quote took no time at all, and I was shocked at the affordability off the bat! The pricing is super straight forward, and the  is charged by a flat by the hour fee, with no hidden costs - it made it easy to help budget. I then received a follow up call from the local team that would be handling my move, personally introducing themselves and making sure I didn't have any additional questions.  However, the move day itself is actually what floored me... this was no easy move, I was downsizing my parents from a 4 bedroom house with a basement full of stuff to a two bedroom apartment - so the move involved a LOT of stuff and several stops (between storage and the new place).  Quinton (the driver) and his team (Quinteze, Jamaul and Colin) showed up right on time, moved quickly and efficiently, and never once acted like anything was a problem! They really went above and beyond, even taking items that we planned to give away down to the basement for us. These four guys were so nice and helpful, and really made what was a tough and challenging move for me, seem easy!  I cannot recommend this team and the company high enough - I will use them for ANY move I plan in the future. Thank you to All My Sons, and especially to Quinton, Quinteze, Jamaul and Colin!

name: Brian Naugle
text: My wife and I needed help moving on short notice and All My Son's was able to to accommodate our request which was good to hear. Which chose to hire movers because we just completed renovations and wanted to avoid causing damage to our newly renovated house. They told my wife they had an early morning opening and a late morning opening. We chose the later option because of our work schedules. They showed up an hour earlier than we expected and we were not prepared. The staff was nice  and they did not waste anytime getting loaded. When I arrived to the house my wife was disappointed. When we called AMS to arrange the move we asked them if they could assemble some items. My wife was told they disassembled and assembled. When my wife showed the men the items she was told her they would only assemble what they had previously disassembled at the pickup. It might have been a misunderstanding on our end, but I'm not sure why it would be a problem since they charge by the hour. The most disappointing part was the damages caused to our house. We know these men are working hard and furniture can be difficult to move through hallways and doors so we expected minor scratches/dents might  occur, but in two places the damage was beyond what I would call minor. The casing on the front door and one of the hallways has chunks of wood taken out of them.  While we still would have been annoyed.. If we had we been notified during the move we would have let it go. Nobody said anything about the damages and now we will have to make repairs to work that was just completed. Nice people to work with, but they need to work with their staff on communication to their clients and honesty.

resp.text: Brian, Thank you for your valuable feedback, we are sorry we did not meet your expectation on your relocation with us. Please contact our customer care team at 866-941-1849. Best Regards, All My Sons

name: Travis Ackermann
text: Crazy EXPENSIVE

name: L
text:
I scheduled my move on May 10th for May 28th. I was told I would receive a call 24-48 hrs before the move to comfirm time. I did not. I contacted them less than 24 hrs before our scheduled move only to be told they over booked and if it was ok, would I be willing to moved the day back one day. So I agreed since they offered to lower the rate and make me the firts appointment of that day. So Monday came. I was told they would be there between 8:30a and 9:30a. I'm almost 3 months pregnant & I feel asleep about 9am. I woke up around 11am. No movers!!! My husband said they called at 10:48a saying they were behind and several workers called out. 8 to be excat. This is one of the reasons I originally scheduled my move for that Sunday--the day before the Holiday (Memorial Day). My husband was told they would be there in a few hours. A few hours passed, still no movers. We called them back around 1pm. Was told they were still coming it would be another few hours. At this point we are upset but we wait, and wait and wait. I took another nap this time with my 17 month old who wasn't to thrilled about being in the house all day with boxes everywhere. We wake up around three. Still no movers. My husband calls. It was a little before 4pm. He was told "the guys are finishing up a job now and they are headed your way". My husband asked what time can we expect them? He was told "between 5p and 6p". At this point we wait and wait and wait. 5:55p, NO MOVERS, NO CALL! My husband calls back, NO ANSWER!!!! Calls again and again and again. NO ANSWER. Around 6:10p the rain starts and it doesnt stop. It's heavy rain. 6:20p driver calls. Here is our conversation:
Driver: We are headed your way
Me: Sir it's raining, like really raining. Isn't our stuff going to get wet??
Driver: Yes Mam it is. Even if we use the pads they will get wet and then sit on your stuff.
Me: I feel like I have no choice
Driver: What do you want to do? Do you want us to head that way?
Me: I don't know
Driver: Mam we haven't eaten all day and we would like to see our families before 11pm.
Me: Well why don't you all stop and get something to eat and maybe the rain will stop by then.
Driver: Mam we don't get paid to eat
Me: (Mouth drops), I'll just cancel.
Driver: Ok call Chris
Me: Who is Chris? Do you ha.....
Driver: Click up (He hangs up on me)

This all happened before anyone physically came to move our stuff.

name: GOAT LKMONEY
text: Great Experience And Very Helpful.

name: Matt Johnson
text:
I'm rating this experience as being "ok".  I've used 2 different moving companies in the last year, All My Sons and 2 Men & A Truck. In short, I'll likely be using 2 Men going forward because it was just a better experience overall and worth the difference in rate per mover.

Positives: The All My Sons (AMS) hourly rate, per mover, is far less than the competition in the field. Their sales staff is persistent in booking orders (which I like - some don't). They call a lot to check in and see what they can do to help. The movers didn't really sit around; they moved with purpose most of the time. The movers were very nice and did everything they could to provide good service.

Negatives: We were scheduled for 8-8:30am arrival; they didn't show up until 10:30am. Furthermore, I had to be the one to call to find out why they were late (had to call 3 times). The operations gentleman/rep that I talked to about their delayed arrival was straight forward but more in the sense of being border line rude. Just my opinion at that time; and I'll admit I was heated & mad having to call 3 times so the rep could have been nice the whole time but I wasn't truly listening...the underlying issue had something to do with the moving truck needing gas and their gas card limit was too small for what the moving truck needed; getting approval for the gas was what created the delay. Ultimately, the ops office set up the movers for failure.

Moot Points: I don't know that the movers were properly prepared for my move. I don't know if I did a poor job of describing what's going to be moved, or if AMS didn't communicate to the moving team.

Bottom Line: I needed a moving company to move items. AMS did that. I wasn't blown away by their service.

resp.text: Matt, Thank you for your valuable feedback, we are sorry we did not meet your expectation on your relocation with us. Please contact our customer care team at 866-941-1849. Best Regards, All My Sons

name: Gee Phil
text:
I highly recommend All My Sons moving company. Dwaine (and Colton) and his team of movers were professional, courteous, and wasted no time in packing and loading our things. They were also absolutely methodical about carefully padding, and packaging our fragile belongings in such a way that absolutely nothing was damaged or broken during our out-of-state move, even though the drive was nearly 10 hours for the moving truck. Dwaine and his team were also very accommodating and flexible regarding couple of unorthodox requests we made. They were both efficient and exacting in how they handled our loading and unloading and everything was completed in a timely manner. Dwaine drove our truck, and managed our move (and his team) in a way that created a stress-free environment for us and though this was the farthest we've ever had to move, because of Dwaine, it was the best move we've ever done. They were excellent!

Request Dwaine and his team if you use All My Sons Moving and Storage.

resp.text: Amanda, We are glad to hear that you had a wonderful moving experience with our moving team, and we greatly appreciate you taking the time to write us such a great review! Your Friends, All My Sons

name: Eliza Collier
text: Very Rude Customer Service!!...The woman UPS employee there today yelled RUDELY at everyone saying there should only be 7 people waiting in line(there was 6 she admitted) after making others go outside. But that’s not the worst part...she refused to help process people’s returns at the empty computer station while the line proceeded to get 12 people deep outside down the sidewalk....leaving only one employee taking everyone’s returns because she refused to help. Very Rude & Stressful environment!

resp.text:
I do apologize and will discuss this with her.  Looking at the video I believe she was trying to clear some of the packages from the area as it was getting too congested given the run of people they saw during that period.  In between that period she was helping customers at the other computer.  I will discuss this with her, She should have let you and the other customers know what she was doing, such as "I need to clear the area and will get back to everyone as quickly as possible."
Thank You,
Larry

name: M
text:
I have to say that I am extremely disappointed with how this location is handling the COVID safety of its patrons. I went in yesterday to drop off a package. They were swamped and it was a 45 minute wait. The wait was not the issue. It's December and I expected there to be a wait. The issue was that there was no social distancing encouraged in the small lobby space! There were 13 people crammed in a small area at one point + employees. There was one employee not wearing a mask at all. She kept walking around in the front area and making trips out the front door through the crowds of people. Another had on a 3" chin visor mask, that let's be honest, wasn't protecting anyone. As someone that is high-risk and being very careful about being around people, this was an incredibly uncomfortable (but unfortunately necessary) trip to the UPS store for me.  The gentleman behind me also expressed how uncomfortable he was with the thought of having to step inside the lobby with so many people. In fact, we both hung back and allowed people to filter out before going inside, only to have many more people cram in behind us just moments after we walked in.

We've been at this pandemic thing for months. Concern for safety is not new. Why was there no one at this location telling people, "So sorry guys, only 5 allowed inside at a time so we can keep everyone safe."  Not to mention the fact the if I have to wear my mask to enter the building, WHY are employees not required to wear proper masks as well?

resp.text:
I am sorry that you had a bad experience.  We have signage on the door requesting our customers to maintain social distancing while in the store as well as placards on the floor spaced ~6 ft apart to aid in the effort to maintain social distancing.  We had hoped that these aids would have been sufficient for our customers to self police.  During the remainder of the holiday season and as needed we will begin having someone at the door to help our customers to maintain the proper social distancing during our busiest periods.  I will review our store video to see which of the employees did not have a mask on and take the appropriate actions.

Thank You and I do Apologize
Larry Stephens

name: PAB “Kelfer” Brown
text: Absolutely RUDE!   Went in to have a 1 page document notarized, called the day before to confirm a notary would be there, we were told the employees name and she would be in.  Upon arrival that employee was up front and said she was busy and was the only one working and we would have to wait, (just to note when we first walked in we were the only customers) but OK. A few customers did come in for shipping, we waited.  Another woman came out from the back and told us there was no time and we would have to come back tomorrow, we said we would just await until there was time and she said NO we had to come back, I said the other employee asked us to just wait...the woman who said NO was described as the "owner" and handled the situation in an extremely rude manner.  the apparent owner said this has to be done by appointment I told her I did call yesterday and was told the notary was working...that didn't matter.  No where on website does it state this service is "by appointment". We were not in a rush and were willing to wait for the shipping customers to be dealt with first.  We had a one page document, literally took another notary in the area 7 minutes time.   POOR BUSINESS model to treat customers so rudely.

resp.text:
Sorry for the bad experience on Sunday.  We do only have one person working Sundays after the first hour or two there is not much activity.  Because of the one person and that some notaries can take a good amount of time we do ask our employees not to refer any notaries to the Sunday person but we did and we should have honored that when you came in.  Especially since yours was an easy one.  I am sorry and have spoken to those involved.  We will make every attempt to honor a notary when a person walks in.
Thank You,
The Other Owner
Larry Stephens

name: Rachel Brown
text: Two workers gave each other looks of anonnoyance the entire time I was in the store trying to ship a return for the first time. It was very uncomfortable. I wasn't holding up the line, telling anyone who walked in to please go around while I tried to figure things out. Eventually just left after the way those two ladies made me feel.

resp.text:
Ms. Wolf,
I am sorry they made you feel uncomfortable.  We want to be there to help as much as we can.  One of the girls was fairly new and was shadowing the other.  I will have a talk with the everyone to let just know of this situation and come up with ways to avoid this in the future.  I apologize and thank you for your comment.

Larry Stephens
256-766-9843

name: Amanda Moore
text: Kind staff, good location.

name: Burgess Fox
text: Staff is always helpful and goes above and beyond to help me out. I always come forgetting something like tape or my return label and they are quick to assist!

name: craig lee
text: I like the owner she is sweet but she has a hard time getting good help.I have been there on Sat and no one opened until 10am a hour late.But its the only UPS shipping in Florence now that the Mailing room closed.

name: Jo Larson
text: Stay away. Very rude employees.

resp.text: I am sorry to hear of your bad experience with us.  I will speak to our staff.  I would like to hear more about what happened so I can take more detailed actions with myself and our staff.  If you will call me at 256-766-9843 my name is Larry, or email us at store6145@theupsstore.com we would appreciate it.  Thank you.

name: Jody Olivent
text: They always try to up charge me no matter what I'm shipping and they always say the "must do xyz or we can't ship it". The most recent incident they outright refused to ship my items. Once informed that I have shipped the same thing from multiple other UPS Stores they call there national hotline. The person on the other end tells them my item is OK to ship. They then try to sneak in a $15.50 "additional handling fee" on each box. I'm told it is because of what I'm shipping. I've never been charged that fee by UPS or any of their other stores for the same items.

name: Donna Craig
text: Always courteous and knowledgeable. Love this store and the staff.

name: rob s
text: last reviewer is an idiot!! so easy to work with.. maybe they wanted something for nothing?? They went out of their way for me..

name: Tracy Bevis
text: I agree!  They always go over and beyond to make my order perfect.

name: Ashlynn Harvey
text: This is the only UPS location I use. They go out of their way to make sure everything is taken care of in a timely manner for you, and are very friendly.

name: Steven Frederick
text: Quick service, very convenient.

name: Brian Williamson
text: These guys go the extra mile, they helped me get some proposals out last minute and even dropped at UPS on their way home to make sure it got out on time! WOW!

resp.text: Thank you Brian for the kind comments.  We hope you win the work.

name: Josh White
text: The notary public is a Chinese lady who barely speaks English who insisted I need to go to my bank to find a different notary public.

name: Michael Garber
text: Suki and Daniel really take pride in what they do! I don't ship anywhere else.  Will miss these two when I move out of the area

name: B M
text: Excellent service.

name: Taylor Wilson
text: If you are able to go through this ups rather than the post office do it! I always receive quality and helpful  service here. 100000x better than the post office in daphne!

name: Crystal
text: Staff has always been quick and informative!

name: Sharon Condon
text:
Best bucks in the business. Understands uniqueness of service; upscale area. Ultimate test of success, especially in the U.S.
🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

name: Kayla Hagan
text: The sales associate,  while nice,  kept trying to pressure me to purchase the "before Christmas delivery guarantee ".... I came in on the 17th, and unsure how a package going straight up I-65 would take longer than 8 days to get there. She was hesitant on telling me other price/delivery options. I understand sales, but it is ridiculous trying to worry people on sending packages in a timely manner, and have them repeatedly ask for delivery options, especially when they are on a tight budget. I was informed by the recipient that they received the package today... so thank you for delivering the package in a timely manner, but no thanks for the ridiculous hassle to send it.

resp.text:
Hey Kayla,
I hate to hear that you felt pressured and that you felt like the associate was hesitant to give you the ground option. I think that they just wanted to make sure that you knew that yes even though there was 8 calendar days until Christmas, UPS only had 5 shipping transit days left and we can't predict when or if ground volume will be affected.

So again I'm sorry to hear about your experience but I am glad to hear that your package got there quickly.

name: Lisa Warren (Lisa C. Warren, Artist)
text: Staff is always very helpful and really nice!

name: Tristan Adrey
text: The service is fantastic.  I once had an issue that required the attention of the manager and multiple calls to UPS over a lost package. He was always very kind and courteous. That said, I do find their prices on the high side. They are certainly a luxury service and if you want to treat yourself it is worth every penny you pay! FIVE STARS all the way.

name: Alexander Renzi
text: This was the best customer service I have had at any UPS store, ever.

name: M&M Productions
text: So helpful and easy to work with. I had no clue what I've been missing out on while I was going to the other place. Special thanks to Haley and the rest of the UPS crew who obviously enjoy their job.

name: Rosalyn Rowley
text: Thomas and the staff at the Spanish Fort UPS store are amazing!!  I have asked on several occasions for them to assist me with designing invitations and they have always served me with prompt and positive feedback.  I highly recommend their services and will continue to use them for my specialty and non specialty printing and design services.

name: Laura Griffin
text: Great store! The owner is a great guy that really cares about his customers. He's even helpful to me at my The UPS Store in Pensacola!! He has helped us with print projects that our equipment can't handle.

name: Michele Loussaert
text: I don't use any other UPS store.   Staff is very friendly and helpful.   I recommend this UPS store for all your shipping, mailing and printing!   Everyone is always so nice.    Thank You Spanish Fort UPS Store!   :)

name: Highway To Happy
text: Have been to the store twice recently and was provided excellent service both times.  I would highly recommend this location.  Will definitely be back.

name: Andrew Hollingsworth
text: Best service, smiling faces and direct action on shipping. Always a smooth transaction at this store.

name: Lisa Becker
text: These folks are really professional and very accommodating. They have gone above and beyond in customer service for me, and I'm just a regular customer. We travel, so we really rely on them and they have never let us down.

name: Scott Blair (Scott the Wheelman)
text: Thomas and his crew have been printing my box labels for years.  They constantly upgrade their technology.  I highly recommend them for printing as well as shipping services.

name: Thomas Hanrahan
text: The staff here is professional, friendly and goes out of its way to help, especially when we're on a deadline. Their work is top of the line. Highly recommend.

name: Courtney Howard
text: Great experience each time I've visited this store.  Everyone is very friendly and genuinely helpful.  Only time I was not thrilled was when I took a 10 page doc to be scanned and emailed and it costs me nearly $10...a little sticker shock.

name: Aaron Williams
text: The staff is great, they take care of their customers and the location is really convenient.  I have used this location for over 5 years now and the team that run the store are Great!

name: Sheri Gwin

name: Brittany Pickens

name: HDM List

name: Angela
text: I've used this UPS store on 4 occasions (mailed packages & for print services) in 2017!  Great print quality, fast & excellent service every time.

name: Ramona Babb

name: Christy George
text: They are always super helpful and kind.

name: Bennie Jones
text: I got verry good. Service from the  UPS atore

text: Awesome staff, quick turn~around on deadlines!!

name: Kevin M

name: Brandon Lewis
text: Nice and polite people an very helpful

name: Ed Souza
text: The owner at this location goes extras miles to help you!

name: Jeffrey Smoot
